pinyin: wǒ men míng tiān jiàng yī qǐ jí wǔ fàn。
english: We will eat lunch together tomorrow.

hanzi: 对不起，我忘了你的名字。
pinyin: duì bù qǐ， wǒ wàng le nǐ de míng zi。
english: I'm sorry; I've forgotten your name.

hanzi: 请医生开点咳嗽药.
pinyin: qǐng yī shēng kāi diǎn ké sou yào.
english: Ask the doctor to prescribe something for that cough.

hanzi: 她走进内室去换衣服。
pinyin: tā zǒu jìn nèi shì qù huàn yī fu。
english: She went into the inner room to change her dress.

hanzi: 我们深深感谢你的支持。
pinyin: wǒ men shēn shēn gǎn xiè nǐ de zhī chí。
english: We are deeply grateful for your support.

hanzi: 他没有努力工作的动力。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu nǔ lì gōng zuò de dòng lì。
english: He hasn't much incentive to work hard.

hanzi: 这些苹果不熟，是酸的。
pinyin: zhè xie píng guǒ bù shú， shì suān de。
english: These apples are not ripe; they are sour.

hanzi: 她穿着一件深蓝色的上衣。
pinyin: tā chuān zhuó yī jiàn Shēn lán shǎi de shàng yī。
english: She wore a dark blue coat.

hanzi: 这些苹果不熟，是酸的。
pinyin: zhè xie píng guǒ bù shú， shì suān de。
english: These apples are not ripe; they are sour.

hanzi: 丰年时人人都吃得饱。
pinyin: fēng nián shí rén rén dōu jí de bǎo。
english: In years of plenty everyone has plenty to eat.

hanzi: 他向我提了一些很好的意见。
pinyin: tā xiàng wǒ tí le yī xiē hěn hǎo de yì jiàn。
english: He gave me some good advice.

hanzi: 你应该好好利用这个机会。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi hǎo hǎo lì yòng zhè gè jī huì。
english: You should take advantage of it.

hanzi: 我们想去参加化装舞会。
pinyin: wǒ men xiǎng qù cān jiā huà zhuāng wǔ huì。
english: We want to join in the masquerade.

hanzi: 休息一下对你会有好处的。
pinyin: xiū xi yī xià duì nǐ kuài yǒu hǎo chu de。
english: It'll do you good to have a rest.

hanzi: 你的雨衣系上带子更好看.
pinyin: nǐ de yǔ yī xì shàng dài zi gèng hǎo kàn.
english: Your mackintosh looks better belted.

hanzi: 别客气，我又不是外人。
pinyin: biè kè qì， wǒ yòu bú shì wài rén。
english: Don't stand on ceremony. I'm no stranger.

hanzi: 她一点儿也不像那么大年纪.
pinyin: tā yī diǎnr yě bù xiàng nà me dà nián jì.
english: She doesn't look her age at all.

hanzi: 他们拿那位老人开玩笑。
pinyin: tā men ná nà wèi lǎo rén kāi wán xiào。
english: They are making fun of the old man.

hanzi: 我们必须提高生产水平。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū tí gāo shēng chǎn shuǐ píng。
english: We must increase production levels.

hanzi: 他坐在风口上，着凉了。
pinyin: tā zuò zài fēng kǒu shàng， zháo liáng le。
english: He sat in a draught and catch a cold.

hanzi: 晚课后，男孩子们去睡了。
pinyin: wǎn kè hòu， nán hái zǐ men qù shuì le。
english: The boys went to sleep after vespers.

hanzi: 每个学生发了一本课本。
pinyin: měi gè xué sheng fà le yī běn kè běn。
english: Each student was issued with a textbook.

hanzi: 要是我再有一次机会就好了。
pinyin: yào shì wǒ zài yǒu yī cì jī huì jiù hào le。
english: If only I had another chance.

hanzi: 这种菜好吃不好做.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng cài hǎo chī bù hǎo zuò.
english: This dish is delicious but rather a trouble to prepare.

hanzi: 他洗澡时想出了这个主意。
pinyin: tā xǐ zǎo shí xiǎng chū le zhè gè zhǔ yi。
english: The idea came to him in his bath.

hanzi: 他们之间的交易告吹了。
pinyin: tā men zhī jiān de jiāo yì gào chuī le。
english: The transaction between them was dismissed.

hanzi: 他用一把刀子将苹果切开。
pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ dāo zi jiàng píng guǒ qiè kāi。
english: He cleaved an apple with a knife.

hanzi: 我没有注意到他已经走了。
pinyin: wǒ méi yǒu zhù yì dào tā yǐ jīng zǒu le。
english: I failed to note that he had left.

hanzi: 孩子们假装开商店玩儿.
pinyin: hái zi men jiǎ zhuāng kāi shāng diàn wánr.
english: The children were playing at keeping shop.

hanzi: 我们在旁边的地里放羊。
pinyin: wǒ men zài páng biān de de lǐ fàng yáng。
english: We are grazing the sheep in the next field.

hanzi: 那些男孩子们渴望下课。
pinyin: nà xiē nán hái zǐ men kě wàng xià kè。
english: The boys were itching for the lesson to end.

hanzi: 夏天他总是高高兴兴的。
pinyin: xià tiān tā zǒng shì gāo gāo xìng xìng de。
english: He's always full of cheer in summer.

hanzi: 我们一星期三节化学课。
pinyin: wǒ men yī xīng qī sān jié huà xué kè。
english: We have three periods of chemistry a week.

hanzi: 你不是支持我就是反对我。
pinyin: nǐ bú shì zhī chí wǒ jiù shì fǎn duì wǒ。
english: You are either with me or against me.

hanzi: 他想当医生或者经商.
pinyin: tā xiǎng dàng yī shēng huò zhě jīng shāng.
english: He wants to be a doctor or go into business.

hanzi: 门口有个男人要求见你。
pinyin: mén kǒu yǒu gè nán rén yāo qiú xiàn nǐ。
english: Some man at the door is asking to see you.

hanzi: 他觉得他们和他地位相等。
pinyin: tā jué de tā men huò tā dì wèi xiāng děng。
english: He feels that they are his equals.

hanzi: 今年的开始将会更好。
pinyin: jīn nián de kāi shǐ jiāng huì gèng hǎo。
english: The commencement of this year will be better.

hanzi: 他们决定开办一家合作社。
pinyin: tā men jué dìng kāi bàn yī jiā hé zuò shè。
english: They decided to set up a cooperative.

hanzi: 你现在需要的就是放假。
pinyin: nǐ xiàn zài xū yào de jiù shì fàng jià。
english: A holiday will be just the thing for you.

hanzi: 她上大学时经常练跑步.
pinyin: tā shàng dà xué shí jīng cháng liàn pǎo bù.
english: She used to run when she was at college.

hanzi: 他是一位非常重要的人物。
pinyin: tā shì yī wèi fēi cháng zhòng yào de rén wù。
english: He is a man of great importance.

hanzi: 别以为我能相信那件事.
pinyin: biè yǐ wéi wǒ néng xiāng xìn nà jiàn shì.
english: You can scarcely expect me to believe that.

hanzi: 他将他的名字写在清单上。
pinyin: tā jiàng tā de míng zi xiě zài qīng dān shàng。
english: He wrote down his name on the list.

hanzi: 这里有很大的活动空间。
pinyin: zhè lǐ yǒu hěn dà de huó dòng kōng jiān。
english: There is plenty of space here to move about.

hanzi: 她和我在学院里是同学。
pinyin: tā huò wǒ zài xué yuàn lǐ shì tóng xué。
english: She and I were contemporaries at college.

hanzi: 她在电话中说话不太客气.
pinyin: tā zài diàn huà zhòng shuō huà bù tài kè qì.
english: She sounded rather off on the phone.

hanzi: 我们在下午四点钟喝茶。
pinyin: wǒ men zài xià wǔ sì diǎn zhōng hè chá。
english: We have tea at four o'clock in the afternoon.

hanzi: 我在写现代英语的语法书.
pinyin: wǒ zài xiě xiàn dài Yīng yǔ de yǔ fǎ shū.
english: I'm writing a grammar of modern English.

hanzi: 我想我们能从中学到许多。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒ men néng cóng zhōng xué dào xǔ duō。
english: I think we may learn much from it.

hanzi: 他已经习惯在外面吃饭了。
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng xí guàn zài wài miàn chī fàn le。
english: He is used to eating out all the time.

hanzi: 我们都支持他的科学研究。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu zhī chí tā de kē xué yán jiū。
english: We all support his scientific research.

hanzi: 请给我找一个放糖的容器。
pinyin: qǐng jǐ wǒ zhǎo yī gè fàng táng de róng qì。
english: Please find me a receptacle for sugar.

hanzi: 我从不错过踢足球的机会。
pinyin: wǒ cóng bù cuò guò tī zú qiú de jī huì。
english: I never miss a chance of playing football.

hanzi: 父亲下午总要睡个午觉。
pinyin: fù qīn xià wǔ zǒng yào shuì gè wǔ jiào。
english: Father always takes a nap in the afternoon.

hanzi: 住寄宿舍比住旅馆便宜.
pinyin: zhù jì sù shè bì zhù lu:3 guǎn pián yi.
english: It's cheaper to live in lodgings than in a hotel.

hanzi: 我不喜欢读他的文学批评。
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan dú tā de wén xué pī píng。
english: I don't like to read his literary criticism.

hanzi: 别把刚才跟你说的事忘了。
pinyin: biè bǎ gāng cái gēn nǐ shuō de shì wàng le。
english: Don't forget what I told you just now.

hanzi: 好像她已出去好几天了。
pinyin: hǎo xiàng tā yǐ chū qù hǎo jǐ tiān le。
english: It looks as if she's gone away for a few days.

hanzi: 我从报纸上得知这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ zòng bào zhǐ shàng dé zhī zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I learned this news from the newspaper.

hanzi: 排球是我很喜欢的运动。
pinyin: pái qiú shì wǒ hěn xǐ huan de yùn dòng。
english: Volleyball is a sport of which I am very fond.

hanzi: 他昨天参加了我们的讨论。
pinyin: tā zuó tiān cān jiā le wǒ men de tǎo lùn。
english: He joined us in the discussion yesterday.

hanzi: 除我之外，他们都去睡觉了。
pinyin: chú wǒ zhī wài， tā men dōu qù shuì jiào le。
english: They all went to sleep except me.

hanzi: 今天食堂比往常忙得多.
pinyin: jīn tiān shí táng bì wǎng cháng máng de duō.
english: The canteen is more than usually busy today.

hanzi: 整个工作只需要半个小时。
pinyin: zhěng gè gōng zuò zhǐ xū yào bàn gè xiǎo shí。
english: The whole job only takes half an hour.

hanzi: 我找不到你寄给我的那封信。
pinyin: wǒ zhǎo bù dào nǐ jì jǐ wǒ de nà fēng xìn。
english: I can't trace that letter you sent me.

hanzi: 我想我们能从中学到许多。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng wǒ men néng cóng zhōng xué dào xǔ duō。
english: I think we may learn much from it.

hanzi: 我们每个星期四下午开会。
pinyin: wǒ men měi gè xīng qī sì xià wǔ kāi huì。
english: We have meetings every Thursday afternoon.

hanzi: 我不喜欢读他的文学批评。
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan dú tā de wén xué pī píng。
english: I don't like to read his literary criticism.

hanzi: 早饭后，他读了各种报纸。
pinyin: zǎo fàn hòu， tā dú le gè zhǒng bào zhǐ。
english: After breakfast he perused the newspapers.

hanzi: 这条街道比那条短四倍。
pinyin: zhè tiáo jiē dào bì nà tiáo duǎn sì bèi。
english: This street is four times shorter than that one.

hanzi: 她长成了一位漂亮的女人。
pinyin: tā zhǎng chéng le yī wèi piào liang de nu:3 rén。
english: She developed into a beautiful woman.

hanzi: 我百分之百同意你的看法。
pinyin: wǒ bǎi fēn zhī bǎi tóng yì nǐ de kàn fǎ。
english: I am a hundred percent in agreement with you.

hanzi: 这样的天才现在很少见。
pinyin: zhè yàng de tiān cái xiàn zài hěn shǎo xiàn。
english: It is rare to find such a genius nowadays.

hanzi: 你只要问他，他就会告诉你。
pinyin: nǐ zhǐ yào wèn tā， tā jiù kuài gào su nǐ。
english: You have only to ask and he'll tell you.

hanzi: 我是最近才开始学法语的。
pinyin: wǒ shì zuì jìn cái kāi shǐ xué fǎ yǔ de。
english: I've only recently started learning French.

hanzi: 这是一个极为重要的问题。
pinyin: zhè shì yī gè jí wéi zhòng yào de wèn tí。
english: This is an issue of the utmost importance.

hanzi: 他没穿鞋，看上去矮多了。
pinyin: tā mò chuān xié， kàn shàng qù ǎi duō le。
english: He seems much shorter without his shoes on.

hanzi: 刚才你男朋友给你打电话了。
pinyin: gāng cái nǐ nán péng you jǐ nǐ dǎ diàn huà le。
english: Your boyfriend called you just now.

hanzi: 天花板很低, 留神别碰头.
pinyin: tiān huā bǎn hěn dī,  liú shén biè pèng tou.
english: Mind you don't bump your head on the low ceiling.

pinyin: dà mǐ shì wǒ men shēng huó de jī běn shí wù。
english: Rice is our essential foodstuff in life.

pinyin: wǒ jiā fù jìn Xīn jiàn le yī jiā gōng chǎng。
english: A new factory was established near my home.

hanzi: 你把这个句子中的动词丢了。
pinyin: nǐ bǎ zhè gè jù zi zhòng dì dòng cí diū le。
english: You have omitted the verb in the sentence.

hanzi: 老师给全班同学作了听写。
pinyin: lǎo shī jǐ quán bān tóng xué zuò le tīng xiě。
english: The teacher dictated to the whole class.

hanzi: 你不请大夫来, 他就得死了.
pinyin: nǐ bù qǐng dài fu lái,  tā jiù de sǐ le.
english: He will certainly die if you don't call a doctor.

hanzi: 他喜欢拿他的同学开玩笑。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan ná tā de tóng xué kāi wán xiào。
english: He likes playing jokes on his classmates.

hanzi: 他们要去动物园或打排球。
pinyin: tā men yào qù dòng wù yuán huò dǎ pái qiú。
english: They will go to the zoo or play volleyball.

hanzi: 爸爸每天早上走路去上班。
pinyin: bà ba měi tiān zǎo shang zǒu lù qù shàng bān。
english: Father walks to his office every morning.

hanzi: 我们决定立刻去火车站。
pinyin: wǒ men jué dìng lì kè qù huǒ chē zhàn。
english: We determined to go to the railway station at once.

hanzi: 这个小男孩能够数到一千。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nán hái néng gòu shuò dào yī qiān。
english: The little boy can count up to a thousand.

hanzi: 有的人爱先做难做的工作。
pinyin: yǒu de rén ài xiān zuò nàn zuò de gōng zuò。
english: Some people tackle the difficult jobs first.

hanzi: 这个小男孩跑去找他的哥哥。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nán hái pǎo qù zhǎo tā de gē ge。
english: The little boy ran off to get his brother.

hanzi: 这座公路桥现在开放通行。
pinyin: zhè zuò gōng lù qiáo xiàn zài kāi fàng tōng xíng。
english: The road bridge is now open to traffic.

hanzi: 把这些信送到对面邮局去。
pinyin: bǎ zhè xie xìn sòng dào duì miàn yóu jú qù。
english: Take these letters over to the post office.

hanzi: 那男子一举一动像个大男孩。
pinyin: nà nán zǐ yī jǔ yī dòng xiàng gè dà nán hái。
english: That man behaves like an overgrown child.

hanzi: 这家医院有二百个床位。
pinyin: zhè jiā yī yuàn yǒu èr bǎi gè chuáng wèi。
english: This hospital has accommodation for 200 patients.

hanzi: 可能的话，她想跟我们一起去。
pinyin: kě néng de huà， tā xiǎng gēn wǒ men yī qǐ qù。
english: If possible, She wants to go with us.

hanzi: 可能的话，她想跟我们一起去。
pinyin: kě néng de huà， tā xiǎng gēn wǒ men yī qǐ qù。
english: If possible, She wants to go with us.

hanzi: 这不是一个很重要的问题。
pinyin: zhè bú shì yī gè hěn zhòng yào de wèn tí。
english: This is not an issue of the utmost importance.

hanzi: 你把这个句子中的动词丢了。
pinyin: nǐ bǎ zhè gè jù zi zhòng dì dòng cí diū le。
english: You have omitted the verb in the sentence.

hanzi: 不论你在哪里，我都会想念你。
pinyin: bù lùn nǐ zài nǎ li， wǒ dū huì xiǎng niàn nǐ。
english: Wherever you are, I will miss you.

hanzi: 她认为自己懂得什么是生活。
pinyin: tā rèn wéi zì jǐ dǒng de shén me shì shēng huó。
english: She esteemed that she knew what life was.

hanzi: 别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。
pinyin: biè kū， nǐ xiàn zài yǐ jīng shì dà nán hái le。
english: Don't cry, you are a big boy now.

hanzi: 别都挤在一块儿, 分开坐吧.
pinyin: biè dōu jǐ zài yī kuài er,  fēn kāi zuò ba.
english: Don't all sit together, spread yourselves out.

hanzi: 这个小男孩跑去找他的哥哥。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nán hái pǎo qù zhǎo tā de gē ge。
english: The little boy ran off to get his brother.

hanzi: 听到脚步声，就知道他回来了。
pinyin: tīng dào jiǎo bù shēng， jiù zhī dào tā huí lai le。
english: Footsteps announced his return.

hanzi: 他为我切了几块很好的鸡肉。
pinyin: tā wèi wǒ qiè le jǐ kuài hěn hǎo de jī ròu。
english: He carved me some very nice pieces of chicken.

hanzi: 这些电影只适宜成人观看。
pinyin: zhè xie diàn yǐng zhǐ shì yí chéng rén guān kàn。
english: These films are suitable for adults only.

hanzi: 这封信只用一张纸写成。
pinyin: zhè fēng xìn zhǐ yòng yī zhāng zhǐ xiě chéng。
english: The letter was written on a single sheet of paper.

hanzi: 我要去图书馆还这些书。
pinyin: wǒ yào qù tú shū guǎn huán zhè xie shū。
english: I'm just going to check in these books at the library.

hanzi: 他为我切了几块很好的鸡肉。
pinyin: tā wèi wǒ qiè le jǐ kuài hěn hǎo de jī ròu。
english: He carved me some very nice pieces of chicken.

hanzi: 下点雨会使我们感到凉快一些。
pinyin: xià diǎn yǔ kuài shǐ wǒ men gǎn dào liáng kuai yī xiē。
english: Some rain would cool us down.

hanzi: 小女孩立志要做一名科学家。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái lì zhì yào zuò yī míng kē xué jiā。
english: The young girl aspired to be a scientist.

hanzi: 我希望演说者不要离题。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng yǎn shuō zhě bù yào lí tí。
english: I wish the speaker would confine himself to the subject.

hanzi: 我正在做晚饭时停电了。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài zuò wǎn fàn shí tíng diàn le。
english: While I was cooking supper the electricity went off.

hanzi: 青少年是身体成熟期。
pinyin: qīng shào nián shì shēn tǐ chéng shú qī。
english: Teenage is the period at which the body reaches maturity.

hanzi: 那就说明了她不在这里的原因。
pinyin: nà jiù shuō míng le tā bù zài zhè lǐ de yuán yīn。
english: That explains why she is not here.

hanzi: 有许多来自那个国家的难民。
pinyin: yǒu xǔ duō lái zì nèi gè guó jiā de nàn mín。
english: There are many refugees from that country.

pinyin: mā ma zhǔn bèi le hǎo chī de dōng xi jǐ wǒ。
english: Mother has something delicious in store for me.

hanzi: 使学生学习是教师的责任。
pinyin: shǐ xué sheng xué xí shì jiào shī de zé rèn。
english: It's a teacher's business to make student learn.

pinyin: wǒ bù hē jiǔ,  jǐ wǒ lái bēi qì shuǐ ba.
english: I won't have any wine; I'll just have (a) soda water.

pinyin: tā hěn kuài chéng wéi dà jiā zhù yì de rén wù。
english: She soon becomes the centre of attention.

hanzi: 我认为我已找到理想的爱人了。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi wǒ yǐ zhǎo dào lǐ xiǎng de ài ren le。
english: I think I've met the love of my life.

hanzi: 我为准备英语考试的人做辅导。
pinyin: wǒ wèi zhǔn bèi Yīng yǔ kǎo shì de rén zuò fǔ dǎo。
english: I coach people for English exams.

hanzi: 我们应该对下一代负责。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi duì xià yī dài fù zé。
english: We should be responsible for the generation as yet unborn.

hanzi: 我为准备英语考试的人做辅导。
pinyin: wǒ wèi zhǔn bèi Yīng yǔ kǎo shì de rén zuò fǔ dǎo。
english: I coach people for English exams.

hanzi: 我爱她就像爱自己的女儿一样。
pinyin: wǒ ài tā jiù xiàng ài zì jǐ de nu:3 ér yí yàng。
english: I have loved her like a father should.

hanzi: 我能和你做生意，太高兴了。
pinyin: wǒ néng huò nǐ zuò shēng yi， tài gāo xìng le。
english: I am only too pleased to do business with you.

pinyin: zhè liàng qì chē liàng qǐ le wēi xiǎn xìn hào dēng。
english: The car had its hazard warning lights on.

pinyin: zhè jué fēi jiě jué wèn tí de hào bàn fǎ。
english: This is by no means a good way to solve the problem.

pinyin: tiān qì yù bào shuō míng tiān shì qíng tiān。
english: The weather forecast says it will be sunny tomorrow.

pinyin: wǒ yǒu liǎng gè jiě jie.  tā men dōu shì yī shēng.
english: I've got two sisters. They'reboth doctors.

hanzi: 这家新开的商店里挤满了顾客。
pinyin: zhè jiā xīn kāi de shāng diàn lǐ jǐ mǎn le gù kè。
english: The new store is crowded with customers.

pinyin: tā shì gè zài Yīng guó de wài guó liú xué shēng。
english: She is an overseas student in Britain.

hanzi: 九月的天气确实像秋天了。
pinyin: jiǔ yuè de tiān qì què shí xiàng qiū tiān le。
english: The weather in September was positively autumnal.

hanzi: 九月的天气确实像秋天了。
pinyin: jiǔ yuè de tiān qì què shí xiàng qiū tiān le。
english: The weather in September was positively autumnal.

pinyin: rú guǒ yǒu jī kuài， nǐ yīng dāng dào nà li qù。
english: You should go there if occasion arises.

pinyin: méi yǒu zhè me dà de dì fang lái fàng zhè xie shū。
english: There is not so much room for these books.

pinyin: lí kāi fáng jiān qián， qǐng bǎ dēng guān diào。
english: Please turn the light off before leaving the room.

pinyin: tā gè zhǒng yīn yuè dōu xǐ ài， huò wǒ yí yàng。
english: She enjoys all kinds of music, as I do.

pinyin: tā jīng cháng jǐ dāng dì bào zhǐ xiě wén zhāng。
english: He constantly writes articles for the local paper.

pinyin: tā men tǎo lùn le qì hòu huò qí tā de huà tí。
english: They discussed the weather and other topics.

pinyin: nà diàn yuán yī diǎn yě bù pà má fan。
english: The shop assistant was not in the least afraid of the trouble.

pinyin: yóu chuán shàng de rén men kàn shàng qù hěn gāo xìng。
english: People on the barge looked rather happy.

pinyin: tā bǎ xìng fú huò yǒu qián lián xiǎng dào yī qǐ。
english: She associated happiness with having money.

pinyin: tā zài kāi huì， mò kòng lái jiē diàn huà。
english: He is in conference and cannot come to the telephone.

pinyin: xī sī xiān sheng shì Yīng guó qián rèn shǒu xiàng。
english: Mr. Heath is the former Prime Minister of Britain.

hanzi: 我们试图让她和她的家庭和好。
pinyin: wǒ men shì tú ràng tā huò tā de jiā tíng hé hǎo。
english: We tried to reconcile her with her family.

hanzi: 她最初是以当演员而成名的.
pinyin: tā zuì chū shì yǐ dàng yǎn yuán ér chéng míng de.
english: She first made a name for herself as an actress.

hanzi: 没有这么大的地方来放这些书。
pinyin: méi yǒu zhè me dà de dì fang lái fàng zhè xie shū。
english: There is not so much room for these books.

hanzi: 他是去年六月开始在这里工作的。
pinyin: tā shì qù nián liù yuè kāi shǐ zài zhè lǐ gōng zuò de。
english: He started work here last June.

hanzi: 他没有给我回答他问题的机会。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu jǐ wǒ huí dá tā wèn tí de jī huì。
english: He gave me no chance to reply to his question.

hanzi: 我希望这本书的字再大一点儿。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng zhè běn shū de zì zài dà yī diǎnr。
english: I wish this book was written in bigger character.

hanzi: 她常常一边看电视一边织毛衣。
pinyin: tā cháng cháng yī biān kàn diàn shì yī biān zhī máo yī。
english: She often knits while watching TV.

pinyin: xī wàng nǐ néng gǎn dào xiàng yī jiā rén yí yàng.

pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè gè wèn tí yǒu hǎo jǐ gè fāng fǎ。
english: There are several ways of approaching the problem.

hanzi: 他没有给我回答他问题的机会。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu jǐ wǒ huí dá tā wèn tí de jī huì。
english: He gave me no chance to reply to his question.

pinyin: wǒ shì yòng diàn dòng dǎ zì jī dǎ zhè fēng xìn de。
english: I did the letter on my electric typewriter.

pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi quán tǐ tǎo lùn bān jí huó dòng。
english: We must discuss the class activities in a body.

pinyin: nà nán hái jīn tiān zǎo shang jí le sān wǎn mǐ fàn。
english: The boy ate three bowls of rice this morning.

pinyin: tā men tōng guò yī tiáo xiǎo lù pá dào shān shàng。
english: They climbed up the mountain through a defile.

pinyin: yuán lái tā gū gu jiù shì wǒ biǎo jiě.
english: It turns out that her aunt and my cousin are one and the same (person).

pinyin: wǒ wèn le yī wèi běn dì rén， gāi zǒu něi tiáo lù。
english: I asked one of the locals which way to go.

pinyin: liú chū xīng qī wǔ xià wǔ de shí jiān zuò fù xí。
english: Friday afternoons are left free for revision.

pinyin: lǎo shī zài hēi bǎn shàng xiě chū xīn dān cí。
english: The teacher wrote down the new words on the blackboard.

pinyin: fù qīn měi wǎn dōu zuò zài tóng yī zhāng yǐ zi shàng，
english: Father sits in the same chair every evening.

hanzi: 父亲每晚都坐在同一张椅子上，
pinyin: fù qīn měi wǎn dōu zuò zài tóng yī zhāng yǐ zi shàng，
english: Father sits in the same chair every evening.

hanzi: 在我们的花园里有一棵矮苹果树。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de huā yuán lǐ yǒu yī kē ǎi píng guǒ shù。
english: There is a dwarf apple tree in our garden.

pinyin: zhè xie nián lái， tā qǔ dé le fēng fù de jīng yàn。
english: He has gained rich experience in these years.

hanzi: 学生们正在解一道数学习题。
pinyin: xué sheng men zhèng zài xiè yī dào shù xué xí tí。
english: The students are working on a mathematical problem.

hanzi: 桌上有两只苹果和一只橘子。
pinyin: zhuō shàng yǒu liǎng zhǐ píng guǒ huò yī zhǐ jú zi。
english: There are two apples and an orange on the table.

hanzi: 那男孩今天早上吃了三碗米饭。
pinyin: nà nán hái jīn tiān zǎo shang jí le sān wǎn mǐ fàn。
english: The boy ate three bowls of rice this morning.

pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng dài wǒ de hái zi men qù gōng yuán wàn。

pinyin: jiào shī zhèng zài jǐ bān shàng de xué sheng zuò tīng xiě。

pinyin: zhè yī xīn wén jié mù zhǐ bào dào guó wài xiāo xi。

pinyin: rú guǒ tiān bù qíng， wǒ men jiù bù qù sàn bù。

pinyin: wǒ qì chē lǐ de nuǎn qì shè bèi chū le diǎn máo bìng。
english: The heater in my car doesn't work properly.

pinyin: shōu jí zhè xie yóu piào huā le wǒ yī bǎi kuài qián。
english: It cost me 100 dollars to collect the stamps.

pinyin: yī shēng duì wǒ shuō， wǒ xū yào hǎo hǎo xiū xi。

pinyin: rú guǒ míng tiān tiān qì hào， wǒ mén kě néng chū mén。

hanzi: 如果明天天气好，我门可能出门。
pinyin: rú guǒ míng tiān tiān qì hào， wǒ mén kě néng chū mén。
english: If it is fine tomorrow, we may go out.

pinyin: tā jí jí máng máng de bǎ hái zi men tuī jìn qì chē。
english: He huddled the children into the automobile.

pinyin: diàn shì shàng duì zhè jiàn shì bào dào hěn shǎo。
english: The television coverage of the event was rather sparse.

pinyin: zhè dùn fàn wǒ qǐng kè， nǐ bǎ qián shōu qǐ lai ba。
english: This meal is my treat, so put your money away.

hanzi: 这顿饭我请客，你把钱收起来吧。
pinyin: zhè dùn fàn wǒ qǐng kè， nǐ bǎ qián shōu qǐ lai ba。
english: This meal is my treat, so put your money away.

pinyin: mù qián de qíng kuàng bù dé zài jì xù xià qu le.
english: The present state of affairs cannot be allowed to go on.

pinyin: nèi gè nóng cūn nán háir guò bù guàn chéng shì shēng huó.
english: The village boy was strange to city life.

pinyin: xiào zhǎng biǎo yáng nán tóng xué fú zhuāng zhěng qí.

pinyin: duì bù qǐ， wǒ bù néng lái cān jiā wǎn huì le。
english: Sorry, but I can not join you for the evening party.

pinyin: xué xí wài yǔ lí bù kāi hǎo de cí diǎn。
english: A good dictionary is indispensable for learning a foreign language.

pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào gāi zěn yàng lái gǎn xiè nǐ cái hào。
english: I don't know how I can possibly thank you enough.

pinyin: tài yáng， xīng xing huò yuè liàng dōu shì tiān tǐ。

pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ shuō shuō duì zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng de yì jiàn。

pinyin: huà wán hòu qǐng bǎ dōng xi dōu fàng huí yuán chù。
english: Please put all those things away when you finish drawing.

pinyin: wǒ xī wàng zhè xie ān pái kuài dé dào nǐ de tóng yì。
english: I hope the arrangements meet with your approval.

pinyin: yàn huì shàng， dà jiā jí diào le hǎo jǐ lán shuǐ guǒ。
english: Several baskets of fruit were eaten at the party.

pinyin: tā qǐng qiú wǒ men bāng tā wán chéng tā de jì huà。
english: He asked us to assist him in carrying through his plan.

pinyin: wǒ yī diǎn yě bù míng bai nǐ zài shuō xiē shén me。
english: I haven't the slightest idea what you are talking about.

hanzi: 他看到她父亲走进来就站了起来。
pinyin: tā kàn dào tā fù qīn zǒu jìn lái jiù zhàn le qǐ lai。
english: He got to his feet when he saw her father came in.

hanzi: 我可不喜欢整天和他在一起。
pinyin: wǒ kě bù xǐ huan zhěng tiān huò tā zài yī qǐ。
english: I'm not too enamored with the idea of spending a whole day with him.

hanzi: 我可不喜欢整天和他在一起。
pinyin: wǒ kě bù xǐ huan zhěng tiān huò tā zài yī qǐ。
english: I'm not too enamored with the idea of spending a whole day with him.

hanzi: 我们应该更好地利用现有设备。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi gèng hǎo de lì yòng xiàn yǒu shè bèi。
english: We should make a better use of the existing equipment.

hanzi: 我可不喜欢整天和他在一起。
pinyin: wǒ kě bù xǐ huan zhěng tiān huò tā zài yī qǐ。
english: I'm not too enamored with the idea of spending a whole day with him.

hanzi: 那家破产的银行正被法院调查。
pinyin: nà jiā pò chǎn de yín háng zhèng bèi fǎ yuàn diào chá。
english: The bank of bankruptcy is investigated by the court.

hanzi: 想像一下你又有钱, 又有名的情况.
pinyin: xiǎng xiàng yī xià nǐ yòu yǒu qián,  yòu yǒu míng de qíng kuàng.
english: Imagine yourself (to be) rich and famous.

hanzi: 虽然汤药很苦，我还是不得不喝了。
pinyin: suī rán tāng yào hěn kǔ， wǒ hái shì bù dé bù hè le。
english: I had to take the herb tea although it's bitter.

hanzi: 他没吃早饭就去上学了。
pinyin: tā mò jí zǎo fàn jiù qù shàng xué le。
english: He went to school without breakfast. (=He went to school and did not eat breakfast.)

hanzi: 把面包切成小片，然后给我两片。
pinyin: bǎ miàn bāo qiè chéng xiǎo piàn， rán hòu jǐ wǒ liǎng piàn。
english: Cut the bread into small rounds and give me two.

hanzi: 细心的人总是把东西放得很整齐。
pinyin: xì xīn de rén zǒng shì bǎ dōng xi fàng de hěn zhěng qí。
english: Careful people usually put everything in good order.

hanzi: 他没吃早饭就去上学了。
pinyin: tā mò jí zǎo fàn jiù qù shàng xué le。
english: He went to school without breakfast. (=He went to school and did not eat breakfast.)

hanzi: 如果有机会，我将去看那部电影。
pinyin: rú guǒ yǒu jī kuài， wǒ jiàng qù kàn nà bù diàn yǐng。
english: I will go to see the film if I get the opportunity.

hanzi: 我不太满意他对这个句子的翻译。
pinyin: wǒ bù tài mǎn yì tā duì zhè gè jù zi de fān yì。
english: I'm not satisfied with his interpretation of this sentence.

hanzi: 他不但会说英语，而且还会说法语。
pinyin: tā bù dàn kuài shuō Yīng yǔ， ér qiě huán kuài shuō fa yù。
english: He speaks not only English but also French.

hanzi: 我们必须找一个地方放这张新照片。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū zhǎo yī gè dì fang fàng zhè zhāng xīn zhào piàn。

pinyin: wǒ shàng le dàng,  huán yǐ wéi tā men de wán xiào shì zhēn de ne.
english: I was hoaxed into believing their story.

hanzi: 这个计划道理上行得通, 但不现实。
pinyin: zhè gè jì huà dào lǐ shàng xìng de tōng,  dàn bù xiàn shí。
english: The plan is feasible in reason but impractical.

hanzi: 直到几个月后，他才知道这故事。
pinyin: zhí dào jǐ ge yuè hòu， tā cái zhī dào zhè gù shì。
english: It was not until a few months later that he knew the story.

hanzi: 我对他很生气，因为他让我等了好久。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā hěn shēng qì， yīn wèi tā ràng wǒ děng le hǎo jiǔ。
english: I was angry with him for keeping me waiting.

hanzi: 表演正好进行到一半时停电了。
pinyin: biǎo yǎn zhèng hǎo jìn xíng dào yī bàn shí tíng diàn le。
english: The light went out bang in the middle of the performance.

hanzi: 我们今后一星期没有见面的机会了。
pinyin: wǒ men jīn hòu yī xīng qī méi yǒu jiàn miàn de jī huì le。
english: We have no chance to meet each other a week hence.

hanzi: 他带这个人走过街道到火车站。
pinyin: tā dài zhè gè rén zǒu guò jiē dào dào huǒ chē zhàn。
english: He guided the man through the streets to the railway station.

hanzi: 你应该在课堂上完成语法练习。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi zài kè táng shàng wán chéng yǔ fǎ liàn xí。
english: You should finish your English grammar drills in the class.

hanzi: 这本书从前很出名, 现在没人看了.
pinyin: zhè běn shū cóng qián hěn chū míng,  xiàn zài mò rén kàn le.
english: This book was once famous, but nobody reads it today.

hanzi: 这演说很动听，可是没什么内容。
pinyin: zhè yǎn shuō hěn dòng tìng， kě shì mò shén me nèi róng。
english: It's a clever speech, but there was no real meat in it.

hanzi: 她每举办舞会，总喜欢搞得很排场。
pinyin: tā měi jǔ bàn wǔ huì， zǒng xǐ huan gǎo de hěn pǎi chǎng。
english: If ever she gives a party she likes to do it in style.

hanzi: 我认为你应当去找医生看看病.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi nǐ yīng dāng qù zhǎo yī shēng kàn kan bìng.
english: I think you ought to go to/to go and see (ie consult) the doctor.

hanzi: 班个子太矮了, 拿不到桌子上的书。
pinyin: bān gè zi tài ǎi le,  ná bù dào zhuō zi shàng de shū。
english: Ben is so short that he can not get at that book on the table.

hanzi: 对我们来说，很难决定走哪一条路。
pinyin: duì wǒ men lái shuō， hěn nàn jué dìng zǒu něi yī tiáo lù。
english: It was difficult for us to decide which road to take.

hanzi: 我真是累极了，简直可以睡上一整天。
pinyin: wǒ zhēn shì lèi jí le， jiǎn zhí kě yǐ shuì shàng yī zhěng tiān。
english: I'm so tired I could sleep for a whole day.

hanzi: 他每天早晨花两个小时练习赛跑。
pinyin: tā měi tiān zǎo chén huā liǎng gè xiǎo shí liàn xí sài pǎo。
english: Every morning he spent two hours training for the race.

hanzi: 她向老板说明了自己那种表现的原因。
pinyin: tā xiàng lǎo bǎn shuō míng le zì jǐ nà zhòng biǎo xiàn de yuán yīn。
english: She explained her conduct to her boss.

hanzi: 他每天早晨花两个小时练习赛跑。
pinyin: tā měi tiān zǎo chén huā liǎng gè xiǎo shí liàn xí sài pǎo。
english: Every morning he spent two hours training for the race.

hanzi: 他又拿出惯用的借口，说他太忙了。
pinyin: tā yòu ná chū guàn yòng de jiè kǒu， shuō tā tài máng le。
english: He came out with his staple excuse that he was too busy.

hanzi: 他用一把小刀把自己的名字刻在墙上。
pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ xiǎo dāo bǎ zì jǐ de míng zi kè zài qiáng shàng。
english: He scratched his name on the wall with a knife.

hanzi: 她处理政治问题的方法很科学。
pinyin: tā chǔ lǐ zhèng zhì wèn tí de fāng fǎ hěn kē xué。
english: She has a very scientific method of dealing with political problems.

hanzi: 长江是世界上最长的河流之一。
pinyin: cháng jiāng shì shì jiè shàng zuì cháng de hé liú zhī yī。
english: The Changjiang River is one of the longest rivers in the world.

hanzi: 老师要求我把演说的要点记下来。
pinyin: lǎo shī yāo qiú wǒ bǎ yǎn shuō de yào diǎn jì xia lai。
english: The teacher asked me to note down the main points of the speech.

hanzi: 只要不吃得太多，你可以吃任何东西。
pinyin: zhǐ yào bù jí de tài duō， nǐ kě yǐ jí rèn hé dōng xi。
english: You may eat anything, so long as you don't eat too much.

hanzi: 我已经通过了日语的中级水平考试。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng tōng guò le rì yǔ de zhōng jí shuǐ píng kǎo shì。
english: I've passed the intermediate level exam of Japanese.

hanzi: 他每天早晨花两个小时练习赛跑。
pinyin: tā měi tiān zǎo chén huā liǎng gè xiǎo shí liàn xí sài pǎo。
english: Every morning he spent two hours training for the race.

hanzi: 万一下雨的话，我们也许得改变计画。
pinyin: wàn yī xià yǔ de huà， wǒ men yě xǔ de gǎi biàn jì huà。
english: If the day turns out wet we may have to change our plans.

hanzi: 他每天早晨花两个小时练习赛跑。
pinyin: tā měi tiān zǎo chén huā liǎng gè xiǎo shí liàn xí sài pǎo。
english: Every morning he spent two hours training for the race.

hanzi: 问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。
pinyin: wèn tí shì shén me shí hou néng dé dào wǒ men suǒ xū yào de qián。
english: The problem is when to get the money we need.

hanzi: 她自己省着吃，好让孩子们吃饱。
pinyin: tā zì jǐ xǐng zhuó jí， hào ràng hái zi men jí bǎo。
english: She stinted herself of food in order to let the children have enough.

hanzi: 我的英文作业中只有两三处错误。
pinyin: wǒ de Yīng wén zuò yè zhòng zhǐ yǒu liǎng sān chù cuò wù。
english: I had no more than 2 or 3 mistakes on my English assignment.

hanzi: 我们的海关检查只花了几分钟时间。
pinyin: wǒ men de hǎi guān jiǎn chá zhǐ huā le jǐ fēn zhōng shí jiān。
english: It took us only a few minutes to get through the Customs.

hanzi: 这是我从当地干部那里了解到的情况。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ zòng dāng dì gàn bù nà li liǎo jiě dào de qíng kuàng。
english: That's what I've learnt from the local cadres.

hanzi: 步行了四个小时以后，我们开始累了。
pinyin: bù xíng le sì gè xiǎo shí yǐ hòu， wǒ men kāi shǐ lèi le。
english: After walking for four hours we were beginning to flag.

hanzi: 问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。
pinyin: wèn tí shì shén me shí hou néng dé dào wǒ men suǒ xū yào de qián。
english: The problem is when to get the money we need.

hanzi: 你多花点时间学习课文是有好处的.
pinyin: nǐ duō huā diǎn shí jiān xué xí kè wén shì yǒu hǎo chu de.
english: You could with profit spend some extra time studying the text.

hanzi: 我们的海关检查只花了几分钟时间。
pinyin: wǒ men de hǎi guān jiǎn chá zhǐ huā le jǐ fēn zhōng shí jiān。
english: It took us only a few minutes to get through the Customs.

hanzi: 客人们说他们不反对听听轻音乐。
pinyin: kè ren men shuō tā men bù fǎn duì tìng tìng qīng yīn yuè。
english: The guests said that they wouldn't mind having a little light music.

hanzi: 把这些数字加起来，告诉我总数是多少。
pinyin: bǎ zhè xie shù zì jiā qǐ lai， gào su wǒ zǒng shù shì duō shao。
english: Add this numbers together and give me the total.

hanzi: 我们每年举行一次大学校友联欢会。
pinyin: wǒ men měi nián jǔ xíng yī cì dà xué xiào yǒu lián huān huì。
english: We hold an annual reunion of former students of the college.

hanzi: 他决心去看看办公室后边的那些房间。
pinyin: tā jué xīn qù kàn kan bàn gōng shì hòu biān de nà xiē fáng jiān。
english: He determined to view the rooms behind the office.

hanzi: 不要指望一个星期就能学会一门外语.
pinyin: bù yào zhǐ wàng yī gè xīng qī jiù néng xué huì yī mén wài yǔ.
english: You can't expect to learn a foreign language in a week.

hanzi: 辛苦工作了四个小时后，他觉得非常饿。
pinyin: xīn kǔ gōng zuò le sì gè xiǎo shí hòu， tā jué de fēi cháng è。
english: He felt very hungry after four-hours' hard work.

hanzi: 他走了，把所有没做完的工作都留给了我。
pinyin: tā zǒu le， bǎ suǒ yǒu mò zuò wán de gōng zuò dōu liú jǐ le wǒ。
english: He was gone and left all the work undone to me.

hanzi: 辛苦工作了四个小时后，他觉得非常饿。
pinyin: xīn kǔ gōng zuò le sì gè xiǎo shí hòu， tā jué de fēi cháng è。
english: He felt very hungry after four-hours' hard work.

hanzi: 讲一口流利的英语需要多年的刻苦操练。
pinyin: jiǎng yī kǒu liú lì de Yīng yǔ xū yào duō nián de kè kǔ cāo liàn。
english: It took years of hard work to speak good English.

hanzi: 这是我有过的教育意义最大的一次经历。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ yǒu guò de jiào yù yì yì zuì dà de yī cì jīng lì。
english: It was the most educational experience I had ever had.

hanzi: 我们请她帮忙时， 她总是那么不友好。
pinyin: wǒ men qǐng tā bāng máng shí，  tā zǒng shì nà me bù yǒu hǎo。
english: She is always so disagreeable when we ask her to help.

hanzi: 这机器是为水下使用而特别改装的。
pinyin: zhè jī qì shì wèi shuǐ xià shǐ yòng ér tè bié gǎi zhuāng de。
english: This machine has been specially adapted for underwater use.

hanzi: 我们请她帮忙时， 她总是那么不友好。
pinyin: wǒ men qǐng tā bāng máng shí，  tā zǒng shì nà me bù yǒu hǎo。
english: She is always so disagreeable when we ask her to help.

hanzi: 一般认为出国旅游可增广见闻。
pinyin: yì bān rèn wéi chū guó lu:3 yóu kě zēng guǎng jiàn wén。
english: It is generally thought that traveling abroad can enrich one's knowledge.

hanzi: 也许这本书会对你的研究有用处。
pinyin: yě xǔ zhè běn shū kuài duì nǐ de yán jiū yǒu yòng chù。
english: Perhaps this book will prove to be of some use to you in your studies.

hanzi: 周一周二连续两天我们都将开会。
pinyin: zhōu yī zhōu èr lián xù liǎng tiān wǒ men dōu jiàng kāi huì。
english: We shall have meetings on two consecutive days, Monday and Tuesday.

hanzi: 我只关心我觉得对我很重要的事物。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ guān xīn wǒ jué de duì wǒ hěn zhòng yào de shì wù。
english: I am concerned only with things that I feel are important to me.

hanzi: 如今，我们可以利用太阳能做很多事情。
pinyin: rú jīn， wǒ men kě yǐ lì yòng tài yáng néng zuò hěn duō shì qing。
english: We can use solar energy to do many things today.

hanzi: 那城市有自己的公用图书馆和公园。
pinyin: nà chéng shì yǒu zì jǐ de gōng yòng tú shū guǎn huò gōng yuán。
english: The town has its own public library and public gardens.

hanzi: 如今，我们可以利用太阳能做很多事情。
pinyin: rú jīn， wǒ men kě yǐ lì yòng tài yáng néng zuò hěn duō shì qing。
english: We can use solar energy to do many things today.

hanzi: 她的小说我都喜欢, 最新的一部尤其好.
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō wǒ dōu xǐ huan,  zuì xīn de yī bù yóu qí hào.
english: I like all her novels, but her latest is particularly good.

hanzi: 女儿睡觉之前，我总讲故事给她听。
pinyin: nu:3 ér shuì jiào zhī qián， wǒ zǒng jiǎng gù shì jǐ tā tìng。
english: I always tell my daughter a story before she goes to sleep.

hanzi: 今天早晨我起床晚了，错过了公共汽车。
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo chén wǒ qǐ chuáng wǎn le， cuò guò le gōng gòng qì chē。
english: I got up late this morning and missed the bus.

hanzi: 当她看到他走过来的时候，她的脸亮了起来。
pinyin: dàng tā kàn dào tā zǒu guò lai de shí hou， tā de liǎn liàng le qǐ lai。
english: Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.

hanzi: 我们是在试验的基础上得出这个结论的。
pinyin: wǒ men shì zài shì yàn de jī chǔ shàng dé chū zhè gè jié lùn de。
english: We drew this conclusion on the basis of experiments.

hanzi: 二十世纪六十年代出现了许多新兴国家。
pinyin: èr shí shì jì liù shí nián dài chū xiàn le xǔ duō xīn xīng guó jiā。
english: The 1960s saw the emergence of many new nations.

hanzi: 他十岁的时候就已经长得比他哥哥高了。
pinyin: tā shí suì de shí hou jiù yǐ jīng zhǎng de bì tā gē ge gāo le。
english: By the time he is ten, he has outgrown his older brother.

hanzi: 我认为他对这个问题的评论是不正确的。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā duì zhè gè wèn tí de píng lùn shì bù zhèng què de。
english: I think his commentary on this issue is not correct.

hanzi: 工作了十五个小时之后，我开始感到累了。
pinyin: gōng zuò le shí wǔ gè xiǎo shí zhī hòu， wǒ kāi shǐ gǎn dào lèi le。
english: After working for fifteen hours I began to tire.

hanzi: 旅行社的那位小姐告诉我下午一点开门.
pinyin: lu:3 xíng shè de nà wèi xiǎo jie gào su wǒ xià wǔ yī diǎn kāi mén.
english: The lady at the tourist office told me it opened at 1 pm.

hanzi: 他每次来电话时, 我好像总是正在洗澡.
pinyin: tā měi cì lái diàn huà shí,  wǒ hǎo xiàng zǒng shì zhèng zài xǐ zǎo.
english: Every time he phones I always seem to be in the bath.

hanzi: 你可得安静点儿了，要不然我没法计算了。
pinyin: nǐ kě de ān jìng diǎn er le， yào bu rán wǒ méi fǎ jì suàn le。
english: Do keep quiet or you'll throw me out in my calculations.

hanzi: 我代表我的同事和我本人向你表示感谢。
pinyin: wǒ dài biǎo wǒ de tóng shì huò wǒ běn rén xiàng nǐ biǎo shì gǎn xiè。
english: On behalf of my colleagues and myself I thank you.

hanzi: 我正在做吃的, 没太留心听收音机.
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài zuò jí de,  mò tài liú xīn tìng shōu yīn jī.
english: I was only listening to the radio with half an ear, while preparing some food.

hanzi: 有些人在爬高山时会发生高山反应。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén zài pá gāo shān shí kuài fā shēng gāo shān fǎn yìng。
english: Some people develop altitude sickness when climbing high mountains.

hanzi: 现在是差一刻四点--我四点一刻见你.
pinyin: xiàn zài shì cī yī kè sì diǎn-- wǒ sì diǎn yī kè xiàn nǐ.
english: It's (a) quarter to (US of) four now I'll meet you at quarter past (US after).

hanzi: 我女儿今天有点不舒服, 所以她没去上学.
pinyin: wǒ nu:3 ér jīn tiān yǒu diǎn bù shū fu,  suǒ yǐ tā mò qù shàng xué.
english: My daughter's a bit poorly today, so she didn't go to school.

hanzi: 劳驾, 买去市中心的两张全票和两张半票.
pinyin: láo jià,  mǎi qù shì zhōng xīn de liǎng zhāng quán piào huò liǎng zhāng bàn piào.
english: Two and two halves to the city centre, please.

hanzi: 他长大了，穿剩下的衣服就给了他的弟弟。
pinyin: tā zhǎng dà le， chuān shèng xià de yī fu jiù jǐ le tā de dì di。
english: As he grew up he passed on his clothes to his younger brother.

hanzi: 那个小男孩第一次会将汉字慢慢地读出来。
pinyin: nèi gè xiǎo nán hái dì yī cì kuài jiàng Hàn zì màn màn de dú chū lai。
english: That boy can spell out the Chinese for the fast time.

hanzi: 只要你不出卖我，要我做什么我都愿意。
pinyin: zhǐ yào nǐ bù chū mài wǒ， yào wǒ zuò shén me wǒ dōu yuàn yì。
english: As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to (do).

hanzi: 他没有回答，只是继续一点一点地吃东西。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu huí dá， zhǐ shì jì xù yī diǎn yī diǎn de jí dōng xi。
english: He didn't answer, but just continued to nibble at his food.

hanzi: 这个地方脏极了，我不相信有人能住在这。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang zàng jí le， wǒ bù xiāng xìn yǒu rén néng zhù zài zhè。
english: This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here.

hanzi: 这个地方脏极了，我不相信有人能住在这。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang zàng jí le， wǒ bù xiāng xìn yǒu rén néng zhù zài zhè。
english: This place is filthy; I don't believe anyone can live here.

hanzi: 我突然意识到可能再也见不着她了。
pinyin: wǒ tū rán yì shí dào kě néng zài yě xiàn bù zhuó tā le。
english: I was struck by the sudden realization that I would probably never see her again.

hanzi: 宴会结束时，我们谢了主人后便回家去了。
pinyin: yàn huì jié shù shí， wǒ men xiè le zhǔ rén hòu pián huí jiā qù le。
english: At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went away.

hanzi: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
pinyin: wǒ shì jīn tiān zǎo chén zòng bào zhǐ shàng zhī dào zhè tiáo xiāo xi de。
english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

hanzi: 这个虽然不便宜, 但我觉得我们还是应该买.
pinyin: zhè gè suī rán bù biàn yí,  dàn wǒ jué de wǒ men hái shì yīng gāi mǎi.
english: It's not cheap but I think we should buy it none the less.

hanzi: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
pinyin: wǒ shì jīn tiān zǎo chén zòng bào zhǐ shàng zhī dào zhè tiáo xiāo xi de。
english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

hanzi: 我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
pinyin: wǒ shì jīn tiān zǎo chén zòng bào zhǐ shàng zhī dào zhè tiáo xiāo xi de。
english: I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

hanzi: 新医院的全部设备需要一年才能装备好。
pinyin: xīn yī yuàn de quán bù shè bèi xū yào yī nián cái néng zhuāng bèi hào。
english: The complete equipment of the new hospital will take a year.

hanzi: 天气的变化打乱了我们体育比赛的时间表。
pinyin: tiān qì de biàn huà dǎ luàn le wǒ men tǐ yù bǐ sài de shí jiàn biǎo。
english: The change of the weather has mucked up our sports timetable.

hanzi: 你讲到一半就停下来不讲，太没意思了。
pinyin: nǐ jiǎng dào yī bàn jiù tíng xia lai bù jiǎng， tài mò yì si le。
english: It's not nice of you to stop in the middle of what you are saying.

hanzi: 那把椅子原本是为你准备的，但是被她拿走了。
pinyin: nà bǎ yǐ zi yuán běn shì wèi nǐ zhǔn bèi de， dàn shì bèi tā ná zǒu le。
english: The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.

hanzi: 我们将吃一点面包，剩下的留到早饭时吃。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng jí yī diǎn miàn bāo， shèng xià de liú dào zǎo fàn shí jí。
english: We'll eat some of the bread and keep the rest for breakfast.

hanzi: 那把椅子原本是为你准备的，但是被她拿走了。
pinyin: nà bǎ yǐ zi yuán běn shì wèi nǐ zhǔn bèi de， dàn shì bèi tā ná zǒu le。
english: The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.

hanzi: 我们将吃一点面包，剩下的留到早饭时吃。
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng jí yī diǎn miàn bāo， shèng xià de liú dào zǎo fàn shí jí。
english: We'll eat some of the bread and keep the rest for breakfast.

hanzi: 我们相信你在星期五之前可以完成这篇论文。
pinyin: wǒ men xiāng xìn nǐ zài xīng qī wǔ zhī qián kě yǐ wán chéng zhè piān lùn wén。
english: We are depending on you to finish the paper by Friday.

hanzi: 他跑步出发，但很快就累得慢下来成了步行。
pinyin: tā pǎo bù chū fā， dàn hěn kuài jiù lèi de màn xia lai chéng le bù xíng。
english: He started off at a run but soon tired and slowed to a walk.

hanzi: 当他在国外安定下来时，他开始想念祖国了。
pinyin: dàng tā zài guó wài ān dìng xia lai shí， tā kāi shǐ xiǎng niàn zǔ guó le。
english: He came to miss his homeland when he settled down abroad.

hanzi: 这位演说者除了想搞笑之外，没有别的目的。
pinyin: zhè wèi yǎn shuō zhě chú le xiǎng gǎo xiào zhī wài， méi yǒu bié de mù dì。
english: The speaker has no other purpose except to make people laugh.

hanzi: 他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。
pinyin: tā zì cóng cān jiā le huì huà bān， fǎ yǔ qǔ dé le hěn dà jìn bù。
english: His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.

hanzi: 到了这里一个月以后，学生们开始想家了。
pinyin: dào le zhè lǐ yī gè yuè yǐ hòu， xué sheng men kāi shǐ xiǎng jiā le。
english: The students began to feel homesick after they had been here for a month.

hanzi: 这个决定将被通知给所有直接有关的人。
pinyin: zhè gè jué dìng jiàng bèi tōng zhī jǐ suǒ yǒu zhí jiē yǒu guān de rén。
english: All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.

hanzi: 他一向是来得很晚，然后又总说他得早走。
pinyin: tā yí xiàng shì lái de hěn wǎn， rán hòu yòu zǒng shuō tā de zǎo zǒu。
english: Typically, he would come in late and then say that he had to go early.

hanzi: 如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men yào kè fú kùn nan， wǒ men jiù yào yǒu jìn qǔ jīng shén。
english: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

hanzi: 那青年通过每天给那女子送花而向她求爱。
pinyin: nà qīng nián tōng guò měi tiān jǐ nà nu:3 zǐ sòng huā ér xiàng tā qiú ài。
english: The young man courted the young lady by bring her flowers every day.

hanzi: 如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men yào kè fú kùn nan， wǒ men jiù yào yǒu jìn qǔ jīng shén。
english: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

hanzi: 我不喜欢他，但是说句公道话，他是个好工人。
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan tā， dàn shì shuō jù gōng dao huà， tā shì gè hào gōng rén。
english: I don't like him, but, to give him his due, he is a good worker.

hanzi: 我们一起欢度的那个晚上是我最快乐的事情之一。
pinyin: wǒ men yī qǐ huān dù de nèi gè wǎn shang shì wǒ zuì kuài lè de shì qing zhī yī。
english: That evening together is one of my happiest recollections.

hanzi: 这个女孩非常幸运，她的妈妈是她的知心朋友。
pinyin: zhè gè nu:3 hái fēi cháng xìng yùn， tā de mā ma shì tā de zhī xīn péng you。
english: The girl was fortunate enough to have her mother as a bosom friend.

hanzi: 几年来, 几百个留学生在那所大学学习过。
pinyin: jǐ nián lái,  jǐ bǎi gè liú xué shēng zài nà suǒ dà xué xué xí guò。
english: Over the years, hundreds of overseas students have studied at that university.

hanzi: 我们每星期工作五天, 每星期六和星期日休息。
pinyin: wǒ men měi xīng qī gōng zuò wǔ tiān,  měi xīng qī liù huò xīng qī rì xiū xi。
english: We work five days a week and have every Saturday and Sunday off.

hanzi: 在出访外国之前要做好许多准备工作。
pinyin: zài chū fǎng wài guó zhī qián yào zuò hào xǔ duō zhǔn bèi gōng zuò。
english: There are a lot of preliminaries to be gone through before you can visit a foreign country.

pinyin: zhè yī qíng kuàng chū xiàn de hěn tū rán， bǎ wǒ men de jì huà quán dōu dǎ luàn le。
english: This sudden development turned all our plans topsy-turvy.

pinyin: xiàn zài shì xiū xi shí jiān,  xué sheng men yī gè jiē yī gè zǒu chū jiào shì。
english: It was the time of break and students came out of classroom one after another.

hanzi: 别为几个差错着急，迟早一切都会得到圆满解决的。
pinyin: biè wèi jǐ ge chā cuò zháo jí， chí zǎo yī qiè dū huì dé dào yuán mǎn jiě jué de。
english: Don't worry about a few mistakes; it'll all come out in the wash.

hanzi: 常给我们看病的那个医生, 我们都非常喜欢他, 他要走了.
pinyin: cháng jǐ wǒ men kàn bìng de nèi gè yī shēng,  wǒ men dōu fēi cháng xǐ huan tā,  tā yào zǒu le.
english: Our doctor, whom/who we all like very much, is leaving.

pinyin: jīn nián wǒ men bù néng chū guó， suǒ yǐ zhǐ néng qù Shàng hǎi dù jià le。
english: We can't go abroad this year, so we'll have to content ourselves with a holiday in Shanghai.

hanzi: 现在的时装和我还是小女孩时候流行的样子很不一样了。
pinyin: xiàn zài de shí zhuāng huò wǒ hái shì xiǎo nu:3 hái shí hou liú xíng de yàng zi hěn bù yí yàng le。
english: Fashions have changed a lot since I was a little girl.

hanzi: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zhī dào rú hé shēng huó de rén men,  cái kuài kāi shǐ rèn shi zì jǐ huò rén shēng。
english: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

hanzi: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zhī dào rú hé shēng huó de rén men,  cái kuài kāi shǐ rèn shi zì jǐ huò rén shēng。
english: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

english: We should pay more attention to the infection of young people with dangerous ideologies.

pinyin: zài yì bān qíng kuàng xià tā dōu huò wǒ men yī qǐ lái,  zhǐ shì tā xiàn zài shēn tǐ bù tài hào.

pinyin: wǒ mèi mei rèn wéi， tā néng jí lì shuō fú fù qīn tí gāo tā měi yuè de líng yòng qián。

hanzi: 如果你到今晚把手头上的工作做完，你明天就可以休息。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ dào jīn wǎn bǎ shǒu tou shàng de gōng zuò zuò wán， nǐ míng tiān jiù kě yǐ xiū xi。
english: Provided/Providing (that) you clear your desk by this evening, you can have tomorrow off.

hanzi: 如果你到今晚把手头上的工作做完，你明天就可以休息。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ dào jīn wǎn bǎ shǒu tou shàng de gōng zuò zuò wán， nǐ míng tiān jiù kě yǐ xiū xi。
english: Provided/Providing (that) you clear your desk by this evening, you can have tomorrow off.

hanzi: 那匹马踢了我。

pinyin: tā de mèng xiǎng shí xiàn le。

hanzi: 我想存点儿钱。

pinyin: jīn qián mǎi bù lái xìng fú。

pinyin: wǒ shàng jiǔ diǎn zhì wǔ diǎn de bān.
english: I work nine to five.

pinyin: xué Yīng wén shì zhí de de。
english: It is worth while to learn English.

hanzi: 吸烟对健康有害。
pinyin: xī yān duì jiàn kāng yǒu hài。
english: Smoking is injurious to health.

hanzi: 这些话毫无意义。
pinyin: zhè xie huà háo wú yì yì。
english: These words are empty of meaning.

pinyin: tā zhèng yán hǎi biān zǒu qù。
english: He is walking down the seaside.

hanzi: 他是个有个性的人。

hanzi: 会议每年举行一次。

hanzi: 疼痛越来越剧烈。

english: The sound was very discordant.

pinyin: jiāng hé dà duō liú rù hǎi yáng.
english: Most rivers flow into the sea.

hanzi: 秋天时叶子变黄。

pinyin: tā men yāo qiú lì jí fù kuǎn。

hanzi: 人们正排队买票。
pinyin: rén men zhèng pái duì mǎi piào。

hanzi: 这些页数次序不对。

english: The pages aren't in proper order.

pinyin: dōng tiān shì dà duō shù lu:3 guǎn de dàn jì。
english: Winter is the slack season at most hotels.

hanzi: 他无礼至极，竟然叫我傻瓜。
pinyin: tā wú lǐ zhì jí， jìng rán jiào wǒ shǎ guā。
english: He was impudent enough to call me a fool.

hanzi: 偷吃而不被人发现很有趣。
pinyin: tōu jí ér bù bèi rén fā xiàn hěn yǒu qù。
english: It is fun eating by stealth without being found.

hanzi: 小猫喝了牛奶，又洗了脸。
pinyin: xiǎo māo hè le niú nǎi， yòu xǐ le liǎn。
english: The little cat drank its milk and washed its face.

hanzi: 去年冬天，地上积雪很厚。
pinyin: qù nián dōng tiān， dì shang jī xuě hěn hòu。
english: Last winter the snow lay thick on the ground.

hanzi: 下一次邮递时间是四点钟。
pinyin: xià yī cì yóu dì shí jiān shì sì diǎn zhōng。
english: The next postal delivery is at 4 o'clock.

hanzi: 这个商人收到了一船茶叶。
pinyin: zhè gè shāng rén shōu dào le yī chuán chá yè。
english: The merchant had received a shipment of tea.

hanzi: 她错在没有亲自与他见面。
pinyin: tā cuò zài méi yǒu qīn zì yù tā jiàn miàn。
english: She erred in failing to meet him in person.

hanzi: 大家的反应如何难以估计。
pinyin: dà jiā de fǎn yìng rú hé nán yǐ gū jì。
english: It was difficult to gauge how people would respond.

hanzi: 很多树冬天时就掉光了叶子。
pinyin: hěn duō shù dōng tiān shí jiù diào guāng le yè zi。
english: Many trees are leafless in winter.

hanzi: 你刚才讲的话彻底离题了。
pinyin: nǐ gāng cái jiǎng de huà chè dǐ lí tí le。
english: What you just said is completely off the track.

hanzi: 我的各种问题似乎同时出现了
pinyin: wǒ de gè zhǒng wèn tí sì hu tóng shí chū xiàn le
english: All my troubles seem to come together.

hanzi: 他以晓之以礼的态度劝说她。
pinyin: tā yǐ xiǎo zhī yǐ lǐ de tài du quàn shuō tā。
english: He talked to her with persuasive manner.

hanzi: 她把她的意思解释得清清楚楚。
pinyin: tā bǎ tā de yì si jiě shì de qīng qīng chu chǔ。
english: She made her meaning crystal clear.

hanzi: 对这类事情的兴趣慢慢减少了。
pinyin: duì zhè lèi shì qing de xìng qu màn màn jiǎn shǎo le。
english: Interest lags in such matters.

hanzi: 这条线是那条线的四倍长。
pinyin: zhè tiáo xiàn shì nà tiáo xiàn de sì bèi zhǎng。
english: This line is four times as long as that one.

hanzi: 我想讲一下这首诗的意义。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng jiǎng yī xià zhè shǒu shī de yì yì。
english: I want to bring out the meaning of the poem.

hanzi: 散装运送货物更方便。
pinyin: sàn zhuāng yùn sòng huò wù gèng fāng biàn。
english: It is more convenient to transport the goods in bulk.

hanzi: 老年人冬季需要暖和的衣服。
pinyin: lǎo nián rén dōng jì xū yào nuǎn huó de yī fu。
english: Old people need warm clothes in winter.

hanzi: 头版上有些有意思的消息.
pinyin: tóu bǎn shàng yǒu xiē yǒu yì si de xiāo xi.
english: There's something interesting on the front page.

hanzi: 留心那条狗, 有时候咬人.
pinyin: liú xīn nà tiáo gǒu,  yǒu shí hou yǎo rén.
english: Be careful of the dog; it sometimes bites people.

hanzi: 请于每段第一行缩格书写。
pinyin: qǐng yú měi duàn dì yī xìng suō gé shū xiě。
english: Please indent the first line of each paragraph.

hanzi: 我父亲喜欢在饭后用牙签。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn xǐ huan zài fàn hòu yòng yá qiān。
english: My father likes to use toothpick after meals.

hanzi: 警方正在忙着捕捉逃犯。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài máng zhuó bǔ zhuō táo fàn。
english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

hanzi: 我往平底锅里打了两个鸡蛋。
pinyin: wǒ wàng píng dǐ guō lǐ dǎ le liǎng gè jī dàn。
english: I cracked two eggs into the frying pan.

hanzi: 中国是一个原油丰富的国家。
pinyin: Zhōng guó shì yī gè yuán yóu fēng fù de guó jiā。
english: China is a country rich in crude oil.

hanzi: 云层的构成方式有好几种。
pinyin: yún céng de gòu chéng fāng shì yǒu hǎo jǐ zhòng。
english: There are several kinds of cloud formations.

hanzi: 我起床后舒服地伸了个懒腰。
pinyin: wǒ qǐ chuáng hòu shū fu de shēn le gè lǎn yāo。
english: I got out of the bed and had a good stretch.

hanzi: 我认为他是更合适的人选。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā shì gèng hé shì de rén xuǎn。
english: In my estimation, he is a more suitable candidate.

hanzi: 我们有时候吃大米, 不吃土豆.
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu shí hou jí dà mǐ,  bù jí tǔ dòu.
english: We sometimes eat rice instead of potatoes.

hanzi: 我不知道合同的正确条款。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào hé tong de zhèng què tiáo kuǎn。
english: I don't know the exact terms of the contract.

hanzi: 牙被拔掉时，他疼得大叫。
pinyin: yá bèi bá diào shí， tā téng de dà jiào。
english: He bellowed with pain when the tooth was pulled out.

hanzi: 学生们接受老师的劝告。
pinyin: xué sheng men jiē shòu lǎo shī de quàn gào。
english: The students take the admonition from their teacher.

hanzi: 我们在花园里种了许多蔬菜。
pinyin: wǒ men zài huā yuán lǐ zhòng le xǔ duō shū cài。
english: We've grown many vegetables in our garden.

hanzi: 她头上带着一块黄色的头巾。
pinyin: tā tou shàng dài zhuó yī kuài huáng sè de tóu jīn。
english: She wore on her head a yellow kerchief.

hanzi: 真正的友谊比金钱更宝贵。
pinyin: zhēn zhèng de yǒu yì bì jīn qián gèng bǎo guì。
english: Real friendship is more valuable than money.

hanzi: 我妹妹每周去一次美容院。
pinyin: wǒ mèi mei měi zhōu qù yī cì měi róng yuàn。
english: My sister goes to a beauty parlour once a week.

hanzi: 我姐姐和我都喜欢穿牛仔裤。
pinyin: wǒ jiě jie huò wǒ dōu xǐ huan chuān niú zǎi kù。
english: Both my sister and I like to wear jeans.

hanzi: 两块田之间有一条树木带。
pinyin: liǎng kuài tián zhī jiān yǒu yī tiáo shù mù dài。
english: A belt of trees grew between the two fields.

hanzi: 如果你努力工作，你就会成功。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ nǔ lì gōng zuò， nǐ jiù kuài chéng gōng。
english: If you work hard you will succeed.

hanzi: 她在一年后才把孩子的奶断掉。
pinyin: tā zài yī nián hòu cái bǎ hái zi de nǎi duàn diào。
english: She had her baby weaned a year later.

hanzi: 他想在餐具室里找到一些酒。
pinyin: tā xiǎng zài cān jù shì lǐ zhǎo dào yī xiē jiǔ。
english: He wanted to find some wine in the pantry.

hanzi: 他把硬币倒过来，仔细检查。
pinyin: tā bǎ yìng bì dào guò lai， zǐ xì jiǎn chá。
english: He reversed the coin and examined it carefully.

hanzi: 电话在底楼的小书房里。
pinyin: diàn huà zài dǐ lóu de xiǎo shū fáng lǐ。
english: The telephone was in the little study on the ground floor.

hanzi: 我迫不及待地想听到这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ pò bù jí dài de xiǎng tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I can hardly wait to hear the news.

hanzi: 他们在沙漠中迷路而渴死了.
pinyin: tā men zài shā mò zhòng mí lù ér kě sǐ le.
english: They lost their way in the desert and died of thirst.

hanzi: 所有乘客都必须出示车票。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu chéng kè dōu bì xū chū shì jū piào。
english: All passengers are required to show their tickets.

hanzi: 我们的木头沙发似乎不太舒服。
pinyin: wǒ men de mù tou shā fā sì hu bù tài shū fu。
english: Our wooden sofa seems not very comfortable.

hanzi: 我走到临湖而开的那扇门前。
pinyin: wǒ zǒu dào lín hú ér kāi de nà shàn mén qián。
english: I reached the gate that opened onto the lake.

hanzi: 海外贸易成为主要的项目。
pinyin: hǎi wài mào yì chéng wéi zhǔ yào de xiàng mù。
english: The overseas trade has become the main project.

hanzi: 他有一些很奇怪的政治信念。
pinyin: tā yǒu yī xiē hěn qí guài de zhèng zhì xìn niàn。
english: He has some pretty strange political ideas.

hanzi: 他掌握会议可真有一套.
pinyin: tā zhǎng wò huì yì kě zhēn yǒu yī tào.
english: His handling of the meeting was quite a virtuoso performance.

hanzi: 那辆火车三点钟准时到达。
pinyin: nà liàng huǒ chē sān diǎn zhōng zhǔn shí dào dá。
english: The train arrived on the dot of three o'clock.

hanzi: 外科医生问他是否感到紧张。
pinyin: wài kē yī shēng wèn tā shì fǒu gǎn dào jǐn zhāng。
english: The surgeon asked him if he felt nervous.

hanzi: 这两个国家已经断绝关系。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè guó jiā yǐ jīng duàn jué guān xi。
english: The two countries have severed their relations.

hanzi: 那是历史上最严重的空难。
pinyin: nà shì lì shǐ shàng zuì yán zhòng de kōng nàn。
english: That was the worst airline disaster in history.

hanzi: 受惊的孩子们呼喊著找妈妈。
pinyin: shòu jīng de hái zi men hū hǎn著 zhǎo mā ma。
english: Frightened children were calling for their mothers.

hanzi: 我奶奶对外国人抱有偏见。
pinyin: wǒ nǎi nai duì wài guó rén bào yǒu piān jiàn。
english: My grandmother has a complex against foreigners.

hanzi: 我们的主要问题就是缺少时间。
pinyin: wǒ men de zhǔ yào wèn tí jiù shì quē shǎo shí jiān。
english: Our principal problem is lack of time.

hanzi: 工人在墙上固定了一个支架。
pinyin: gōng rén zài qiáng shàng gù dìng le yī gè zhī jià。
english: The worker fixed a bracket on the wall.

hanzi: 不系保险带开车就太傻了。
pinyin: bù xì bǎo xiǎn dài kāi chē jiù tài shǎ le。
english: It's silly to drive without fastening one's seat belt.

hanzi: 起风了, 雨点忽然落下来。
pinyin: qǐ fēng le,  yǔ diǎn hū rán luò xià lái。
english: A wind arose, and rain drops began falling all at once.

hanzi: 他时常提出一些奇怪的问题。
pinyin: tā shí cháng tí chū yī xiē qí guài de wèn tí。
english: He raises some strange questions now and again.

hanzi: 我累了就无法集中精力工作。
pinyin: wǒ lèi le jiù wú fǎ jí zhōng jīng lì gōng zuò。
english: I can't concentrate on my work when I'm tired.

hanzi: 地址如有变动，请通知我们。
pinyin: dì zhǐ rú yǒu biàn dòng， qǐng tōng zhī wǒ men。
english: Please notify us of any change of address.

hanzi: 客机在两万英尺的高度飞行。
pinyin: kè jī zài liǎng wàn yīng chǐ de gāo dù fēi xíng。
english: The airliner flew at an altitude of 20000ft.

hanzi: 他们使用紫外线灯杀死害虫。
pinyin: tā men shǐ yòng zǐ wài xiàn dēng shā sǐ hài chóng。
english: They use ultraviolet lamp to kill pests.

hanzi: 一再的拖延打乱了全部安排。
pinyin: yī zài de tuō yán dǎ luàn le quán bù ān pái。
english: The delays put the whole schedule out of joint.

hanzi: 已安排好一个戏剧晚会.
pinyin: yǐ ān pái hào yī gè xì jù wǎn huì.
english: A theatre evening (ie an evening at the theatre) has been arranged.

hanzi: 他把硬币倒过来，仔细检查。
pinyin: tā bǎ yìng bì dào guò lai， zǐ xì jiǎn chá。
english: He reversed the coin and examined it carefully.

hanzi: 先读课文，然后解释生词。
pinyin: xiān dú kè wén， rán hòu jiě shì shēng cí。
english: Read the text first and then explain the new words.

hanzi: 我们可以把动物分成很多种类。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ bǎ dòng wù fèn chéng hěn duō zhǒng lèi。
english: We can group animals into many types.

hanzi: 别胡闹了，过来给我帮个忙。
pinyin: biè hú nào le， guò lai jǐ wǒ bāng gè máng。
english: Stop fucking around and come and give me a hand.

hanzi: 他的火车头模型缺了一个零件.
pinyin: tā de huǒ chē tóu mó xíng quē le yī gè líng jiàn.
english: He lost one of the pieces of his model engine.

hanzi: 他每次度假都会带他的狗去。
pinyin: tā měi cì dù jià dū huì dài tā de gǒu qù。
english: He never goes on a vacation but he takes his pet dog.

hanzi: 他尽管有病，还是可以上课。
pinyin: tā jǐn guǎn yǒu bìng， hái shì kě yǐ shàng kè。
english: He is not so sick but he can attend a class.

hanzi: 这块油布是用来铺桌子的。
pinyin: zhè kuài yóu bù shì yòng lái pù zhuō zi de。
english: The piece of oilcloth is used as a covering for a table.

hanzi: 请寄给我一张收到此款的收据。
pinyin: qǐng jì jǐ wǒ yī zhāng shōu dào cǐ kuǎn de shōu jù。
english: Please send me a receipt for the money.

hanzi: 我得到一台电脑作生日礼物。
pinyin: wǒ dé dào yī tái diàn nǎo zuò shēng rì lǐ wù。
english: I'm getting a new computer for birthday present.

hanzi: 椅子被倒置过来放在了桌子上。
pinyin: yǐ zi bèi dǎo zhì guò lai fàng zài le zhuō zi shàng。
english: The chairs were inverted on the table.

hanzi: 我不完全理解他离开的理由。
pinyin: wǒ bù wán quán lǐ jiě tā lí kāi de lǐ yóu。
english: I don't fully understand his reasons for leaving.

hanzi: 他们计划组织一次科学考察。
pinyin: tā men jì huà zǔ zhī yī cì kē xué kǎo chá。
english: They planned to organize a scientific expedition.

hanzi: 车站到我家只有几步路的路程。
pinyin: chē zhàn dào wǒ jiā zhǐ yǒu jǐ bù lù de lù chéng。
english: The station is a short walk from my house

hanzi: 这个工厂经常原料不足。
pinyin: zhè gè gōng chǎng jīng cháng yuán liào bù zú。
english: The factory is in frequent scarcity of raw materials.

hanzi: 如有冒犯之处，请多多原谅。
pinyin: rú yǒu mào fàn zhī chù， qǐng duō duō yuán liàng。
english: If I have offended you, I ask your pardon.

hanzi: 他刚刚到达就不得不又离开。
pinyin: tā gāng gang dào dá jiù bù dé bù yòu lí kāi。
english: Scarcely had he arrived when he had to leave again.

hanzi: 你知道我多么讨厌打字和速记。
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào wǒ duō me tǎo yàn dǎ zì huò sù jì。
english: You know how I loathe typing and shorthand.

hanzi: 这段文字可以有不同的解释。
pinyin: zhè duàn wén zì kě yǐ yǒu bù tóng de jiě shì。
english: This passage may be given several interpretations.

hanzi: 这种新药还没有投放市场。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn yào huán méi yǒu tóu fàng shì chǎng。
english: This new drug is not yet commercially available.

hanzi: 游泳后，她用毛巾擦干身子。
pinyin: yóu yǒng hòu， tā yòng máo jīn cā gàn shēn zi。
english: After her swim she dried herself with a towel.

hanzi: 国王拒绝评论选举的结果。
pinyin: guó wáng jù jué píng lùn xuǎn jǔ de jié guǒ。
english: The king refuses to comment on the election results.

hanzi: 他的讲话赢得了听众的掌声。
pinyin: tā de jiǎng huà yíng dé le tīng zhòng de zhǎng shēng。
english: His speech won the applause of the audience.

hanzi: 任何值得做的事就值得做好。
pinyin: rèn hé zhí de zuò de shì jiù zhí de zuò hào。
english: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.

hanzi: 马感觉到了危险，于是停了下来。
pinyin: mǎ gǎn jué dào le wēi xiǎn， yú shì tíng le xia lai。
english: The horse sensed danger and stopped.

hanzi: 这是一个非常普通的女孩名字。
pinyin: zhè shì yī gè fēi cháng pǔ tōng de nu:3 hái míng zi。
english: This is a very popular name for a girl.

hanzi: 我们在这个问题上是团结一致的.
pinyin: wǒ men zài zhè gè wèn tí shàng shì tuán jié yī zhì de.
english: We are solidly united on this issue.

hanzi: 他的左胳膊在一次事故中受伤了。
pinyin: tā de zuǒ gē bo zài yī cì shì gù zhòng shòu shāng le。
english: His left arm was hurt in an accident.

hanzi: 她不肯帮忙，事情就更难办了。
pinyin: tā bù kěn bāng máng， shì qing jiù gèng nàn bàn le。
english: Her refusal to help complicates matters.

hanzi: 儿童的鞋并不便宜--反而更贵.
pinyin: ér tóng de xié bìng bù pián yi-- fǎn ér gèng guì.
english: Children's shoes aren't cheap quite the reverse.

hanzi: 我将对后果承担全部责任。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng duì hòu guǒ chéng dān quán bù zé rèn。
english: I'll bear full responsibility for the consequences.

hanzi: 这所大学有许多外国教授。
pinyin: zhè suǒ dà xué yǒu xǔ duō wài guó jiào shòu。
english: There are many foreign professors in this university.

hanzi: 宴会的准备工作现在都已就绪。
pinyin: yàn huì de zhǔn bèi gōng zuò xiàn zài dōu yǐ jiù xù。
english: Everything is ready now for the party.

hanzi: 通过这条很滑的路并不容易。
pinyin: tōng guò zhè tiáo hěn huá de lù bìng bù róng yì。
english: Negotiation of the slippery road was not easy.

hanzi: 学生们都被他的思想吸引住了。
pinyin: xué sheng men dōu bèi tā de sī xiǎng xī yǐn zhù le。
english: The students were fascinated by his ideas.

hanzi: 这些冷冻食品是最为方便。
pinyin: zhè xie lěng dòng shí pǐn shì zuì wéi fāng biàn。
english: These frozen foods are the most convenient of all.

hanzi: 我们明天早晨进行一个小测验。
pinyin: wǒ men míng tiān zǎo chén jìn xíng yī gè xiǎo cè yàn。
english: We will have a quiz tomorrow morning.

hanzi: 鸡骨头上还可能有点肉呢。
pinyin: jī gú tou shàng huán kě néng yǒu diǎn ròu ne。
english: You might find a bit of meat left on the chicken carcass.

hanzi: 我的围裙太脏了，我不得不洗它。
pinyin: wǒ de wéi qún tài zàng le， wǒ bù dé bù xǐ tā。
english: My apron is so dirty that I have to wash it.

hanzi: 打开窗户，让新鲜的空气进来。

english: Open the window and let in some fresh air.

english: It is generally believed that it pays to work hard.

hanzi: 他花了半个小时做完这项工作。
pinyin: tā huā le bàn gè xiǎo shí zuò wán zhè xiàng gōng zuò。
english: It took him half an hour to finish the work.

pinyin: jù yuè bù kuài guǎn tí gōng zhè yàng fāng biàn de jiàn zhù wù
english: A building housing such facilities.

hanzi: 她把杯子小心地放在架子边。
pinyin: tā bǎ bēi zi xiǎo xīn de fàng zài jià zi biān。

pinyin: wǒ kāi shǐ zuò huà， jǐn jǐn shì zuì jìn de shì qing。
english: It is only recently that I started painting.

pinyin: chū guó qián wǒ bì xū jìn xíng tǐ gé jiǎn chá。

hanzi: 我们准备把多余的苹果全部送人。
pinyin: wǒ men zhǔn bèi bǎ duō yú de píng guǒ quán bù sòng rén。
english: We are giving away all our surplus apples.

hanzi: 出国前我必须进行体格检查。
pinyin: chū guó qián wǒ bì xū jìn xíng tǐ gé jiǎn chá。

hanzi: 夏天时，山坡上长满了花草。
pinyin: xià tiān shí， shān pō shàng zhǎng mǎn le huā cǎo。
english: The hillside is covered by grass and flowers in summer.

pinyin: tā bì yè yú yī suǒ zhī míng de wài yǔ xué yuàn。

pinyin: tā yǐ jīng tōng guò le dà xué de rù xué kǎo shì。

hanzi: 我们很难观察月亮的另一边。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn nàn guān chá yuè liàng de lìng yī biān。
