english: We dare not look at her wistful eyes.

hanzi: 战争迫使我们不得不违背旧习俗。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng pò shǐ wǒ men bù dé bù wéi bèi jiù xí sú。
english: The war forced us to depart from the old customs.

hanzi: 有天晚上学校放映了一部西部片。
pinyin: yǒu tiān wǎn shang xué xiào fàng yìng le yī bù xī bù piàn。
english: One evening the school showed a cowboy film.

hanzi: 那位夫人带着满意的微笑看着我。
pinyin: nà wèi fū ren dài zhuó mǎn yì de wēi xiào kàn zhuó wǒ。
english: The lady looked at me with a contented smile.

hanzi: 他们的研究沿着正确的方针进行。
pinyin: tā men de yán jiū yán zhe zhèng què de fāng zhēn jìn xíng。
english: Their research proceeded along sound lines.

hanzi: 强迫推行一项政策不是办法。
pinyin: qiǎng pò tuī xíng yí xiàng zhèng cè bú shì bàn fǎ。
english: It is not the proper way to implement a policy by force.

hanzi: 狮子一走近，小动物们都跑开了。
pinyin: shī zi yī zǒu jìn， xiǎo dòng wù men dōu pǎo kāi le。
english: The lion's approach drove away the small animals.

hanzi: 我们得设计出三年级的新课程.
pinyin: wǒ men de shè jì chū sān nián jí de xīn kè chéng.
english: We shall have to design a new curriculum for the third year.

hanzi: 我们可以通过烧石灰石来得到石灰。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ tōng guò shāo shí huī shí lái dé dào shí huī。
english: We may burn limestone to obtain lime.

hanzi: 她是悄声说的，所以我没有听见。
pinyin: tā shì qiǎo shēng shuō de， suǒ yǐ wǒ méi yǒu tīng jiàn。
english: She said it in a whisper, so I didn't hear.

hanzi: 男孩子们已决定下个星期去露营。
pinyin: nán hái zǐ men yǐ jué dìng xià gè xīng qī qù lù yíng。
english: The boys have decided to go camping next week.

hanzi: 我把一个长方形的盒子放在桌子上。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ yī gè zhǎng fāng xíng de hé zi fàng zài zhuō zi shàng。
english: I put a rectangular box on the table.

hanzi: 土星是依次离太阳的第六颗行星。
pinyin: tǔ xīng shì yī cì lí tài yáng de dì liù kē xíng xīng。
english: Saturn is the planet sixth in order from the sun.

hanzi: 她母亲去世对她是个沉重的打击。
pinyin: tā mǔ qīn qù shì duì tā shì gè chén zhòng de dǎ jī。
english: It was a great blow to her when her mother died.

hanzi: 头上受了一击后，他昏过去了一会儿。
pinyin: tou shàng shòu le yī jī hòu， tā hūn guò qu le yī huìr。
english: The blow on the head dazed him for a moment.

hanzi: 他们从远处赶来参观这个展览会。
pinyin: tā men zòng yuǎn chù gǎn lái cān guān zhè gè zhǎn lǎn huì。
english: They came from afar to see the exhibition.

hanzi: 他退休后觉得自己年老无用了。
pinyin: tā tuì xiū hòu jué de zì jǐ nián lǎo wú yòng le。
english: When he retired he felt that he had outlived his usefulness.

hanzi: 这些项目是根据其重要性排列的。
pinyin: zhè xie xiàng mù shì gēn jù qí zhòng yào xìng pái liè de。
english: The items are listed in order of importance.

hanzi: 他们大声地为自己的足球队喊加油。
pinyin: tā men dà shēng de wèi zì jǐ de zú qiú duì hǎn jiā yóu。
english: They cheered loudly for their football team.

hanzi: 他答应星期五之前完成这项工作。
pinyin: tā dā ying xīng qī wǔ zhī qián wán chéng zhè xiàng gōng zuò。
english: He undertook to finish the job by Friday.

hanzi: 那位漂亮的女孩是一位时装模特儿。
pinyin: nà wèi piào liang de nu:3 hái shì yī wèi shí zhuāng mó tè er。
english: That beautiful girl is a fashion model.

hanzi: 如果我现在不走，就赶不上火车了。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ xiàn zài bù zǒu， jiù gǎn bù shàng huǒ chē le。
english: If I don't go now, I will miss the train.

hanzi: 他的热情给公司注入了新的生命。
pinyin: tā de rè qíng jǐ gōng sī zhù rù le xīn de shēng mìng。
english: His enthusiasm breathed new life into the company.

hanzi: 本班男生的平均年龄是十五岁。
pinyin: běn bān nán shēng de píng jūn nián líng shì shí wǔ suì。
english: The average age of the boys in this class is fifteen.

hanzi: 他冒着自己的生命危险救了我的命。
pinyin: tā mào zhuó zì jǐ de shēng mìng wēi xiǎn jiù le wǒ de mìng。
english: He saved my life at the risk of his own.

hanzi: 他的严重的错误导致了重大的损失。
pinyin: tā de yán zhòng de cuò wù dǎo zhì le zhòng dà de sǔn shī。
english: His costly mistake resulted in severe loss.

hanzi: 转寄给我们的邮件晚了很久才拿到。
pinyin: zhuàn jì jǐ wǒ men de yóu jiàn wǎn le hěn jiǔ cái ná dào。
english: There was a long lag in forwarding mail to us.

hanzi: 他是那些天文学家中最优秀的一个。
pinyin: tā shì nà xiē tiān wén xué jiā zhòng zuì yōu xiù de yī gè。
english: He is the best one of those astronomers.

hanzi: 他摇摇头，因为他的想法与此不同。
pinyin: tā yáo yáo tou， yīn wèi tā de xiǎng fǎ yù cǐ bù tóng。
english: He shook his head, for he thought differently.

hanzi: 我儿子六岁的时候开始学习乘法。
pinyin: wǒ ér zi liù suì de shí hou kāi shǐ xué xí chéng fǎ。
english: My son began to study multiplication when he was six.

hanzi: 他们正准备上演新的歌舞喜剧。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zhǔn bèi shàng yǎn xīn de gē wǔ xǐ jù。
english: They are preparing for the presentation of a new musical.

hanzi: 学习英语口语不只是玩游戏而已。
pinyin: xué xí Yīng yǔ kǒu yǔ bù zhǐ shì wàn yóu xì ér yǐ。
english: Spoken English learning is not all beer and skittle.

hanzi: 对不起，对方的电话好象坏了。
pinyin: duì bù qǐ， duì fāng de diàn huà hǎo xiàng huài le。
english: I'm sorry, caller, their telephone seems to be broken.

hanzi: 我儿子六岁的时候开始学习乘法。
pinyin: wǒ ér zi liù suì de shí hou kāi shǐ xué xí chéng fǎ。
english: My son began to study multiplication when he was six.

hanzi: 我的起居室的墙上挂着一块壁毯。
pinyin: wǒ de qǐ jū shì de qiáng shàng guà zhuó yī kuài bì tǎn。
english: The wall of my living room was hung with a tapestry.

hanzi: 小学教育受地方政府的保护。
pinyin: xiǎo xué jiào yù shòu dì fang zhèng fǔ de bǎo hù。
english: Primary education comes under the umbrella of local government.

hanzi: 在这张画像中画著他躺在沙发上。
pinyin: zài zhè zhāng huà xiàng zhòng huà著 tā tǎng zài shā fā shàng。
english: In the portrait he is shown lying on a sofa.

hanzi: 干燥的天气之后，人人都希望下雨。
pinyin: gān zào de tiān qì zhī hòu， rén rén dōu xī wàng xià yǔ。
english: After these dry days, everyone hopes for rain.

hanzi: 我用一个纸夹把那几页纸夹在一起。
pinyin: wǒ yòng yī gè zhǐ jiā bǎ nà jǐ yè zhǐ jiā zài yī qǐ。
english: I fastened the pages together with a paperclip.

hanzi: 生日晚会之后, 房间里一片混乱。
pinyin: shēng rì wǎn huì zhī hòu,  fáng jiān lǐ yī piàn hùn luàn。
english: The room was in confusion after the birthday party.

hanzi: 这位医生受到所有人的高度赞扬。
pinyin: zhè wèi yī shēng shòu dào suǒ yǒu rén de gāo dù zàn yáng。
english: This doctor received high praise from everyone.

hanzi: 别胡闹了，快来帮我把这个抬起来。
pinyin: biè hú nào le， kuài lái bāng wǒ bǎ zhè gè tái qǐ lái。
english: Stop playing silly buggers and help me lift this.

hanzi: 孩子将玩具汽车两端相连摆在一起.
pinyin: hái zi jiàng wán jù qì chē liǎng duān xiāng lián bǎi zài yī qǐ.
english: The child put the toy cars together endways.

hanzi: 在春天里听鸟儿歌唱是一种乐趣。
pinyin: zài chūn tiān lǐ tìng niǎo ér gē chàng shì yī zhòng lè qù。
english: It's a pleasure to hear birds' warble in spring.

hanzi: 那是个复杂得无法解决的问题。
pinyin: nà shì gè fù zá de wú fǎ jiě jué de wèn tí。
english: It's a problem of such perplexity that it was impossible to solve.

hanzi: 他已学了足够的德语来进行会话。
pinyin: tā yǐ xué le zú gòu de dé yǔ lái jìn xíng huì huà。
english: He had learned enough German to carry on a conversation.

hanzi: 不加奶的咖啡在嘴里留下了一些苦味.
pinyin: bù jiā nǎi de kā fēi zài zuǐ lǐ liú xià le yī xiē kǔ wèi.
english: Black coffee leaves a bitter taste in the mouth.

hanzi: 他是那些天文学家中最优秀的一个。
pinyin: tā shì nà xiē tiān wén xué jiā zhòng zuì yōu xiù de yī gè。
english: He is the best one of those astronomers.

hanzi: 最后他终于成功地解决了这个问题。
pinyin: zuì hòu tā zhōng yú chéng gōng de jiě jué le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: At last he successfully solved the problem.

hanzi: 她踩着他受伤的脚，他疼得缩了回去。
pinyin: tā cǎi zhuó tā shòu shāng de jué， tā téng de suō le huí qu。
english: He winced as she stood on his injured foot.

hanzi: 我已经在这个旅馆里预订了一个房间。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zài zhè gè lu:3 guǎn lǐ yù dìng le yī gè fáng jiān。
english: I have engaged a room at this hotel.

hanzi: 她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
pinyin: tā bǎo chí zhuó zhǎng jù lí yóu yǒng de shì jiè jì lù。
english: She holds the world record for long distance swimming.

hanzi: 这家饭店除星期一外, 每天都营业.
pinyin: zhè jiā fàn diàn chú xīng qī yī wài,  měi tiān dōu yíng yè.
english: The restaurant is open every day except Monday.

hanzi: 我拿起了那把刀，把它扔到了窗外。
pinyin: wǒ ná qǐ le nà bǎ dāo， bǎ tā rēng dào le chuāng wài。
english: I picked up the knife and threw it out of the window.

hanzi: 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。
pinyin: tā duì yǒu yì yǒu yī zhòng fēi cháng dú tè de jiàn jiě。
english: He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship.

hanzi: 中国和许多国家进行多方面贸易。
pinyin: Zhōng guó huò xǔ duō guó jiā jìn xíng duō fāng miàn mào yì。
english: China does a lot of trade with many countries.

hanzi: 他爸爸坚持他们应该搬到乡下。
pinyin: tā bà ba jiān chí tā men yīng gāi bān dào xiāng xià。
english: His father insisted that they (should) move to the country.

hanzi: 简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
pinyin: jiǎn dān pǔ sù de yī fu shì hé zài xué xiào lǐ chuān。
english: Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.

hanzi: 我们需要一个更为灵活的外交政策。
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào yī gè gèng wèi líng huó de wài jiāo zhèng cè。
english: We need a foreign policy that is more flexible.

hanzi: 我们跟服务员争执那顿饭的价钱.
pinyin: wǒ men gēn fú wù yuán zhēng zhí nà dùn fàn de jià qian.
english: We argued with the waiter about the price of the meal.

hanzi: 简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
pinyin: jiǎn dān pǔ sù de yī fu shì hé zài xué xiào lǐ chuān。
english: Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.

hanzi: 她穿那些衣服也并没显得更漂亮。
pinyin: tā chuān nà xiē yī fu yě bìng mò xiǎn de gèng piào liang。
english: Those clothes do nothing to enhance her appearance.

hanzi: 这条河很宽，足以使很多船通过。
pinyin: zhè tiáo hé hěn kuān， zú yǐ shǐ hěn duō chuán tōng guò。
english: The waterway is wide for many ships to pass through.

hanzi: 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。
pinyin: zhè běn shū shì tā yǐ qián xiě de jù běn de kuò chōng。
english: This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before.

hanzi: 我连移动双脚的力气都几乎没有了。
pinyin: wǒ lián yí dòng shuāng jué de lì qi dōu jī hū méi yǒu le。
english: I have hardly enough strength left to move my feet.

hanzi: 我认为秋天是一年中最美的季节。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi qiū tiān shì yī nián zhòng zuì měi de jì jié。
english: I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.

hanzi: 他们不敢走入森林中阴暗的深处。
pinyin: tā men bù gǎn zǒu rù sēn lín zhòng yīn àn de shēn chù。
english: They dare not walk into the shadowy depths of the forest.

hanzi: 公众强烈反对修建该机场。
pinyin: gōng zhòng qiáng liè fǎn duì xiū jiàn gāi jī chǎng。
english: There was a great outcry about the construction of the new airport.

hanzi: 他们不敢走入森林中阴暗的深处。
pinyin: tā men bù gǎn zǒu rù sēn lín zhòng yīn àn de shēn chù。
english: They dare not walk into the shadowy depths of the forest.

hanzi: 逐字翻译不一定最接近原义。
pinyin: zhú zì fān yì bù yī dìng zuì jiē jìn yuán yì。
english: A literal translation is not always the closest to the original meaning.

hanzi: 她的孩子有一双美丽而明亮的蓝眼睛。
pinyin: tā de hái zi yǒu yī shuāng měi lì ér míng liàng de lán yǎn jīng。
english: Her baby has bonny and bright blue eyes.

hanzi: 她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
pinyin: tā bǎo chí zhuó zhǎng jù lí yóu yǒng de shì jiè jì lù。
english: She holds the world record for long distance swimming.

hanzi: 寒冷的冬天，我们不得不穿毛织品。
pinyin: hán lěng de dōng tiān， wǒ men bù dé bù chuān máo zhī pǐn。
english: We have to wear woolen clothes in the cold winter.

hanzi: 他收拾行李，让我们等了好半天。
pinyin: tā shōu shi xíng li， ràng wǒ men děng le hào bàn tiān。
english: He kept us waiting for ages while he packed his luggage.

hanzi: 详细的资料可从我们的总部得到。
pinyin: xiáng xì de zī liào kě zòng wǒ men de zǒng bù dé dào。
english: Further information can be obtained from our head office.

hanzi: 北京广播电台向全世界播送新闻。
pinyin: Běi jīng guǎng bō diàn tái xiàng quán shì jiè bō sòng xīn wén。
english: Radio Beijing sends the news all over the world.

hanzi: 这家旅馆为旅客提供订票服务。
pinyin: zhè jiā lu:3 guǎn wèi lu:3 kè tí gōng dìng piào fú wù。
english: The hotel provides a reservation of tickets for its residents.

hanzi: 今天的天气已露出了一丝秋天的气息。
pinyin: jīn tiān de tiān qì yǐ lù chū le yī sī qiū tiān de qì xī。
english: There is a breath of autumn in the air today.

hanzi: 我们既不将打篮球也不将打排球。
pinyin: wǒ men jì bù jiàng dǎ lán qiú yě bù jiàng dǎ pái qiú。
english: We are going to play neither basketball nor volleyball.

hanzi: 我有一件红色的有羊毛衬里的运动服。
pinyin: wǒ yǒu yī jiàn hóng sè de yǒu yáng máo chèn lǐ de yùn dòng fú。
english: I have a red tracksuit with fleecy lining.

hanzi: 她送我的纪念品很小而且不值钱。
pinyin: tā sòng wǒ de jì niàn pǐn hěn xiǎo ér qiě bù zhí qián。
english: The keepsake she gave me is small and not very costly.

hanzi: 她一走进剧院就引起了一阵兴奋。
pinyin: tā yī zǒu jìn jù yuàn jiù yǐn qǐ le yī zhèn xīng fèn。
english: There was a stir of excitement as she entered the theatre.

hanzi: 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。
pinyin: běn shì jì wǒ men yǐ jīng jīng lì le liǎng cì shì jiè dà zhàn。
english: We have had two world wars in this century.

hanzi: 尽管我努力劝说，他还是不同意。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn wǒ nǔ lì quàn shuō， tā hái shì bù tóng yì。
english: In spite of my efforts at persuasion, he wouldn't agree.

hanzi: 正方形有四条边，而圆形没有边。
pinyin: zhèng fāng xíng yǒu sì tiáo biān， ér yuán xíng méi yǒu biān。
english: A square has four sides but a circle has no sides.

hanzi: 他听到身后有响声，便转过身来。
pinyin: tā tīng dào shēn hòu yǒu xiǎng shēng， pián zhuàn guò shēn lái。
english: He turned around as he heard a noise behind him.

hanzi: 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。
pinyin: běn shì jì wǒ men yǐ jīng jīng lì le liǎng cì shì jiè dà zhàn。
english: We have had two world wars in this century.

hanzi: 人民的生活水平明显地改善了。
pinyin: rén mín de shēng huó shuǐ píng míng xiǎn de gǎi shàn le。
english: People's living standard has had a perceptible improvement.

hanzi: 您被邀请参观我们的秋季时装展览。
pinyin: nín bèi yāo qǐng cān guān wǒ men de qiū jì shí zhuāng zhǎn lǎn。
english: You are invited to view our autumn collection.

hanzi: 假如我要做新衣服，需要很多布料。
pinyin: jiǎ rú wǒ yào zuò xīn yī fu， xū yào hěn duō bù liào。
english: I need a lot of cloth if I want to make a new dress.

hanzi: 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。
pinyin: wǒ gāng hǎo jí shí dào kuài， cái suàn mò shòu zé bèi。
english: I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting.

hanzi: 我们的假日过得好无聊，每天都下雨。
pinyin: wǒ men de jià rì guò de hào wú liáo， měi tiān dōu xià yǔ。
english: We had a mouldy holiday - it rained every day.

hanzi: 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。
pinyin: wǒ gāng hǎo jí shí dào kuài， cái suàn mò shòu zé bèi。
english: I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting.

hanzi: 我每天至少要把厨房地板擦洗一次。
pinyin: wǒ měi tiān zhì shǎo yào bǎ chú fáng dì bǎn cā xǐ yī cì。
english: I have to mop the kitchen floor at least once a day.

hanzi: 他对学校课外活动一点也不积极。
pinyin: tā duì xué xiào kè wài huó dòng yī diǎn yě bù jī jí。
english: He doesn't take an active part in many school activities.

hanzi: 我清楚地告诉他，我拒绝了他的建议。
pinyin: wǒ qīng chu de gào su tā， wǒ jù jué le tā de jiàn yì。
english: I made it clear to him that I rejected his proposal.

hanzi: 目前似乎好的年轻选手太少了。
pinyin: mù qián sì hu hǎo de nián qīng xuǎn shǒu tài shào le。
english: There seems to be a dearth of good young players at the moment.

hanzi: 她的孩子有一双美丽而明亮的蓝眼睛。
pinyin: tā de hái zi yǒu yī shuāng měi lì ér míng liàng de lán yǎn jīng。
english: Her baby has bonny and bright blue eyes.

hanzi: 这位老师给他的学生们定下高标准。
pinyin: zhè wèi lǎo shī jǐ tā de xué sheng men dìng xià gāo biāo zhǔn。
english: The teacher sets high standard for his pupils.

hanzi: 我认为秋天是一年中最美的季节。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi qiū tiān shì yī nián zhòng zuì měi de jì jié。
english: I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.

hanzi: 海洋几乎占地球表面的四分之三。
pinyin: hǎi yáng jī hū zhàn dì qiú biǎo miàn de sì fēn zhī sān。
english: The sea covers nearly three-fourths of the world's surface.

hanzi: 寒冷的冬天，我们不得不穿毛织品。
pinyin: hán lěng de dōng tiān， wǒ men bù dé bù chuān máo zhī pǐn。
english: We have to wear woolen clothes in the cold winter.

hanzi: 很多农民离开农村转事工业劳动.
pinyin: hěn duō nóng mín lí kāi nóng cūn zhuàn shì gōng yè láo dòng.
english: Many farmers are leaving the land to work in industry.

hanzi: 只有一个人能做这项工作，那就是你。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu yī gè rén néng zuò zhè xiàng gōng zuò， nà jiù shì nǐ。
english: Only one person can do the job, namely you.

hanzi: 人们误以为选修语言课程较轻松“
pinyin: rén men wù yǐ wéi xuǎn xiū yǔ yán kè chéng jiào qīng sōng“
english: Language courses are wrongly thought to be soft options.

hanzi: 他在我背上拍了一下，请我去喝酒。
pinyin: tā zài wǒ bèi shàng pāi le yī xià， qǐng wǒ qù hē jiǔ。
english: He gave me a clap on the back and invited me for a drink.

hanzi: 该学院采用新的外语教学法。
pinyin: gāi xué yuàn cǎi yòng xīn de wài yǔ jiào xué fǎ。
english: New methods of teaching foreign languages are adopted in this institute.

hanzi: 他们看见了灯塔发出一闪一灭的光。
pinyin: tā men kàn jiàn le dēng tǎ fā chū yī shǎn yī miè de guāng。
english: They saw the intermittent flashes from a lighthouse.

hanzi: 尽管我俩相貌不同，但都讨人喜欢。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn wǒ liǎng xiàng mào bù tóng， dàn dōu tǎo rén xǐ huan。
english: Although our looks differ, we are both attractive.

hanzi: 这部小说引起了千万读者的想象。
pinyin: zhè bù xiǎo shuō yǐn qǐ le qiān wàn dú zhě de xiǎng xiàng。
english: The novel captured the imagination of thousands of readers.

hanzi: 看到这个小女孩哭起来，他的心软了。
pinyin: kàn dào zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái kū qǐ lai， tā de xīn ruǎn le。
english: His heart melted when he saw the little girl crying.

hanzi: 早晨很冷，他穿上了一件厚毛衣。
pinyin: zǎo chén hěn lěng， tā chuān shàng le yī jiàn hòu máo yī。
english: He put on a thick sweater since it was cold in the morning.

hanzi: 练习开始前，你最好设定一个目标。
pinyin: liàn xí kāi shǐ qián， nǐ zuì hǎo shè dìng yī gè mù biāo。
english: You'd better set a goal before you start the drill.

hanzi: 他的脚在一块碎玻璃上划了一个大口子。
pinyin: tā de jué zài yī kuài suì bō li shàng huà le yī gè dà kǒu zi。
english: He gashed his foot on a piece of broken glass.

hanzi: 这两种颜色之间的差别很难区别。
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng yán sè zhī jiān de chā bié hěn nàn qū bié。
english: The difference between the two colors is imperceptible.

hanzi: 两国关系已达到出现危机的地步。
pinyin: liǎng guó guān xi yǐ dá dào chū xiàn wēi jī de dì bù。
english: Relation between the two countries has reached a crisis point.

hanzi: 我只好解释原因来满足他的好奇心。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ hǎo jiě shì yuán yīn lái mǎn zú tā de hào qí xīn。
english: I had to explain the reasons to satisfy his curiosity.

hanzi: 学习外语女孩总是比男孩强.
pinyin: xué xí wài yǔ nu:3 hái zǒng shì bì nán hái qiáng.
english: In learning foreign languages, the girls knock spots off the boys every time.

hanzi: 把被单好好煮一煮，好让它们白一些。
pinyin: bǎ bèi shàn hǎo hǎo zhǔ yī zhǔ， hào ràng tā men bái yī xiē。
english: Give the sheets a good boil to get them white.

hanzi: 新学期开学前，我一直无所事事。
pinyin: xīn xué qī kāi xué qián， wǒ yī zhí wú suǒ shì shì。
english: I'm just kicking my heels until the beginning of the new term.

hanzi: 我们的文艺必须为大众所喜闻乐见。
pinyin: wǒ men de wén yì bì xū wèi dà zhòng suǒ xǐ wén yuè xiàn。
english: Our literature and art ought to cater to popular taste.

hanzi: 他们试图预测这场足球比赛的结果。
pinyin: tā men shì tú yù cè zhè chǎng zú qiú bǐ sài de jié guǒ。
english: They tried to forecast the result of the football match.

hanzi: 人们应经常洗澡以保证个人卫生。
pinyin: rén men yìng jīng cháng xǐ zǎo yǐ bǎo zhèng gè rén wèi shēng。
english: People should wash regularly to ensure personal hygiene.

hanzi: 父亲给我买了一只小狗作为生日礼物。
pinyin: fù qīn jǐ wǒ mǎi le yī zhǐ xiǎo gǒu zuò wéi shēng rì lǐ wù。
english: My father bought me a puppy as a birthday gift.

hanzi: 他的病较医生原来以为的更严重。
pinyin: tā de bìng jiào yī shēng yuán lái yǐ wéi de gèng yán zhòng。
english: His illness was more serious than the doctor first thought.

hanzi: 父亲给我买了一只小狗作为生日礼物。
pinyin: fù qīn jǐ wǒ mǎi le yī zhǐ xiǎo gǒu zuò wéi shēng rì lǐ wù。
english: My father bought me a puppy as a birthday gift.

hanzi: 他们试图预测这场足球比赛的结果。
pinyin: tā men shì tú yù cè zhè chǎng zú qiú bǐ sài de jié guǒ。
english: They tried to forecast the result of the football match.

hanzi: 那家剧院得到了艺术委员会的赞助。
pinyin: nà jiā jù yuàn dé dào le yì shù wěi yuán huì de zàn zhù。
english: The theatre is under the patronage of the Arts Council.

hanzi: 她父亲很严厉，他从来没有表扬过她。
pinyin: tā fù qīn hěn yán lì， tā cóng lái méi yǒu biǎo yáng guò tā。
english: She had a stern father who never praised her.

hanzi: 政府对工会表现得越来越不耐烦。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì gōng huì biǎo xiàn de yuè lái yuè bù nài fán。
english: The governments showed growing impatience at the unions.

hanzi: 下课后，班长把练习册收了起来。
pinyin: xià kè hòu， bān zhǎng bǎ liàn xí cè shōu le qǐ lai。
english: The monitor collected the exercise books after the class was over.

hanzi: 那小猫爬到树上却不敢下来。
pinyin: nà xiǎo māo pá dào shù shàng què bù gǎn xia lai。
english: The little cat climbed to the top of the tree and became afraid to get down.

hanzi: 管理部门采取了一切合理的安全措施。
pinyin: guǎn lǐ bù mén cǎi qǔ le yī qiè hé lǐ de ān quán cuò shī。
english: The management took all reasonable safety precautions.

hanzi: 考试之前，我们复习一学期的功课。
pinyin: kǎo shì zhī qián， wǒ men fù xí yī xué qī de gōng kè。
english: Before the examination we have a review of the term's work.

hanzi: 我一直抬那些重东西, 现在腰都痛了.
pinyin: wǒ yī zhí tái nà xiē zhòng dōng xi,  xiàn zài yāo dōu tòng le.
english: All that heavy lifting has given me a pain in the back.

hanzi: 我们需要几个男子作心理学实验对象.
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào jǐ ge nán zǐ zuò xīn lǐ xué shí yàn duì xiàng.
english: We need some male subjects for a psychology experiment.

hanzi: 这个花园离市中心只有五分钟的路程。
pinyin: zhè gè huā yuán lí shì zhōng xīn zhǐ yǒu wǔ fēn zhōng de lù chéng。
english: The park is only five minutes from downtown.

hanzi: 树叶已开始变色，很快就是冬天了。
pinyin: shù yè yǐ kāi shǐ biàn sè， hěn kuài jiù shì dōng tiān le。
english: The leaves have started to color; it will soon be winter.

hanzi: 人民群众普遍反对突然实行的变革。
pinyin: rén mín qún zhòng pǔ biàn fǎn duì tū rán shí xíng de biàn gé。
english: The populace at large are opposed to sudden change.

hanzi: 那个地方在地图上以十字形记号标出。
pinyin: nèi gè dì fang zài dì tú shàng yǐ shí zì xíng jì hao biāo chū。
english: The place is marked on the map with a crossing.

hanzi: 那时我不在家，所以由我女儿招待客人。
pinyin: nà shí wǒ bù zài jiā， suǒ yǐ yóu wǒ nu:3 ér zhāo dài kè ren。
english: I went away so my daughter acted as hostess.

hanzi: 这件事情对社会造成了有害的影响。
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì qing duì shè huì zào chéng le yǒu hài de yǐng xiǎng。
english: This event had a pernicious influence on society.

hanzi: 我们复制了计算机磁盘以防意外。
pinyin: wǒ men fù zhì le jì suàn jī cí pán yǐ fáng yì wài。
english: We make copies of our computer disks as a safeguard against accidents.

hanzi: 这一经验为他的思想开阔了新的视野。
pinyin: zhè yī jīng yàn wèi tā de sī xiǎng kāi kuò le xīn de shì yě。
english: This experience opened a new prospect in his mind.

hanzi: 盒上印有装配模型的简要说明.
pinyin: hé shàng yìn yǒu zhuāng pèi mó xíng de jiǎn yào shuō míng.
english: Simple directions for assembling the model are printed on the box.

hanzi: 我会陪在你身边，就象我答应你的那样。
pinyin: wǒ kuài péi zài nǐ shēn biān， jiù xiàng wǒ dā ying nǐ de nà yàng。
english: I will be at your side, as I promised you.

hanzi: 你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题。
pinyin: nǐ de jīng cǎi bào gào yǐn chū le jǐ ge zhòng yào wèn tí。
english: Your interesting report raises several important queries.

hanzi: 群众高声喊叫把演讲人的声音压了下去。
pinyin: qún zhòng gāo shēng hǎn jiào bǎ yǎn jiǎng rén de shēng yīn yà le xià qu。
english: The crowd shouted the speaker down.

hanzi: 下课后，班长把练习册收了起来。
pinyin: xià kè hòu， bān zhǎng bǎ liàn xí cè shōu le qǐ lai。
english: The monitor collected the exercise books after the class was over.

hanzi: 他的病较医生原来以为的更严重。
pinyin: tā de bìng jiào yī shēng yuán lái yǐ wéi de gèng yán zhòng。
english: His illness was more serious than the doctor first thought.

hanzi: 你不应该让士兵们冒不必要的危险。
pinyin: nǐ bù yīng gāi ràng shì bīng men mào bú bì yào de wēi xiǎn。
english: You shouldn't expose the soldiers to unnecessary risks.

hanzi: 等到我得知这项决定时，已经太迟了。
pinyin: děng dào wǒ dé zhī zhè xiàng jué dìng shí， yǐ jīng tài chí le。
english: I wasn't informed of the decision until too late.

hanzi: 我在七点钟的新闻报道中听到了这则消息。
pinyin: wǒ zài qī diǎn zhōng de xīn wén bào dào zhòng tīng dào le zhè zé xiāo xi。
english: I heard it on the 7 o'clock news.

hanzi: 对我来说，拥有一辆汽车的花费太大。
pinyin: duì wǒ lái shuō， yōng yǒu yī liàng qì chē de huā fèi tài dà。
english: It's too much of an expense for me to own a car.

hanzi: 乘客们拥挤在火车站上等候乘车。
pinyin: chéng kè men yōng jǐ zài huǒ chē zhàn shàng děng hòu chéng chē。
english: Passengers thronged the station waiting for their trains.

hanzi: 孩子们表演完后，大人们鼓掌。
pinyin: hái zi men biǎo yǎn wán hòu， dà ren men gǔ zhǎng。
english: The grown-ups applauded after the children had finished their performance.

hanzi: 诗人造了几个词典里找不到的词。
pinyin: shī rén zào le jǐ ge cí diǎn lǐ zhǎo bù dào de cí。
english: The poet minted several words that cannot be found in any dictionary.

hanzi: 他从道理上解释了这个老人的行为。
pinyin: tā zòng dào lǐ shàng jiě shì le zhè gè lǎo rén de xíng wéi。
english: He explained the behavior of the old man within reason.

hanzi: 管理部门采取了一切合理的安全措施。
pinyin: guǎn lǐ bù mén cǎi qǔ le yī qiè hé lǐ de ān quán cuò shī。
english: The management took all reasonable safety precautions.

hanzi: 两村相距一英里, 我家在中间.
pinyin: liǎng cūn xiàng jù yī yīng lǐ,  wǒ jiā zài zhōng jiān.
english: The two villages are a mile apart, and my house lies midway between them.

hanzi: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行。
pinyin: yǒu guān huán jìng de huì yì jiàng zài xià zhōu yī jǔ xíng。
english: The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday.

hanzi: 几乎所有的成员都同意这项提议。
pinyin: jī hū suǒ yǒu de chéng yuán dōu tóng yì zhè xiàng tí yì。
english: Virtually all the members were in agreement with the proposal.

hanzi: 尽管他大声喊叫，却没有人来帮助他。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā dà shēng hǎn jiào， què méi yǒu rén lái bāng zhù tā。
english: Despite his cries no one came to his assistance.

hanzi: 他伸出手去，保护他的孩子免受伤害。
pinyin: tā shēn chū shǒu qù， bǎo hù tā de hái zi miǎn shòu shāng hài。
english: He raised his arm to protect his child from hurt.

hanzi: 担任主席的人有责任安排会议。
pinyin: dān rèn zhǔ xí de rén yǒu zé rèn ān pái huì yì。
english: The holder of the office of chairman is responsible for arranging meetings.

hanzi: 对他来说，生活似乎已失去了一切乐趣。
pinyin: duì tā lái shuō， shēng huó sì hu yǐ shī qù le yī qiè lè qù。
english: Life seems to have lost most of its savor for him.

hanzi: 我们昨天碰到的那个老工人是李师傅。
pinyin: wǒ men zuó tiān pèng dào de nèi gè lǎo gōng rén shì lǐ shī fu。
english: The old worker whom we met yesterday is Master Li.

hanzi: 他的政治观点在两个极端之间摇摆不定.
pinyin: tā de zhèng zhì guān diǎn zài liǎng gè jí duān zhī jiān yáo bǎi bù dìng.
english: He oscillates between political extremes.

hanzi: 他们奖给优胜者一些水果和鲜花。
pinyin: tā men jiǎng jǐ yōu shèng zhě yī xiē shuǐ guǒ huò xiān huā。
english: They rewarded the winners with gifts of fruits and flowers.

hanzi: 这家公司希望把新工厂设在河边。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī xī wàng bǎ xīn gōng chǎng shè zài hé biān。
english: The company wished to locate its new factory beside the river.

hanzi: 他收集的邮票是我的三倍还不止。
pinyin: tā shōu jí de yóu piào shì wǒ de sān bèi huán bù zhǐ。
english: He has collected more than three times as many stamps as I (have).

hanzi: 我们应充分利用丰富的人力资源。
pinyin: wǒ men yìng chōng fèn lì yòng fēng fù de rén lì zī yuán。
english: We shall take full advantage of our rich source of human beings.

hanzi: 我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi shǐ yòng wú yān méi yǐ fáng zhǐ kōng qì wū rǎn。
english: We should use anthracite to avoid air pollution.

hanzi: 我们除了同意他们之外，没有别的选择。
pinyin: wǒ men chú le tóng yì tā men zhī wài， méi yǒu bié de xuǎn zé。
english: We have no other choice than to agree with them.

hanzi: 把你的名字填写在每页上端的括号内。
pinyin: bǎ nǐ de míng zi tián xiě zài měi yè shàng duān de kuò hào nèi。
english: Put your name in brackets at the top of each page.

hanzi: 请把窗子弄干净，我几乎看不到外面。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ chuāng zǐ nòng gān jìng， wǒ jī hū kàn bù dào wài mian。
english: Please clean the window as I can hardly see out.

hanzi: 离开学校后，他成为一名建筑工人。
pinyin: lí kāi xué xiào hòu， tā chéng wéi yī míng jiàn zhù gōng rén。
english: He became a construction worker after he left school.

hanzi: 我们应该使用无烟煤以防止空气污染。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi shǐ yòng wú yān méi yǐ fáng zhǐ kōng qì wū rǎn。
english: We should use anthracite to avoid air pollution.

hanzi: 这张唱片非常成功，卖了一百万张。
pinyin: zhè zhāng chàng piàn fēi cháng chéng gōng， mài le yī bǎi wàn zhāng。
english: The record was a big hit and sold a million copies.

hanzi: 想过舒适的生活不过是普通人的本性。
pinyin: xiǎng guò shū shì de shēng huó bù guò shì pǔ tōng rén de běn xìng。
english: It's only human nature to want a comfortable life.

hanzi: 这张唱片非常成功，卖了一百万张。
pinyin: zhè zhāng chàng piàn fēi cháng chéng gōng， mài le yī bǎi wàn zhāng。
english: The record was a big hit and sold a million copies.

hanzi: 这家商店因公平交易而获好名声。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn yīn gōng píng jiāo yì ér huò hào míng shēng。
english: This store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.

hanzi: 中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。
pinyin: Zhōng guó shì yī gè yǒu zhe yōu jiǔ lì shǐ de dōng fāng guó jiā。
english: China is an oriental country with a long history.

hanzi: 我觉得我没有勇气告诉他这个坏消息。
pinyin: wǒ jué de wǒ méi yǒu yǒng qì gào su tā zhè gè huài xiāo xi。
english: I don't think I have the courage to tell him the bad news.

hanzi: 我很忙，所以不得不中断每周的访问。
pinyin: wǒ hěn máng， suǒ yǐ bù dé bù zhōng duàn měi zhōu de fǎng wèn。
english: I'm so busy that I have to discontinue weekly visits.

hanzi: 在一些问题上，他仍然保留自己的意见。
pinyin: zài yī xiē wèn tí shàng， tā réng rán bǎo liú zì jǐ de yì jiàn。
english: He still reserved his opinion on some points.

hanzi: 我答应一定完好无损地还你的自行车。
pinyin: wǒ dā ying yī dìng wán hǎo wú sǔn de huán nǐ de zì xíng chē。
english: I promise to return your bicycle on good condition.

pinyin: tā shuō wán huà， jiē zhe shì yī duàn yì wèi shēn zhǎng de tíng dùn。

hanzi: 他们对办理的每项业务收取一定的费用。
pinyin: tā men duì bàn lǐ de měi xiàng yè wù shōu qǔ yī dìng de fèi yòng。
english: They charge a fixed rate for each transaction.

hanzi: 她和她姐姐外貌相似，但性格不同。
pinyin: tā huò tā jiě jie wài mào xiāng sì， dàn xìng gé bù tóng。
english: She resembles her sister in appearance but not in character.

pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī xī wàng bǎ xīn gōng chǎng shè zài hé biān。

english: She sent her little son to a nursery when she was working.

english: She lay at the side of the pool and paddled in the water with her fingers.

hanzi: 他说完话，接着是一段意味深长的停顿。
pinyin: tā shuō wán huà， jiē zhe shì yī duàn yì wèi shēn zhǎng de tíng dùn。

english: Despite all our efforts we still lost the game.

hanzi: 他在物理学方面已经取得了巨大成就。

hanzi: 她用一张面巾纸擦掉脸上的汗水。
pinyin: tā yòng yī zhāng miàn jīn zhǐ cā diào liǎn shàng de hàn shuǐ。

pinyin: rú zài shì qū diàn chē huò gōng jū shàng zhǎo jǐ gù kè de líng qián
english: The fare charged a passenger, as on a streetcar or bus.

hanzi: 别那样对我大声嚷嚷，我能听清楚。

english: Flying across the Atlantic for the first time was a great achievement.

hanzi: 我因有约在先，所以未能参加这个会。
pinyin: wǒ yīn yǒu yuē zài xiān， suǒ yǐ wèi néng cān jiā zhè gè kuài。
english: I was unable to attend the meeting because of a prior engagement.

hanzi: 他在面对危险的时候表现出非凡的勇气。
pinyin: tā zài miàn duì wēi xiǎn de shí hou biǎo xiàn chū fēi fán de yǒng qì。
english: He showed remarkable courage when he faced the danger.

hanzi: 我得把电话号码记下来，以免待会儿忘记。
pinyin: wǒ de bǎ diàn huà hào mǎ jì xia lai， yǐ miǎn dài kuài er wàng jì。
english: I'll just jot down their phone number before I forget it.

hanzi: 我喜欢滑雪, 同时也知道这非常危险。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan huá xuě,  tóng shí yě zhī dào zhè fēi cháng wēi xiǎn。
english: I like skiing and in the meantime, I know it is very dangerous.

hanzi: 我们应该多吃一些富含纤维素的绿色蔬菜。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi duō jí yī xiē fù hán xiān wéi sù de lu:4 sè shū cài。
english: We should eat more green vegetables rich in cellulose.

hanzi: 请假离开办公室之后我赶紧去了医院。
pinyin: qǐng jià lí kāi bàn gōng shì zhī hòu wǒ gǎn jǐn qù le yī yuàn。
english: After asking off my office, I went to the hospital immediately.

hanzi: 他体重减了很多, 比以前轻了三公斤.
pinyin: tā tǐ zhòng jiǎn le hěn duō,  bì yǐ qián qīng le sān gōng jīn.
english: He's lost a lot of weight: he's three kilos lighter than he used to be.

hanzi: 自从他去年夏天离去, 我们就失去了联系。
pinyin: zì cóng tā qù nián xià tiān lí qù,  wǒ men jiù shī qù le lián xì。
english: We have lost contact with him since he left last summer.

hanzi: 检查者对所有受害者的朋友进行了调查。
pinyin: jiǎn chá zhě duì suǒ yǒu shòu hài zhě de péng you jìn xíng le diào chá。
english: The checker made a check on all the victims' friends.

hanzi: 在这张粉红色纸条上写下你的姓名和地址。
pinyin: zài zhè zhāng fěn hóng sè zhǐ tiáo shàng xiě xià nǐ de xìng míng huò dì zhǐ。
english: Write your name and address on this pink slip.

hanzi: 他用自来水龙头流出的凉水把手洗干净。
pinyin: tā yòng zì lái shuǐ lóng tóu liú chū de liáng shuǐ bǎ shǒu xǐ gān jìng。
english: He cleaned his hands in the cold water from the tap.

hanzi: 他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划。
pinyin: tā yòng jìn yī qiè yǐng xiǎng lì shǐ tā men jiē shòu tā de jì huà。
english: He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan.

hanzi: 生命可以被比作一次不知目的地的旅行。
pinyin: shēng mìng kě yǐ bèi bì zuò yī cì bù zhī mù dì dì de lu:3 xíng。
english: Life can be likened to a journey with an unknown destination.

hanzi: 他们对即将到来的选举作了充分的准备。
pinyin: tā men duì jí jiāng dào lái de xuǎn jǔ zuò le chōng fèn de zhǔn bèi。
english: They have made good preparation for the upcoming elections.

hanzi: 他们爱举行戏称之为文学晚会的活动.
pinyin: tā men ài jǔ xíng xì chèng zhī wèi wén xué wǎn huì de huó dòng.
english: They're fond of holding what are laughingly known as literary soirees.

hanzi: 你有这样一位通情达理的父亲，真是幸运。
pinyin: nǐ yǒu zhè yàng yī wèi tōng qíng dá lǐ de fù qīn， zhēn shì xìng yùn。
english: You are fortunate to have such a reasonable father.

hanzi: 老师从一开始就强调翻译准确性。
pinyin: lǎo shī zòng yī kāi shǐ jiù qiáng diào fān yì zhǔn què xìng。
english: The teacher laid emphasis on the precision of the translation from the outset.

hanzi: 原始社会的结构并不一定就是简单的。
pinyin: yuán shǐ shè huì de jié gòu bìng bù yī dìng jiù shì jiǎn dān de。
english: The constitution of a primitive society is not necessarily simple.

hanzi: 当她听到那则消息后，她变得越来越紧张。
pinyin: dàng tā tīng dào nà zé xiāo xi hòu， tā biàn de yuè lái yuè jǐn zhāng。
english: When she heard the news she was heightening tension.

hanzi: 这些发展促使家用电脑的需求量增大。
pinyin: zhè xie fā zhǎn cù shǐ jiā yòng diàn nǎo de xū qiú liàng zēng dà。
english: These developments have created a great demand for home computers.

hanzi: 这个饭店的服务质量已经有了很大改善。
pinyin: zhè gè fàn diàn de fú wù zhì liàng yǐ jīng yǒu le hěn dà gǎi shàn。
english: The quality of service in this restaurant has improved a lot.

hanzi: 你与其要他减价还不如求助于一棵树。
pinyin: nǐ yǔ qí yào tā jiǎn jià huán bù rú qiú zhù yú yī kē shù。
english: You might as well ask the tree for help as request him to reduce the price.

hanzi: 厨房是我妻子的领地，她不愿让我进去。
pinyin: chú fáng shì wǒ qī zi de lǐng de， tā bù yuàn ràng wǒ jìn qù。
english: The kitchen is my wife's domain, she doesn't like me going into it.

hanzi: 教会应当就基本道德问题多做出些榜样.
pinyin: jiào huì yīng dāng jiù jī běn dào dé wèn tí duō zuò chū xiē bǎng yàng.
english: The Church should give more of a lead on basic moral issues.

hanzi: 多丽，你的东西乱七八糟，收拾收拾房间。
pinyin: duō lì， nǐ de dōng xi luàn qī bā zāo， shōu shi shōu shi fáng jiān。
english: Dolly, all your things are in a muddle, tidy up your room.

hanzi: 好的。请您告诉我贵姓及大名的头一个字母。
pinyin: hǎo de。 qǐng nín gào su wǒ guì xìng jí Dà míng de tou yī gè zì mǔ。
english: Ok may I have your last name and first initial, please?

hanzi: 我可以向你保证，你儿子在这里会很快乐的。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ xiàng nǐ bǎo zhèng， nǐ ér zi zài zhè lǐ kuài hěn kuài yuè de。
english: I can assure you that your son will be happy here.

hanzi: 他们的足球队在昨天的比赛中表现突出。
pinyin: tā men de zú qiú duì zài zuó tiān de bǐ sài zhòng biǎo xiàn tū chū。
english: Their football team performed very well in the match yesterday.

hanzi: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合.
pinyin: huǒ jǐng jǐng bào xiǎng shí quán tǐ rén yuán yìng dào lóu wài jí hé.
english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.

hanzi: 我躺下来与其说是要睡觉，倒不如说是要思考。
pinyin: wǒ tǎng xia lai yǔ qí shuō shì yào shuì jiào， dào bù rú shuō shì yào sī kǎo。
english: I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.

hanzi: 那位代表提出了一项对新闻法的修正案。
pinyin: nà wèi dài biǎo tí chū le yí xiàng duì xīn wén fǎ de xiū zhèng àn。
english: That representative brought forth an amendment to the press law.

hanzi: 一个干部必须联系群众，同群众打成一片。
pinyin: yī gè gàn bù bì xū lián xì qún zhòng， tóng qún zhòng dǎ chéng yī piàn。
english: A cadre must reach out to and be one with the masses.

hanzi: 这个小男孩因为结巴不敢回答老师的问题。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nán hái yīn wèi jié bā bù gǎn huí dá lǎo shī de wèn tí。
english: The boy dare not answer the questions because of his stammer.

hanzi: 她自称精通计算机，其实她是假充内行。
pinyin: tā zì chēng jīng tōng jì suàn jī， qí shí tā shì jià chōng nèi háng。
english: She claims to know all about computers but really she's a sham.

hanzi: 试验没有成功，尽管如此，还是值得做的。
pinyin: shì yàn méi yǒu chéng gōng， jǐn guǎn rú cǐ， hái shì zhí de zuò de。
english: The experiment failed. It was, nevertheless, worth making.

hanzi: 有约在先，我恐怕不能与你共进晚餐。
pinyin: yǒu yuē zài xiān， wǒ kǒng pà bù néng yù nǐ gòng jìn wǎn cān。
english: I fear that a prior engagement will prohibit me from joining you in dinner.

hanzi: 她因这一成绩而获得第三个冠军称号。
pinyin: tā yīn zhè yī chéng jī ér huò dé dì sān gè guàn jūn chēng hào。
english: With this performance, she has notched up her third championship title.

hanzi: 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响。
pinyin: xīn zhì dù yǐ duì shēng chǎn lì zào chéng le zāi nàn xìng de yǐng xiǎng。
english: The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity.

hanzi: 她从火车窗口里伸出手挥动手帕道别。
pinyin: tā zòng huǒ chē chuāng kǒu lǐ shēn chū shǒu huī dòng shǒu pà dào biè。
english: She fluttered her handkerchief from the train window as a good-bye.

hanzi: 我总觉得他讨厌我，但我不知道为什么。
pinyin: wǒ zǒng jué de tā tǎo yàn wǒ， dàn wǒ bù zhī dào wèi shén me。
english: I always feel he has a grudge against me, although I don't know why.

hanzi: 这件事不久引起了一些领导同志的注意。
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì bù jiǔ yǐn qǐ le yī xiē lǐng dǎo tóng zhì de zhù yì。
english: The matter was soon brought to the notice of some leading comrades.

hanzi: 这个工人因为严格遵守规则而受到了表扬。
pinyin: zhè gè gōng rén yīn wèi yán gé zūn shǒu guī zé ér shòu dào le biǎo yáng。
english: The worker was praised for his observance of the rules.

hanzi: 我躺下来与其说是要睡觉，倒不如说是要思考。
pinyin: wǒ tǎng xia lai yǔ qí shuō shì yào shuì jiào， dào bù rú shuō shì yào sī kǎo。
english: I lay down not so much to sleep as to think.

hanzi: 法语教师每隔一周给这班学生做一次听写。
pinyin: fǎ yǔ jiào shī měi gé yī zhōu jǐ zhè bān xué sheng zuò yī cì tīng xiě。
english: The French teacher dictates to the class every other week.

hanzi: 报纸上的这篇文章为他的演讲提供了启发。
pinyin: bào zhǐ shàng de zhè piān wén zhāng wèi tā de yǎn jiǎng tí gōng le qǐ fā。
english: The newspaper article provided him with fuel for his speech.

hanzi: 这一运动的领导层对这个问题的看法一致。
pinyin: zhè yī yùn dòng de lǐng dǎo céng duì zhè gè wèn tí de kàn fǎ yī zhì。
english: The leadership of the movement are in agreement on this issue.

hanzi: 最小的儿童上一年级, 最大的上六年级.
pinyin: zuì xiǎo de ér tóng shàng yī nián jí,  zuì dà de shàng liù nián jí.
english: The youngest children are in the first form, the oldest in the sixth form.

hanzi: 这个国王没有宽容之心，杀死了所有的犯人。
pinyin: zhè gè guó wáng méi yǒu kuān róng zhī xīn， shā sǐ le suǒ yǒu de fàn rén。
english: The king showed no mercy and killed all the prisoners.

hanzi: 有几个年龄较大的男孩子在操场上对他动武.
pinyin: yǒu jǐ ge nián líng jiào dà de nán hái zǐ zài cāo chǎng shàng duì tā dòng wǔ.
english: He was bashed up in the playground by some older boys.

hanzi: 我喜欢他的写作风格，但是不喜欢他的内容。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan tā de xiě zuò fēng gé， dàn shì bù xǐ huan tā de nèi róng。
english: I like the style of his writing but I don't like the content.

hanzi: 解放后这个国家的农业得到了巨大的发展。
pinyin: jiě fàng hòu zhè gè guó jiā de nóng yè dé dào le jù dà de fā zhǎn。
english: Agriculture in this country has developed greatly after liberation.

hanzi: 报纸上的这篇文章为他的演讲提供了启发。
pinyin: bào zhǐ shàng de zhè piān wén zhāng wèi tā de yǎn jiǎng tí gōng le qǐ fā。
english: The newspaper article provided him with fuel for his speech.

hanzi: 让我看看买卖这块土地的所有官方文件。
pinyin: ràng wǒ kàn kan mǎi mài zhè kuài tǔ dì de suǒ yǒu guān fāng wén jiàn。
english: Let me see all the official documents concerning the sale of this land.

hanzi: 演完戏之后, 他们要求作者出来和大家见面。
pinyin: yǎn wán xì zhī hòu,  tā men yāo qiú zuó zhě chū lai huò dà jiā jiàn miàn。
english: After the play they called for the author to show himself.

hanzi: 从他领导后，一个又一个革新项目出现了。
pinyin: zòng tā lǐng dǎo hòu， yī gè yòu yī gè gé xīn xiàng mù chū xiàn le。
english: After being led by him, one innovation after another are showing.

hanzi: 这家公司的主要问题是缺少有技术的人员。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī de zhǔ yào wèn tí shì quē shǎo yǒu jì shù de rén yuán。
english: The company's main problem is the shortage of skilled personnel.

hanzi: 他们出示了一些统计数字来支持他们的论点。
pinyin: tā men chū shì le yī xiē tǒng jì shù zì lái zhī chí tā men de lùn diǎn。
english: They showed some statistical evidence to support their argument.

hanzi: 无论在哪一方面他都不能被看作是个好丈夫。
pinyin: wú lùn zài něi yī fāng miàn tā dōu bù néng bèi kàn zuò shì gè hào zhàng fu。
english: In no respect can he be looked upon as a good husband.

hanzi: 他在那个伸出到街上的阳台上种了些花。
pinyin: tā zài nèi gè shēn chū dào jiē shàng de yáng tái shàng zhòng le xiē huā。
english: He planted some flowers on the balcony that projects over the street.

hanzi: 我向他作了详细说明, 好让他能找到那房子.
pinyin: wǒ xiàng tā zuò le xiáng xì shuō míng,  hào ràng tā néng zhǎo dào nà fáng zi.
english: I gave him full directions to enable him to find the house.

hanzi: 我上来取我的手提袋，我把它忘在我的办公室了。
pinyin: wǒ shàng lái qǔ wǒ de shǒu tí dài， wǒ bǎ tā wàng zài wǒ de bàn gōng shì le。
english: I've come up for my bag, I left it in my office.

hanzi: 船搁浅了--这河口的水比我们想像的要浅.
pinyin: chuán gē qiǎn le-- zhè hé kǒu de shuǐ bì wǒ men xiǎng xiàng de yào qiǎn.
english: The ship has touched bottom the estuary must be shallower than we thought.

hanzi: 那些难看的家具使得他的家看上去一团糟糕。
pinyin: nà xiē nán kàn de jiā jù shǐ de tā de jiā kàn shàng qù yī tuán zāo gāo。
english: His house looks terrible with those pieces of ugly furniture.

hanzi: 他的父母并不像他的老师对他那样有影响。
pinyin: tā de fù mǔ bìng bù xiàng tā de lǎo shī duì tā nà yàng yǒu yǐng xiǎng。
english: It is not his parents that influence him so much as his teachers.

hanzi: 重工业的稳固发展为这些进展打下了基础.
pinyin: zhòng gōng yè de wěn gù fā zhǎn wèi zhè xie jìn zhǎn dǎ xià le jī chǔ.
english: These developments are underpinned by solid progress in heavy industry.

hanzi: 政府还没有找出对付失业的有效措施。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ huán méi yǒu zhǎo chū duì fu shī yè de yǒu xiào cuò shī。
english: The government hasn't worked out the effectual measures to combat unemployment.

hanzi: 春天的时候，踩在松软的地面上非常舒服。
pinyin: chūn tiān de shí hou， cǎi zài sōng ruǎn de dì miàn shàng fēi cháng shū fu。
english: It's very comfortable to step on the soft ground in the spring.

hanzi: 你要是看到什么可疑的东西就马上通知警察。
pinyin: nǐ yào shì kàn dào shén me kě yí de dōng xi jiù mǎ shàng tōng zhī jǐng chá。
english: If you see anything suspicious, inform the police at once.

hanzi: 我们再怎样强调学英文的重要性也不为过。
pinyin: wǒ men zài zěn yàng qiáng diào xué Yīng wén de zhòng yào xìng yě bù wèi guò。
english: We cannot emphasize too much the importance of learning English.

hanzi: 这间屋子里放了一堆奇形怪状的破烂家具。
pinyin: zhè jiàn wū zi lǐ fàng le yī duī qí xíng guài zhuàng de pò làn jiā jù。
english: There is an odd assemblage of broken bits of furniture in this room.

hanzi: 他需要有高收入才能供养得起这样一个大家庭。
pinyin: tā xū yào yǒu gāo shōu rù cái néng gòng yǎng de qǐ zhè yàng yī gè dà jiā tíng。
english: He needs a high income to support such a large family.

hanzi: 我用电话旁的一根铅笔记下了他的电话号码。
pinyin: wǒ yòng diàn huà páng de yī gēn qiān bǐ jì xià le tā de diàn huà hào mǎ。
english: I noted down his telephone number with a pencil near the telephone.

hanzi: 他们上了当, 以为我们还没有作好进攻准备.
pinyin: tā men shàng le dàng,  yǐ wéi wǒ men huán méi yǒu zuò hào jìn gōng zhǔn bèi.
english: They were bluffed into believing we were not ready for the attack.

hanzi: 充分利用自然资源的愿望终究会实现。
pinyin: chōng fèn lì yòng zì rán zī yuán de yuàn wàng zhōng jiū kuài shí xiàn。
english: The wish of fully utilizing the natural resources will eventually come true.

hanzi: 形容词的作用是描述或增加名词的意思。
pinyin: xíng róng cí de zuò yòng shì miáo shù huò zēng jiā míng cí de yì si。
english: The function of an adjective is to describe or add to the meaning of a noun.

hanzi: 她的演说对于听众来说永远是灵感之源。
pinyin: tā de yǎn shuō duì yú tīng zhòng lái shuō yǒng yuǎn shì líng gǎn zhī yuán。
english: Her speeches have ever been a fount of inspiration to her audiences.

hanzi: 我用电话旁的一根铅笔记下了他的电话号码。
pinyin: wǒ yòng diàn huà páng de yī gēn qiān bǐ jì xià le tā de diàn huà hào mǎ。
english: I noted down his telephone number with a pencil near the telephone.

hanzi: 起初我不同意他的提议，不过后来我改了主意。
pinyin: qǐ chū wǒ bù tóng yì tā de tí yì， bù guò hòu lái wǒ gǎi le zhǔ yi。
english: Initially, I disagree with his proposal, but later I changed my mind.

hanzi: 当我们听说他们平安无事时，都松了一口气。
pinyin: dàng wǒ men tīng shuō tā men píng ān wú shì shí， dōu sōng le yī kǒu qì。
english: We all heaved a sigh of relief when we heard that they were safe.

hanzi: 工党政治思想的要点是人人平等。
pinyin: gōng dǎng zhèng zhì sī xiǎng de yào diǎn shì rén rén píng děng。
english: The cardinal idea of the Labor Party's political thought is that all people should be equal.

hanzi: 这房间里有一种香气，使人想起春天的花朵。
pinyin: zhè fáng jiān lǐ yǒu yī zhòng xiāng qì， shǐ rén xiǎng qǐ chūn tiān de huā duǒ。
english: There is an aroma suggestive of spring flowers in the room.

hanzi: 通常, 是男士伸出手来邀请女士跳舞。
pinyin: tōng cháng,  shì nán shì shēn chū shǒu lái yāo qǐng nu:3 shì tiào wǔ。
english: As a rule, it's the gentleman that holds out his hand to invite a lady to dance.

hanzi: 这两个姑娘相互谈了关于各自男友的悄悄话。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè gū niang xiāng hù tán le guān yú gè zi nán yǒu de qiǎo qiǎo huà。
english: The two girls told each other confidences about their boyfriends.

hanzi: 她并不聪明，但在其他方面，她倒是个好姑娘。
pinyin: tā bìng bù cōng míng， dàn zài qí tā fāng miàn， tā dào shì gè hào gū niang。
english: She is not very clever, but otherwise she's a nice girl.

hanzi: 他的时间排得很满，学生根本无法和他接触。
pinyin: tā de shí jiān pǎi de hěn mǎn， xué sheng gēn běn wú fǎ huò tā jiē chù。
english: His busy schedule made him completely inaccessible to his students.

hanzi: 就英文而言，它并不像你所认为的那样难。
pinyin: jiù Yīng wén ér yán， tā bìng bù xiàng nǐ suǒ rèn wéi de nà yàng nàn。
english: So far as English is concerned, it is not so difficult as you might think.

hanzi: 他搭乘便车往南去意大利，然后从那里进入法国。
pinyin: tā dā chéng pián jū wàng nán qù yì dà lì， rán hòu zòng nà li jìn rù fǎ guó。
english: He hitched south towards Italy, and thence into France.

hanzi: 在孩子们住院期间, 有个私人教师给他们上课.
pinyin: zài hái zi men zhù yuàn qī jiān,  yǒu gè sī rén jiào shī jǐ tā men shàng kè.
english: There is a tutor to teach the children while they're in hospital.

hanzi: 我妈妈鼓励我，而且坚持我应该继续我的教育。
pinyin: wǒ mā ma gǔ lì wǒ， ér qiě jiān chí wǒ yīng gāi jì xù wǒ de jiào yù。
english: My mother encouraged me and insisted that I continue my education.

hanzi: 教师在学习中的关键作用是不该忽视的。
pinyin: jiào shī zài xué xí zhòng dì guān jiàn zuò yòng shì bù gāi hū shì de。
english: The key role of the teacher in the learning process should not be neglected.

hanzi: 这位教师要使班里的每一个人都弄懂课文。
pinyin: zhè wèi jiào shī yào shǐ bān lǐ de měi yī gè rén dōu nòng dǒng kè wén。
english: The teacher makes sure that everyone in the class understands the text.

hanzi: 你可以在这本书的第一部分找到你要的资料。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zài zhè běn shū de dì yī bù fen zhǎo dào nǐ yào de zī liào。
english: You may find the information you need in the first portion of the book.

hanzi: 他们不顾农民反对, 仍继续进行农业改革.
pinyin: tā men bù gù nóng mín fǎn duì,  réng jì xù jìn xíng nóng yè gǎi gé.
english: They persisted with the agricultural reforms, despite opposition from the farmers.

hanzi: 我总是分不出这对姐妹, 她们看上去简直一模一样.
pinyin: wǒ zǒng shì fèn bù chū zhè duì jiě mèi,  tā men kàn shàng qù jiǎn zhí yī mó yí yàng.
english: I always confuse the sisters: they look so alike.

hanzi: 他在一家汽车旅馆呆了一晚上，就又接着旅行了。
pinyin: tā zài yī jiā qì chē lu:3 guǎn dāi le yī wǎn shang， jiù yòu jiē zhe lu:3 xíng le。
english: He stayed one night in a motel and went on travelling.

hanzi: 在我看来，这次演出恐怕不能算是完全成功的。
pinyin: zài wǒ kàn lai， zhè cì yǎn chū kǒng pà bù néng suàn shì wán quán chéng gōng de。
english: I'm afraid that the performance was not a total success.

hanzi: 这本书形象地描写了一百年前的中国生活。
pinyin: zhè běn shū xíng xiàng de miáo xiě le yī bǎi nián qián de Zhōng guó shēng huó。
english: This book gives a good picture of life in China 100 hundred years ago.

hanzi: 香山红叶是北京最浓最浓的秋色。
pinyin: xiāng shān hóng yè shì Běi jīng zuì nóng zuì nóng de qiū shǎi。
english: The red leaves of maple trees of the Fragrant Hills are the most charming autumn scenery in Beijing.

hanzi: 他的秘密至死也不为人知，因为他从未告诉过别人。
pinyin: tā de mì mì zhì sǐ yě bù wèi rén zhī， yīn wèi tā zòng wèi gào su guò bié rén。
english: His secret died with him, for he never told anyone.

hanzi: 这件工作同你早先的工作相比, 有些令人失望.
pinyin: zhè jiàn gōng zuò tóng nǐ zǎo xiān de gōng zuò xiāng bǐ,  yǒu xiē lìng rén shī wàng.
english: Beside your earlier work this piece seems rather disappointing.

hanzi: 各种各样的影响有助于塑造我们的孩子们的性格。
pinyin: gè zhǒng gè yàng de yǐng xiǎng yǒu zhù yú sù zào wǒ men de hái zi men de xìng gé。
english: Many influences help to fashion our children's characters.

hanzi: 经济知识对于理解这个问题是至关重要的。
pinyin: jīng jì zhī shi duì yú lǐ jiě zhè gè wèn tí shì zhì guān zhòng yào de。
english: A knowledge of economics is fundamental to any understanding of this problem.

hanzi: 开往北京的火车将于半小时后从三站台开出。
pinyin: kāi wàng Běi jīng de huǒ chē jiàng yú bàn xiǎo shí hòu zòng sān zhàn tái kāi chū。
english: The train to Beijing will depart from platform 3 in half an hour.

hanzi: 机场当局已答应重新检查他们的安全措施。
pinyin: jī chǎng dāng jú yǐ dā ying chóng xīn jiǎn chá tā men de ān quán cuò shī。
english: The airport authorities have promised to review their security measurements.

hanzi: 这个小女孩因为斜视不敢在公共场合露面。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái yīn wèi xié shì bù gǎn zài gōng gòng chǎng hé lòu miàn。
english: The little girl dares not to appear in public because she is cross-eyed.

hanzi: 不符合这些要求的考生不能上这所大学。
pinyin: bù fú hé zhè xie yāo qiú de kǎo shēng bù néng shàng zhè suǒ dà xué。
english: Candidates who fail to meet these requirements will not be admitted to the University.

hanzi: 无疑，他们一定知道这样讲话可能产生的后果。
pinyin: wú yí， tā men yī dìng zhī dào zhè yàng jiǎng huà kě néng chǎn shēng de hòu guǒ。
english: Certainly they must know the probable result of such speeches.

hanzi: 这一千本书将构成学校新图书馆藏书的基础。
pinyin: zhè yī qiān běn shū jiàng gòu chéng xué xiào xīn tú shū guǎn zàng shū de jī chǔ。
english: These 1000 books will form the nucleus of the new school library.

hanzi: 几个星期来她一直呆在家中照顾有病的父亲。
pinyin: jǐ ge xīng qī lái tā yī zhí dāi zài jiā zhòng zhào gu yǒu bìng de fù qīn。
english: She has been tied to the house for weeks looking after her invalid father.

hanzi: 在外表上她保持着平静，但实际上她生气极了。
pinyin: zài wài biǎo shàng tā bǎo chí zhuó píng jìng， dàn shí jì shàng tā shēng qì jí le。
english: She maintained a calm exterior, though really she was furious.

hanzi: 我对他并不了解，虽然我认识他已经很长时间了。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā bìng bù liǎo jiě， suī rán wǒ rèn shi tā yǐ jīng hěn zhǎng shí jiān le。
english: I don't know him well though I've known him for a long time.

hanzi: 在共同反对非正义行为的斗争中, 我们都是同志.
pinyin: zài gòng tóng fǎn duì fēi zhèng yì xíng wéi de dòu zhēng zhòng,  wǒ men dōu shì tóng zhì.
english: We are all brothers in the same fight against injustice.

hanzi: 要是不给你添太多麻烦的话，我倒是愿意留下来。
pinyin: yào shì bù jǐ nǐ tiān tài duō má fan de huà， wǒ dào shì yuàn yì liú xià lái。
english: I'd like to stay if it's not too much of an imposition on you.

hanzi: 根据定义,首都是一个国家的政治文化中心。
pinyin: gēn jù dìng yì, shǒu dū shì yī gè guó jiā de zhèng zhì wén huà zhōng xīn。
english: By definition the capital is the political and cultural center of a country.

hanzi: 先让我烤烤火暖和一下，然后我们开始谈话。
pinyin: xiān ràng wǒ kǎo kǎo huǒ nuǎn huó yī xià， rán hòu wǒ men kāi shǐ tán huà。
english: Just give me a minute to thaw out in front of the fire, then we can talk.

hanzi: 我一想到要对这样的听众讲话，就有些胆小。
pinyin: wǒ yī xiǎng dào yào duì zhè yàng de tīng zhòng jiǎng huà， jiù yǒu xiē dǎn xiǎo。
english: I was rather daunted by the thought of addressing such an audience.

hanzi: 连长说军队生活可以使新兵锻炼得更坚强。
pinyin: lián zhǎng shuō jūn duì shēng huó kě yǐ shǐ xīn bīng duàn liàn de gèng jiān qiáng。
english: The company leader said that army life would toughen the recruits up.

hanzi: 班里所有的男孩都想陪这个漂亮的女孩一起出游。
pinyin: bān lǐ suǒ yǒu de nán hái dōu xiǎng péi zhè gè piào liang de nu:3 hái yī qǐ chū yóu。
english: All the boys in the class want to go out with the pretty girl.

hanzi: 自由党候选人轻易获胜，超出选票数以千计。
pinyin: zì yóu dǎng hòu xuǎn rén qīng yì huò shèng， chāo chū xuǎn piào shuò yǐ qiān jì。
english: The liberal candidate romped through with thousands of votes to spare.

hanzi: 一位德国科学家打断了我，并问我是否来自中国。
pinyin: yī wèi Dé guó kē xué jiā dǎ duàn le wǒ， bìng wèn wǒ shì fǒu lái zì Zhōng guó。
english: A German scientist interrupted me and asked if I came from China.

hanzi: 盒式音像带上有个小窗, 能看见里面的磁带.
pinyin: hé shì yīn xiàng dài shàng yǒu gè xiǎo chuāng,  néng kàn jiàn lǐ miàn de cí dài.
english: There is a little window in the cassette case so that you can see the tape.

hanzi: 整个作业的安全让一个粗心大意的人给破坏了.
pinyin: zhěng gè zuò yè de ān quán ràng yī gè cū xīn dà yì de rén jǐ pò huài le.
english: The security of the whole operation has been jeopardized by one careless person.

hanzi: 我们必须把理论与实践相结合是个重要的原则。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū bǎ lǐ lùn yù shí jiàn xiàng jié hé shì gè zhòng yào de yuán zé。
english: It is an essential principle that we must combine theory with practice.

hanzi: 很奇怪他们改变了计划，但我觉得没有什么用处。
pinyin: hěn qí guài tā men gǎi biàn le jì huà， dàn wǒ jué de méi yǒu shén me yòng chu。
english: Their change of plan is strange but I don't think it's significant.

hanzi: 世界杯决赛现在正向五十多个国家现场转播。
pinyin: Shì jiè bēi jué sài xiàn zài zhèng xiàng wǔ shí duō gè guó jiā xiàn chǎng zhuǎn bō。
english: The World Cup final is being transmitted live to over fifty countries.

hanzi: 这条路线旅行的人以前常走，但是现在已不用了。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù xiàn lu:3 xíng de rén yǐ qián cháng zǒu， dàn shì xiàn zài yǐ bù yòng le。
english: The route was once much travelled but has fallen into disuse.

hanzi: 他们试图利用更好的方法和工具来增加生产力。
pinyin: tā men shì tú lì yòng gèng hǎo de fāng fǎ huò gōng jù lái zēng jiā shēng chǎn lì。
english: They tried to increase production by using better methods and tools.

hanzi: 他们试图利用更好的方法和工具来增加生产力。
pinyin: tā men shì tú lì yòng gèng hǎo de fāng fǎ huò gōng jù lái zēng jiā shēng chǎn lì。
english: They tried to increase production by using better methods and tools.

hanzi: 他一想到自己对她的死负有责任就感到心如刀割。
pinyin: tā yī xiǎng dào zì jǐ duì tā de sǐ fù yǒu zé rèn jiù gǎn dào xīn rú dāo gē。
english: The thought that he was responsible for her death preyed on his mind.

hanzi: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加.
pinyin: gōng huì lǐng xiù hào zhào kàng yì nà Tiān quán tǐ huì yuán jī jí cān jiā.
english: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

hanzi: 前一代人制造出来的空洞理论，下一代人把它们打破。
pinyin: qián yī dài rén zhì zào chū lai de kōng dòng lǐ lùn， xià yī dài rén bǎ tā men dǎ pò。
english: One generation blows bubbles, and the next breaks them.

hanzi: 你那篇文章的内容好极了, 但是表达方式不太好.
pinyin: nǐ nà piān wén zhāng de nèi róng hào jí le,  dàn shì biǎo dá fāng shì bù tài hào.
english: The content of your essay is excellent, but it's not very well expressed.

hanzi: 生产者与消费者之间的利益冲突将永远存在。
pinyin: shēng chǎn zhě yù xiāo fèi zhě zhī jiān de lì yì chōng tū jiàng yǒng yuǎn cún zài。
english: The conflicting interests of producers and consumers will be everlasting.

hanzi: 既然你无法回答这个问题，我们最好再问问别人。
pinyin: jì rán nǐ wú fǎ huí dá zhè gè wèn tí， wǒ men zuì hǎo zài wèn wèn bié rén。
english: Since you can't answer the question, perhaps we'd better ask someone else.

hanzi: 等所有的植物都开花时，花园会显得非常漂亮。
pinyin: děng suǒ yǒu de zhí wù dōu kāi huā shí， huā yuán kuài xiǎn de fēi cháng piào liang。
english: The garden will look very beautiful when all the plants are in flower.

hanzi: 我的部分工作是同我们的供应商保持良好的关系。
pinyin: wǒ de bù fen gōng zuò shì tóng wǒ men de gōng yìng shāng bǎo chí liáng hǎo de guān xi。
english: Part of my job is to maintain good relationship with our suppliers.

hanzi: 我八点钟就到医院了，但是九点钟我才去值班。
pinyin: wǒ bā diǎn zhōng jiù dào yī yuàn le， dàn shì jiǔ diǎn zhōng wǒ cái qù zhí bān。
english: I arrive at the hospital at eight o'clock, but I don't go on duty until nine.

hanzi: 这家工厂的所有女职工在三八节都得到了一份礼物。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng chǎng de suǒ yǒu nu:3 zhí gōng zài sān bā jié dōu dé dào le yī fèn lǐ wù。
english: All the female workers in this factory got a present on March 8.

hanzi: 因为污染严重，许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种。
pinyin: yīn wèi wū rǎn yán zhòng， xǔ duō měi lì de yú lèi zhèng zài miàn lín jué zhòng。
english: Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution.

hanzi: 那些喜欢和他一起踢足球的小男孩都把他当作叔叔。
pinyin: nà xiē xǐ huan huò tā yī qǐ tī zú qiú de xiǎo nán hái dōu bǎ tā dàng zuò shū shu。
english: He is uncle to all the little boys who like to play football with him.

hanzi: 那位记者发来了一篇描写极地生活的艰苦的文章。
pinyin: nà wèi jì zhě fà lái le yī piān miáo xiě jí de shēng huó de jiān kù de wén zhāng。
english: The reporter has sent an article describing the rigors of life at the poles.

hanzi: 别穿这些衣服去工作，要穿得象个专业人员的样子。
pinyin: biè chuān zhè xie yī fu qù gōng zuò， yào chuān de xiàng gè zhuān yè rén yuán de yàng zi。
english: Don't wear those clothes to work; try to look more professional!

hanzi: 如果最后你能够有所成就, 你的努力就不会白费。
pinyin: rú guǒ zuì hòu nǐ néng gòu yǒu suǒ chéng jiù,  nǐ de nǔ lì jiù bù huì bái fèi。
english: Your efforts will not come to no avail, if you can achieve something at last.

hanzi: 那位记者发来了一篇描写极地生活的艰苦的文章。
pinyin: nà wèi jì zhě fà lái le yī piān miáo xiě jí de shēng huó de jiān kù de wén zhāng。
english: The reporter has sent an article describing the rigors of life at the poles.

hanzi: 你如果可以正确有效地使用一个词，你就是了解它了。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ kě yǐ zhèng què yǒu xiào de shǐ yòng yī gè cí， nǐ jiù shì liǎo jiě tā le。
english: If you can use a word correctly and effectively you comprehend it.

hanzi: 他肯定是喝多了，当他要站起来时，却摔倒在地上。
pinyin: tā kěn dìng shì hè duō le， dàng tā yào zhàn qǐ lai shí， què shuāi dǎo zài dì shang。
english: He must have drunk too much; when he tried to stand up, he keeled over.

hanzi: 在空无一人的办公室里电话铃突然地发出刺耳的尖叫声。
pinyin: zài kòng wú yī rén de bàn gōng shì lǐ diàn huà líng tū rán de fā chū cì ěr de jiān jiào shēng。
english: Telephone shrilled unattended in deserted office.

hanzi: 他不谈论这个令人不愉快的话题，而去谈论别的事情。
pinyin: tā bù tán lùn zhè gè lìng rén bù yú kuài de huà tí， ér qù tán lùn bié de shì qing。
english: He dismissed the unpleasant subject and talked about something else.

hanzi: 你必须先弄懂数学基础知识, 我们才能进一步学习.
pinyin: nǐ bì xū xiān nòng dǒng shù xué jī chǔ zhī shi,  wǒ men cái néng jìn yí bù xué xí.
english: You must understand the elements of mathematics before we can proceed further.

hanzi: 我买不起像特德那样的照相机。这要花好大一笔钱。
pinyin: wǒ mǎi bù qǐ xiàng tè dé nà yàng de zhào xiàng jī。 zhè yào huā hào dà yī bǐ qián。
english: I can't possibly afford to buy a camera like Ted's. It costs the earth.

hanzi: 他把文件使劲扔在我的桌子上便怒气冲冲地走了出去。
pinyin: tā bǎ wén jiàn shǐ jìn rēng zài wǒ de zhuō zi shàng pián nù qì chòng chòng de zǒu le chū qù。
english: He slammed the papers down on my desk and angrily walked out.

hanzi: 所有的顾问当中, 只有王先生提了一些中肯的建议。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de gù wèn dāng zhōng,  zhǐ yǒu wáng xiān sheng tí le yī xiē zhòng kěn de jiàn yì。
english: Of all the consultants, only Mr. Wang gave us some proposals in point.

hanzi: 他不久就逐渐习惯了宿舍的生活并交了两三个朋友。
pinyin: tā bù jiǔ jiù zhú jiàn xí guàn le sù shè de shēng huó bìng jiāo le liǎng sān gè péng you。
english: He soon gets accustom to dormitory life and make two or three friend.

hanzi: 那位著名的进步思想家被邀请在会议上发表演讲。
pinyin: nà wèi著 míng de jìn bù sī xiǎng jiā bèi yāo qǐng zài huì yì shàng fā biǎo yǎn jiǎng。
english: That famous progressive thinker was asked to deliver a speech at the meeting.

hanzi: 人类的种种经验都证明了爱与怕之间的紧密联系。
pinyin: rén lèi de zhǒng zhǒng jīng yàn dōu zhèng míng le ài yù pà zhī jiān de jǐn mì lián xì。
english: All kinds of human experience testify to the close link between love and fear.

hanzi: 不论阶级，种族，性别，人人都可进这所学校上课。
pinyin: bù lùn jiē jí， zhǒng zú， xìng bié， rén rén dōu kě jìn zhè suǒ xué xiào shàng kè。
english: Everybody can come to this school, without respect to class, race, or sex.

hanzi: 即使多年没有看见我的同学，我也马上认出了他。
pinyin: jí shǐ duō nián méi yǒu kàn jiàn wǒ de tóng xué， wǒ yě mǎ shàng rèn chū le tā。
english: Even though I hadn't seen my classmate for many years, I recognized him immediately.

hanzi: 这家新工厂给自然环境带来的影响可能是灾难性的。
pinyin: zhè jiā xīn gōng chǎng jǐ zì rán huán jìng dài lái de yǐng xiǎng kě néng shì zāi nàn xìng de。
english: This environmental effect of this new factory could be disastrous.

hanzi: 人类的种种经验都证明了爱与怕之间的紧密联系。
pinyin: rén lèi de zhǒng zhǒng jīng yàn dōu zhèng míng le ài yù pà zhī jiān de jǐn mì lián xì。
english: All kinds of human experience testify to the close link between love and fear.

hanzi: 我在会上真出了洋相了--一站起来就把问题忘了.
pinyin: wǒ zài kuài shàng zhēn chū le yáng xiàng le-- yī zhàn qǐ lai jiù bǎ wèn tí wàng le.
english: I made a real ass of myself at the meeting standing up and then forgetting the question.

hanzi: 即使多年没有看见我的同学，我也马上认出了他。
pinyin: jí shǐ duō nián méi yǒu kàn jiàn wǒ de tóng xué， wǒ yě mǎ shàng rèn chū le tā。
english: Even though I hadn't seen my classmate for many years, I recognized him immediately.

hanzi: 这次新发现的石油对这个地区的经济有着重大的意义。
pinyin: zhè cì xīn fā xiàn de shí yóu duì zhè gè dì qū de jīng jì yǒu zhe zhòng dà de yì yì。
english: This new discovery of oil is of great significance to this area's economy.

hanzi: 这篇演讲非常令人失望，它回避了所有主要的问题。
pinyin: zhè piān yǎn jiǎng fēi cháng lìng rén shī wàng， tā huí bì le suǒ yǒu zhǔ yào de wèn tí。
english: The speech was most disappointing; it skirted round all the main questions.

hanzi: 为了安全起见，在市内开车时速不要超过三十公里。
pinyin: wèi le ān quán qǐ xiàn， zài shì nèi kāi chē shí sù bù yào chāo guò sān shí gōng lǐ。
english: For safety's sake, don't drive more than 30 kilometers per hour in the city.

hanzi: 你或许也会发现阅读已经变成是有趣的事，而不是工作。
pinyin: nǐ huò xǔ yě kuài fā xiàn yuè dú yǐ jīng biàn chéng shì yǒu qù de shì， ér bú shì gōng zuò。
english: You may also find that reading has become more fun than work!

hanzi: 他要养活自己的七个孩子，更不必说还有妻子和父母了。
pinyin: tā yào yǎng huo zì jǐ de qī gè hái zi， gèng bù bì shuō hái yǒu qī zi huò fù mǔ le。
english: He had to support his seven children, to say nothing of his wife and parents.

hanzi: 这篇演讲非常令人失望，它回避了所有主要的问题。
pinyin: zhè piān yǎn jiǎng fēi cháng lìng rén shī wàng， tā huí bì le suǒ yǒu zhǔ yào de wèn tí。
english: The speech was most disappointing; it skirted round all the main questions.

hanzi: 亿万人的收入增加了，这是他们自己做梦也想不到的。
pinyin: yì wàn rén de shōu rù zēng jiā le， zhè shì tā men zì jǐ zuò mèng yě xiǎng bù dào de。
english: Incomes of millions upon millions of people have increased beyond their dreams.

hanzi: 就翻译训练而言我认为这是一本无出其右的好书。
pinyin: jiù fān yì xùn liàn ér yán wǒ rèn wéi zhè shì yī běn wú chū qí yòu de hào shū。
english: This is a book, which I dare say, is unequaled as far as translation practice is concerned.

hanzi: 东边地平线上的一道淡红光线使我知道天快要亮了。
pinyin: dōng biān de píng xiàn shàng de yī dào dàn hóng guāng xiàn shǐ wǒ zhī dào tiān kuài yào liàng le。
english: A line of pink on the eastern horizon told me that daybreak was near.

hanzi: 他们如果还顾及人的生命就不会做出这样可怕的事来。
pinyin: tā men rú guǒ huán gù jí rén de shēng mìng jiù bù huì zuò chū zhè yàng kě pà de shì lái。
english: If they had any respect for human life they wouldn't do such terrible things.

hanzi: 空难事件中有些人大难不死被新闻界广泛报导。
pinyin: kōng nàn shì jiàn zhòng yǒu xiē rén dà nàn bù sǐ bèi xīn wén jiè guǎng fàn bào dǎo。
english: The miraculous survival of some people in the air crash was widely reported by the press.

hanzi: 他们如果还顾及人的生命就不会做出这样可怕的事来。
pinyin: tā men rú guǒ huán gù jí rén de shēng mìng jiù bù huì zuò chū zhè yàng kě pà de shì lái。
english: If they had any respect for human life they wouldn't do such terrible things.

hanzi: 老师帮助他上完了中学，但他无法完成大学的学业。
pinyin: lǎo shī bāng zhù tā shàng wán le zhōng xué， dàn tā wú fǎ wán chéng dà xué de xué yè。
english: The teacher helped him through high school, but he couldn't cut the buck in college.

hanzi: 我们送给那个可怜的小女孩一份生日礼物作为友谊的表示。
pinyin: wǒ men sòng jǐ nèi gè kě lián de xiǎo nu:3 hái yī fèn shēng rì lǐ wù zuò wéi yǒu yì de biǎo shì。
english: We sent the poor girl a birthday present in token of friendship.

hanzi: 就在这些季节里，热气团与冷气团的温差最大。
pinyin: jiù zài zhè xie jì jié lǐ， rè qì tuán yù lěng qì tuán de wēn cī zuì dà。
english: It is during these seasons that the differences in temperature between warm and cold masses of air are greatest.

hanzi: 在我们的城市，许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de chéng shì， xǔ duō shè huì fú wù réng rán shì yǒu zhì yuàn tuán tǐ tí gōng de。
english: Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city.

hanzi: 当我不得不离开时，这个孩子情绪异常激动，忍不住哭了起来。
pinyin: dàng wǒ bù dé bù lí kāi shí， zhè gè hái zi qíng xù yì cháng jī dòng， rěn bú zhù kū le qǐ lai。
english: The boy got very emotional when I had to leave, and started to cry.

hanzi: 第二次世界大战期间，日本政府和德国签订了一项密约。
pinyin: dì èr cì shì jiè dà zhàn qī jiān， Rì běn zhèng fǔ huò Dé guó qiān dìng le yí xiàng mì yuē。
english: The Japanese Government made a secret deal with Germany during the Second World War.

hanzi: 他放弃了一份安定的工作而自己创业，表现出了极大的勇气。
pinyin: tā fàng qì le yī fèn ān dìng de gōng zuò ér zì jǐ chuàng yè， biǎo xiàn chū le jí dà de yǒng qì。
english: He showed a lot of pluck to leave a safe job and set up his own business.

hanzi: 我们的文艺工作者一定要完成这个任务，转变他们的立场。
pinyin: wǒ men de wén yì gōng zuò zhě yī dìng yào wán chéng zhè gè rèn wu， zhuǎn biàn tā men de lì chǎng。
english: Our literary and art workers must accomplish this task and shift their stand.

hanzi: 这鞋刚穿时要是有点紧没关系, 这种皮子很有延展性.
pinyin: zhè xié gāng chuān shí yào shì yǒu diǎn jǐn mò guān xi,  zhè zhǒng pí zi hěn yǒu yán zhǎn xìng.
english: Don't worry if the shoes seem a bit tight at first; the leather has plenty of give in it.

hanzi: 因为缺乏一名运动员我们只好叫这个小男孩做我们的队员。
pinyin: yīn wèi quē fá yī míng yùn dòng yuán wǒ men zhǐ hǎo jiào zhè gè xiǎo nán hái zuò wǒ men de duì yuán。
english: In the default of one player we have to take the little boy as our team member.

hanzi: 我认为你最后的那个论点是在转移目标，以便我们忘掉要点。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi nǐ zuì hòu de nèi gè lùn diǎn shì zài zhuǎn yí mù biāo， yǐ biàn wǒ men wàng diào yào diǎn。
english: I think your last argument was a diversion to make us forget the main point.

hanzi: 我们还以为那是最坏的情况呢，可没想到更糟的还在后面。
pinyin: wǒ men huán yǐ wéi nà shì zuì huài de qíng kuàng ne， kě mò xiǎng dào gèng zāo de huán zài hòu miàn。
english: We thought that the situation was as bad as it could be, but worse was to follow.

hanzi: 会议可能要延长到夜里，因为今晚有太多问题要解决。
pinyin: huì yì kě néng yào yán cháng dào yè lǐ， yīn wèi jīn wǎn yǒu tài duō wèn tí yào jiě jué。
english: The meeting may be prolonged into the evening because so many problems have to be solved tonight.

hanzi: 他很有天分，但对选择的工作该怎样处理，他仍得好好学习。
pinyin: tā hěn yǒu tiān fèn， dàn duì xuǎn zé de gōng zuò gāi zěn yàng chǔ lǐ， tā réng de hǎo hǎo xué xí。
english: He has natural ability, but has yet to learn the mechanics of his chosen work.

hanzi: 同样的问题人们向他问得太多了，所以他的答案也是千篇一律。
pinyin: tóng yàng de wèn tí rén men xiàng tā wèn de tài duō le， suǒ yǐ tā de dá àn yě shì qiān piān yī lu:4。
english: He was asked the same question so many times that the answer became mechanical.

hanzi: 你要是英语讲得不好，找工作时就会处于非常不利的地位。
pinyin: nǐ yào shì Yīng yǔ jiǎng de bù hǎo， zhǎo gōng zuò shí jiù kuài chǔ yú fēi cháng bù lì de dì wèi。
english: If you don't speak good English, you'll be at a big disadvantage when you try to get a job.

hanzi: 我们都要做好自己工作，并且要在工作中找到精神上的乐趣。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu yào zuò hào zì jǐ gōng zuò， bìng qiě yào zài gōng zuò zhòng zhǎo dào jīng shén shàng de lè qù。
english: We must cultivate our own garden and find the joy of doing it in our own heart.

hanzi: 如果老师连如此简单的问题都不能回答, 他会在学生面前丢脸的。
pinyin: rú guǒ lǎo shī lián rú cǐ jiǎn dān de wèn tí dōu bù néng huí dá,  tā kuài zài xué sheng miàn qián diū liǎn de。
english: If a teacher can't answer this simple question, he'll lose face with his class.

hanzi: 他忍受对自己人品的攻击而不发火，表现出巨大的自我控制能力。
pinyin: tā rěn shòu duì zì jǐ rén pǐn de gōng jī ér bù fā huǒ， biǎo xiàn chū jù dà de zì wǒ kòng zhì néng lì。
english: He showed great moderation in not responding angrily to the attacks on his character.

hanzi: 虽然很多人反对他的计划，他仍能巧妙地设法使它最后获得通过。
pinyin: suī rán hěn duō rén fǎn duì tā de jì huà， tā réng néng qiǎo miào de shè fǎ shǐ tā zuì hòu huò dé tōng guò。
english: Although many people opposed his plan, he engineered it through to final approval.

hanzi: 沿海地区的冬天天气暖和，可是相比之下中部平原却异常寒冷。
pinyin: yán hǎi dì qū de dōng tiān tiān qì nuǎn huó， kě shì xiāng bǐ zhī xià zhōng bù píng yuán què yì cháng hán lěng。
english: The coastal areas have mild winters, but by contrast the central plains become extremely cold.

hanzi: 在西方极乐世界，大夫们比我们当将军的可能还要负更多人命之责吧。
pinyin: zài xī fāng jí yuè shì jiè， dài fu men bì wǒ men dàng jiāng jūn de kě néng huán yào fù gèng duō rén mìng zhī zé ba。
english: Doctor will have more lives to answer for in the next world than even we generals.

hanzi: 我在街上遇到她，可是当我向她微笑时，她却连招呼都没有向我打一个。
pinyin: wǒ zài jiē shàng yù dào tā， kě shì dàng wǒ xiàng tā wēi xiào shí， tā què lián zhāo hu dōu méi yǒu xiàng wǒ dǎ yī gè。
english: I passed her in the street but she didn't even acknowledge me when I smiled.

hanzi: 现在就想回去，为了冷却他那急切的心，暂把他送到法国的哥哥家中。
pinyin: xiàn zài jiù xiǎng huí qu， wèi le lěng què tā nà jí qiè de xīn， zàn bǎ tā sòng dào fǎ guó de gē ge jiā zhòng。
english: Now he wanted to go back, but to damp down the urge he was sent to his brother's home in France.

hanzi: 他向新闻记者讲了这次谈话的情况，却不愿把实况录音磁带放给他们听。
pinyin: tā xiàng xīn wén jì zhě jiǎng le zhè cì tán huà de qíng kuàng， què bù yuàn bǎ shí kuàng lù yīn cí dài fàng jǐ tā men tìng。
english: He told the newspapermen about the conversation, but would not play them the actual tape of it.

hanzi: 随着逐渐成熟，许多年轻的激进分子对 生活和社会渐持较为宽容的态度。
pinyin: suí zhe zhú jiàn chéng shú， xǔ duō nián qīng de jī jìn fèn zǐ duì  shēng huó huò shè huì jiàn chí jiào wèi kuān róng de tài du。
english: As they mature, many young radicals mellow into a more tolerant attitude towards life and society.

hanzi: 议会开会的第一天，新政府中的一位部长就和反对党的一位议员争论起来。
pinyin: yì huì kāi huì de dì yī tiān， xīn zhèng fǔ zhòng dì yī wèi bù zhǎng jiù huò fǎn duì dǎng de yī wèi yì yuán zhēng lùn qǐ lai。
english: A minister in the new government crossed swords with a member of the Opposition on the first day after Parliament opened.

hanzi: 音乐学生学习给一个现有的调子配上其他音部，还要学习怎样转成和声调。
pinyin: yīn yuè xué shēng xué xí jǐ yī gè xiàn yǒu de diào zǐ pèi shàng qí tā yīn bù， huán yào xué xí zěn yàng zhuàn chéng hé shēng tiáo。
english: Music students learn how to add other parts to add other parts to a given tune, and how to modulate to a related key.

hanzi: 我浑身疼痛。
pinyin: wǒ hún shēn téng tòng。
english: I ache all over.

hanzi: 饥饿引起犯罪。
pinyin: jī è yǐn qǐ fàn zuì。
english: Hunger begets crime.

hanzi: 车子毁了一半。
pinyin: jū zi huǐ le yī bàn。
english: Half the car was damaged.

hanzi: 黑天鹅很稀有。
pinyin: Hēi tiān é hěn xī yǒu。
english: A black swan is rare.

hanzi: 哦，也许我错了。
pinyin: ó， yě xǔ wǒ cuò le。
english: Oh, maybe I was wrong.

hanzi: 不要践踏草地。
pinyin: bù yào jiàn tà cǎo dì。
english: Don't trample on the grass.

hanzi: 他在雪中漫步。
pinyin: tā zài xuě zhòng mán bù。
english: He is walking amidst the snow.

hanzi: 我们忠于祖国。
pinyin: wǒ men zhōng yú zǔ guó。
english: We are loyal to our motherland.

hanzi: 他渴望拥有权力。
pinyin: tā kě wàng yōng yǒu quán lì。
english: He was thirsty for power.

hanzi: 瓶上标明有毒。
pinyin: píng shàng biāo míng yǒu dú。
english: The bottle is labeled poison.

hanzi: 他擦去铅笔的痕迹。
pinyin: tā cā qù qiān bǐ de hén jī。
english: He erases pencil marks.

hanzi: 人生幸福易逝。
pinyin: rén shēng xìng fú yì shì。
english: Human happiness is so fragile.

hanzi: 吵闹声使他烦躁。
pinyin: chǎo nào shēng shǐ tā fán zào。
english: The loud noise chafed him.

hanzi: 青蛙跳进了沟里。
pinyin: qīng wā tiào jìn le gōu lǐ。
english: The frog jumped into the ditch.

hanzi: 父辈应当被尊重。
pinyin: fù bèi yīng dāng bèi zūn zhòng。
english: A sire should be respected.

hanzi: 真是倒霉的日子。
pinyin: zhēn shì dǎo méi de rì zi。
english: It's just been one of those days.

hanzi: 她把孩子抱在怀里.
pinyin: tā bǎ hái zi bào zài huái lǐ.
english: She nestled the baby in her arms.

hanzi: 她匆匆赶往机场。
pinyin: tā cōng cōng gǎn wàng jī chǎng。
english: She hurried to the airport.

hanzi: 她一辈子搞戏剧。
pinyin: tā yī bèi zi gǎo xì jù。
english: She is been in the theater all her life.

hanzi: 我喜欢戴银首饰。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan dài yín shǒu shì。
english: I like to wear argentine jewellery.

hanzi: 她一辈子搞戏剧。
pinyin: tā yī bèi zi gǎo xì jù。
english: She is been in the theater all her life.

hanzi: 爱情不分贫富。
pinyin: ài qíng bù fēn pín fù。
english: Love lives in cottages as well as in courts.

hanzi: 他被一头野猪袭击。
pinyin: tā bèi yī tóu yě zhū xí jī。
english: He was attacked by a wild boar.

hanzi: 他被他的老板解雇了。
pinyin: tā bèi tā de lǎo bǎn jiě gù le。
english: He was fired by his boss.

hanzi: 炮兵部署在西边.
pinyin: pào bīng bù shǔ zài xī biān.
english: Artillery was deployed in the west.

hanzi: 有炸鸡肉作晚餐。
pinyin: yǒu zhà jī ròu zuò wǎn cān。
english: There was fried chicken for dinner.

hanzi: 他们衷心欢迎他。
pinyin: tā men zhōng xīn huān yíng tā。
english: They gave him a hearty welcome.

hanzi: 金属遇热则膨胀。
pinyin: jīn shǔ yù rè zé péng zhàng。
english: Metals expand when they are heated.

hanzi: 我们在黑暗中摸索。
pinyin: wǒ men zài hēi àn zhòng mō suo。
english: We groped amid the darkness.

hanzi: 我只耽搁你几分钟。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ dān ge nǐ jǐ fēn zhōng。
english: I'll only keep you a few minutes.

hanzi: 那不是很恰当的话。
pinyin: nà bú shì hěn qià dàng de huà。
english: That was not a very happy remark.

hanzi: 熊猫是珍贵的动物。
pinyin: xióng māo shì zhēn guì de dòng wù。
english: Pandas are precious creatures.

hanzi: 鸽子是和平的象征。
pinyin: gē zǐ shì hé píng de xiàng zhēng。
english: The dove is the symbol of peace.

hanzi: 鸽子是和平的象征。
pinyin: gē zǐ shì hé píng de xiàng zhēng。
english: The dove is the symbol of peace.

hanzi: 我只耽搁你几分钟。
