hanzi: 我疯狂地渴望去完成那件事。
pinyin: wǒ fēng kuáng de kě wàng qù wán chéng nà jiàn shì。
english: I have an insane desire to finish that thing.

hanzi: 这幅画表现的是海上风暴。
pinyin: zhè fú huà biǎo xiàn de shì hǎi shàng fēng bào。
english: This painting is a representation of a storm at sea.

hanzi: 我相信她照顾孤儿是件好事。
pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn tā zhào gu gū ér shì jiàn hǎo shì。
english: I believe it good her taking care of orphans.

hanzi: 他给后世留下了不朽的典范。
pinyin: tā jǐ hòu shì liú xià le bù xiǔ de diǎn fàn。
english: He left behind an immortal example to all posterity.

hanzi: 他总是叹息研究经费不足。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì tàn xí yán jiū jīng fèi bù zú。
english: He always bemoans the shortage of funds for research.

hanzi: 他向高脚酒杯里倒了一些葡萄酒。
pinyin: tā xiàng gāo jué jiǔ bēi lǐ dào le yī xiē pú tao jiǔ。
english: He poured some wine into the goblet.

hanzi: 峡谷常常有河流经过其中。
pinyin: xiá gǔ cháng cháng yǒu hé liú jīng guò qí zhōng。
english: A canyon usually has a river flowing through it.

hanzi: 那次失败是一次难以吞咽的苦果。
pinyin: nà cì shī bài shì yī cì nán yǐ tūn yè de kǔ guǒ。
english: The defeat was a bitter pill to swallow.

hanzi: 史密斯夫人教那些快五岁的儿童。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī fū ren jiào nà xiē kuài wǔ suì de ér tóng。
english: Mrs Smith teaches the rising fives.

hanzi: 这个种植园里有数百名奴隶。
pinyin: zhè gè zhòng zhí yuán lǐ yǒu shù bǎi míng nú lì。
english: There were hundreds of slaves in the plantation.

hanzi: 我了解一些世界上的神秘宗教。
pinyin: wǒ liǎo jiě yī xiē shì jiè shàng de shén mì zōng jiào。
english: I know some world's mystic religions.

hanzi: 这辆卡车最大载重量是一吨。
pinyin: zhè liàng kǎ chē zuì dà zài zhòng liàng shì yī dùn。
english: The maximum load for this lorry is one ton.

hanzi: 我疯狂地渴望去完成那件事。
pinyin: wǒ fēng kuáng de kě wàng qù wán chéng nà jiàn shì。
english: I have an insane desire to finish that thing.

hanzi: 希尔先生和夫人招待客人真周到.
pinyin: xī ěr xiān sheng huò fū ren zhāo dài kè ren zhēn zhōu dào.
english: Mr and Mrs Hill are such good hosts.

hanzi: 饮酒过度的人常常失去记忆。
pinyin: yǐn jiǔ guò dù de rén cháng cháng shī qù jì yì。
english: Alcoholics often suffer from periods of oblivion.

hanzi: 粉刷房间就要把钢琴搬出去。
pinyin: fěn shuà fáng jiān jiù yào bǎ gāng qín bān chū qù。
english: Painting the room involved moving out the piano.

hanzi: 他穿着一条沾满油污的旧牛仔裤。
pinyin: tā chuān zhuó yī tiáo zhān mǎn yóu wū de jiù niú zǎi kù。
english: He wears an oily old pair of jeans.

hanzi: 他点燃了生日蛋糕上的小蜡烛。
pinyin: tā diǎn rán le shēng rì dàn gāo shàng de xiǎo là zhú。
english: He lit the candles on the birthday cake.

hanzi: 以音乐和舞蹈庆祝他的胜利。
pinyin: yǐ yīn yuè huò wǔ dǎo qìng zhù tā de shèng lì。
english: His victory was celebrated with music and dancing.

hanzi: 我把钥匙掉在这附近某个地方了。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ yào shi diào zài zhè fù jìn mǒu gè dì fang le。
english: I dropped my key somewhere about here.

hanzi: 我冒雨出去，结果被淋得湿透了。
pinyin: wǒ mào yǔ chū qù， jié guǒ bèi lìn de shī tòu le。
english: I went out in the rain and got wet through.

hanzi: 阴沉的天气让我们都感到压抑。
pinyin: yīn chén de tiān qì ràng wǒ men dōu gǎn dào yā yì。
english: We were all depressed by the dismal weather.

hanzi: 一片片的锈从旧铁锅上落下。
pinyin: yī piàn piàn de xiù zòng jiù tiě guō shàng luò xià。
english: Flakes of rust are falling from the old iron pan.

hanzi: 女朋友最喜欢的女性同伴或爱人
pinyin: nu:3 péng you zuì xǐ huan de nu:3 xìng tóng bàn huò ài ren
english: A favored female companion or sweetheart.

hanzi: 我们能用半径计算出圆的面积。
pinyin: wǒ men néng yòng bàn jìng jì suàn chū yuán de miàn ji。
english: We can compute the circular area with radius.

hanzi: 我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu xǐ huan xiāng cūn shēng huó de níng jìng。
english: We all like the tranquility of the country life.

hanzi: 我不愿意在交通高峰时间出去。
pinyin: wǒ bù yuàn yì zài jiāo tōng gāo fēng shí jiān chū qù。
english: I don't like to go out during the rush hour.

hanzi: 他拐弯抹角地说她缺乏经验。
pinyin: tā guǎi wān mò jué de shuō tā quē fá jīng yàn。
english: He made oblique references to her lack of experience.

hanzi: 她挣扎著想摆脱那个侵犯她的人.
pinyin: tā zhēng zhá著 xiǎng bǎi tuō nèi gè qīn fàn tā de rén.
english: She struggled to get away from her attacker.

hanzi: 他过去的经历笼罩着神秘气氛。
pinyin: tā guò qu de jīng lì lǒng zhào zhuó shén mì qì fēn。
english: His past is enveloped in a shroud of mystery.

hanzi: 别那么敏感，我不是在批评你。
pinyin: biè nà me mǐn gǎn， wǒ bú shì zài pī píng nǐ。
english: Don't be so sensitive - I was not criticizing you.

hanzi: 我在夏天一个闷热的下午遇见了她。
pinyin: wǒ zài xià tiān yī gè mēn rè de xià wǔ yù jiàn le tā。
english: I met her in a sultry summer afternoon.

hanzi: 咱们来把它们用胶水粘在一块儿。
pinyin: zán men lái bǎ tā men yòng jiāo shuǐ zhān zài yī kuài er。
english: Let's stick them together with gum.

hanzi: 获得冠军的那个弓箭手很年轻。
pinyin: huò dé guàn jūn de nèi gè gōng jiàn shǒu hěn nián qīng。
english: The archer who won the game is very young.

hanzi: 政府将派军驻守沿海的城镇。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jiàng pài jūn zhù shǒu yán hǎi de chéng zhèn。
english: The government will garrison the coastal towns.

hanzi: 这种建筑风格让我感到很压抑。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jiàn zhù fēng gé ràng wǒ gǎn dào hěn yā yì。
english: This kind of architectural style depresses me.

hanzi: 一群人聚拢起来看发生了什么事。
pinyin: yī qún rén jù lǒng qǐ lai kàn fā shēng le shén me shì。
english: A crowd gathered to see what had happened.

hanzi: 我见希尔夫人面熟, 但并不相识.
pinyin: wǒ xiàn xī ěr fū ren miàn shú,  dàn bìng bù xiāng shí.
english: I know Mrs Hill by sight, but we've never met.

hanzi: 男性在身体上要比女性强壮。
pinyin: nán xìng zài shēn tǐ shàng yào bì nu:3 xìng qiáng zhuàng。
english: The male is physically stronger than the female.

hanzi: 我们明天必须离开，真是遗憾。
pinyin: wǒ men míng tiān bì xū lí kāi， zhēn shì yí hàn。
english: It is a pity that we shall have to leave tomorrow.

hanzi: 我们明天必须离开，真是遗憾。
pinyin: wǒ men míng tiān bì xū lí kāi， zhēn shì yí hàn。
english: It is a pity that we shall have to leave tomorrow.

hanzi: 男性在身体上要比女性强壮。
pinyin: nán xìng zài shēn tǐ shàng yào bì nu:3 xìng qiáng zhuàng。
english: The male is physically stronger than the female.

hanzi: 她所有的钱都投放到股票里去了。
pinyin: tā suǒ yǒu de qián dōu tóu fàng dào gǔ piào lǐ qù le。
english: She's got all her money in stocks and shares.

hanzi: 他用蒸汽把信封上的邮票揭下来。
pinyin: tā yòng zhēng qì bǎ xìn fēng shàng de yóu piào jiē xia lai。
english: He steamed the stamp off the envelope.

hanzi: 猎人守候着兔子从洞里出来。
pinyin: liè rén shǒu hòu zhuó tù zi zòng dòng lǐ chū lai。
english: The hunter watched for the hare to come out of the burrow.

hanzi: 听到这个消息，他惊讶得张口结舌。
pinyin: tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xi， tā jīng yà de zhāng kǒu jié shé。
english: On hearing the news, his jaw dropped.

hanzi: 我在夏天一个闷热的下午遇见了她。
pinyin: wǒ zài xià tiān yī gè mēn rè de xià wǔ yù jiàn le tā。
english: I met her in a sultry summer afternoon.

hanzi: 那次宴会上有大量饮料供应。
pinyin: nà cì yàn huì shàng yǒu dà liàng yǐn liào gōng yìng。
english: There was a liberal supply of drinks at the party.

hanzi: 别忘了仔细记下你的开支帐目。
pinyin: biè wàng le zǐ xì jì xià nǐ de kāi zhī zhàng mù。
english: Don't forget to keep a careful tally of what you spend.

hanzi: 财政部原则上反对这些提议。
pinyin: cái zhèng bù yuán zé shàng fǎn duì zhè xie tí yì。
english: The Treasury was opposed in principle to the proposals.

hanzi: 这副马蹄铁该换了，都磨光了。
pinyin: zhè fù mǎ tí tiě gāi huàn le， dōu mò guāng le。
english: This pair of horseshoes has to be changed; it's worn out.

hanzi: 他们说说笑笑，沿着海滩散步。
pinyin: tā men shuō shuō xiào xiào， yán zhe hǎi tān sàn bù。
english: They walked along the beach talking and laughing.

hanzi: 酷热使建筑物上的油漆起了浮泡。
pinyin: kù rè shǐ jiàn zhù wù shàng de yóu qī qǐ le fú pào。
english: The heat had blistered the paint of the building.

hanzi: 驾驶教练让我在邮局停车。
pinyin: jià shǐ jiào liàn ràng wǒ zài yóu jú tíng chē。
english: The driving instructor told me to pull up at the post office.

hanzi: 离婚以后，孩子由父亲监护。
pinyin: lí hūn yǐ hòu， hái zi yóu fù qīn jiān hù。
english: After their divorce, the father was awarded custody of the son.

hanzi: 他对旅行作了十分生动的叙述。
pinyin: tā duì lu:3 xíng zuò le shí fēn shēng dòng de xù shù。
english: He told a very descriptive account of his journey.

hanzi: 你妈妈是个乐呵呵的容易相处的人。
pinyin: nǐ mā ma shì gè yuè hē hē de róng yì xiāng chǔ de rén。
english: Your mother is a jolly, easy-going woman.

hanzi: 她所有的钱都投放到股票里去了。
pinyin: tā suǒ yǒu de qián dōu tóu fàng dào gǔ piào lǐ qù le。
english: She's got all her money in stocks and shares.

hanzi: 碰巧在附近有个公用电话亭。
pinyin: pèng qiǎo zài fù jìn yǒu gè gōng yòng diàn huà tíng。
english: It happened that there was a telephone booth nearby.

hanzi: 他关上了灯，室内一片漆黑。
pinyin: tā guān shàng le dēng， shì nèi yī piàn qī hēi。
english: He turned off the light and the room was in complete darkness.

hanzi: 我若还清所有欠债就分文不剩了.
pinyin: wǒ ruò huán qīng suǒ yǒu qiàn zhài jiù fèn wén bù shèng le.
english: If I pay all my debts I'll have no money left.

hanzi: 他们坐在凉亭里，边喝茶边聊天。
pinyin: tā men zuò zài liáng tíng lǐ， biān hè chá biān liáo tiān。
english: They sat in the arbor and chatted over tea.

hanzi: 昨天的这个时候正刮着狂风。
pinyin: zuó tiān de zhè gè shí hou zhèng guā zhuó kuáng fēng。
english: It was blowing gales of hurricane this time yesterday.

hanzi: 大雪妨碍了这项建筑工程的进行。
pinyin: dà xuě fáng ài le zhè xiàng jiàn zhù gōng chéng de jìn xíng。
english: Heavy snow hindered the construction work.

hanzi: 她如饥似渴地收集一切有关的信息。
pinyin: tā rú jī sì kě de shōu jí yī qiè yǒu guān de xìn xī。
english: She gobbled up all the relevant information.

hanzi: 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。
pinyin: qù nián zhè gè zhèn yǐ yǒu shí qǐ pò chǎn shì jiàn。
english: Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year.

hanzi: 暴风给成千上万的人带来灾难。
pinyin: bào fēng jǐ chéng qiān shàng wàn de rén dài lái zāi nàn。
english: The cyclone brought misery to thousands of people.

hanzi: 打完电话后，请把听筒放回原位。
pinyin: dǎ wán diàn huà hòu， qǐng bǎ tìng tǒng fàng huí yuán wèi。
english: Please put the receiver back after calling.

hanzi: 我们有可能从这片浅滩过河。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu kě néng zòng zhè piàn qiǎn tān guò hé。
english: This shallow ford made it possible for us to cross the river.

hanzi: 我们有可能从这片浅滩过河。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu kě néng zòng zhè piàn qiǎn tān guò hé。
english: This shallow ford made it possible for us to cross the river.

hanzi: 这期的周刊上有一篇有趣的文章。
pinyin: zhè qī de zhōu kān shàng yǒu yī piān yǒu qù de wén zhāng。
english: There is an interesting article in this weekly.

hanzi: 智能并不像品性那样有影响。
pinyin: zhì néng bìng bù xiàng pǐn xìng nà yàng yǒu yǐng xiǎng。
english: It is not intellect that tells so much as character.

hanzi: 一些人反对说，新税法不公平。
pinyin: yī xiē rén fǎn duì shuō， xīn shuì fǎ bù gōng píng。
english: Some people objected that the new tax law was unfair.

hanzi: 在新政权下，事情将会发生变化。
pinyin: zài xīn zhèng quán xià， shì qing jiāng huì fā shēng biàn huà。
english: Things will change under the new regime.

hanzi: 在这个陌生的地方，我觉得很不自在。
pinyin: zài zhè gè mò shēng de dì fang， wǒ jué de hěn bù zì zài。
english: I don't feel at ease in the strange place.

hanzi: 不断增加的失业引起了社会骚乱。
pinyin: bù duàn zēng jiā de shī yè yǐn qǐ le shè huì sāo luàn。
english: The increasing unemployment caused social unrest.

hanzi: 听到这个坏消息，他心里充满恐怖。
pinyin: tīng dào zhè gè huài xiāo xi， tā xīn lǐ chōng mǎn kǒng bù。
english: He was filled with horror at the bad news.

hanzi: 不断发展的经济使农民们富裕起来。
pinyin: bù duàn fā zhǎn de jīng jì shǐ nóng mín men fù yù qǐ lai。
english: The expanding economy enriched the peasants.

hanzi: 我认为我和我女儿之间没有隔阂。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi wǒ huò wǒ nu:3 ér zhī jiān méi yǒu gé hé。
english: I think there is no gulf between my daughter and I.

hanzi: 这些是文艺复兴时期的文化遗产。
pinyin: zhè xie shì wén yì fù xīng shí qī de wén huà yí chǎn。
english: These are the cultural legacies of the Renaissance.

hanzi: 我们点燃了蜡烛，蜡烛照亮了房间。
pinyin: wǒ men diǎn rán le là zhú， là zhú zhào liàng le fáng jiān。
english: We lit the candle and the candle lit the room.

hanzi: 向公司索取退款手续很复杂。
pinyin: xiàng gōng sī suǒ qǔ tuì kuǎn shǒu xù hěn fù zá。
english: Obtaining a refund from the company is a complicated procedure.

hanzi: 他的关于种族隔离的谈话激起了骚动。
pinyin: tā de guān yú zhǒng zú gé lí de tán huà jī qǐ le sāo dòng。
english: His talk about apartheid created agitation.

hanzi: 他们俩在公园的长凳上拥抱亲吻。
pinyin: tā men liǎng zài gōng yuán de zhǎng dèng shàng yōng bào qīn wěn。
english: The two of them were necking on a park bench.

hanzi: 他有权威，但并不想控制别人。
pinyin: tā yǒu quán wēi， dàn bìng bù xiǎng kòng zhì bié rén。
english: He has authority, but he doesn't try to dominate others.

hanzi: 议会将在下周辩论国有化议题。
pinyin: yì huì jiàng zài xià zhōu biàn lùn guó yǒu huà yì tí。
english: Parliament will debate the nationalization issue next week.

hanzi: 我是在教堂的门廊处遇到那个人的。
pinyin: wǒ shì zài jiào táng de mén láng chù yù dào nèi gè rén de。
english: I met that person at the porch of the church.

hanzi: 他们宁愿去钓鱼，也不愿待在家里。
pinyin: tā men nìng yuàn qù diào yú， yě bù yuàn dài zài jiā lǐ。
english: They would rather go fishing than stay at home.

hanzi: 新的税收制度将于明年实行。
pinyin: xīn de shuì shōu zhì dù jiàng yú míng nián shí xíng。
english: A new system of taxation will be brought into effect next year.

hanzi: 他有才干能在本行业中首屈一指。
pinyin: tā yǒu cái gàn néng zài běn háng yè zhòng shǒu qū yī zhǐ。
english: His ability carried him to the top of his profession.

hanzi: 他为什么到那里去，这对我来说是个谜。
pinyin: tā wèi shén me dào nà li qù， zhè duì wǒ lái shuō shì gè mí。
english: Why he went there is a mystery to me.

hanzi: 他挤进两人中间，阻止他们打架。
pinyin: tā jǐ jìn liǎng rén zhōng jiān， zǔ zhǐ tā men dǎ jià。
english: He interposed himself between them to stop them fighting.

hanzi: 满是尘土的路弄得行人也满面尘土了。
pinyin: mǎn shì chén tǔ de lù nòng de xíng rén yě mǎn miàn chén tǔ le。
english: The dusty road made the travelers dusty too.

hanzi: 我们会把决定及早通知申请者。
pinyin: wǒ men kuài bǎ jué dìng jí zǎo tōng zhī shēn qǐng zhě。
english: Applicants will be notified of our decision in good season.

hanzi: 她只有坐在壁炉前才感觉到暖和。
pinyin: tā zhǐ yǒu zuò zài bì lú qián cái gǎn jué dào nuǎn huó。
english: She felt warm only when she sat before the fireplace.

hanzi: 他不听母亲的劝告，参加了那次聚会。
pinyin: tā bù tìng mǔ qīn de quàn gào， cān jiā le nà cì jù huì。
english: He disobeyed his mother and went to the party.

hanzi: 圣诞节是基督教徒的一个重要节日。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié shì Jī dū jiào tú de yī gè zhòng yào jié rì。
english: Christmas is an important feast for Christians.

hanzi: 我们会把决定及早通知申请者。
pinyin: wǒ men kuài bǎ jué dìng jí zǎo tōng zhī shēn qǐng zhě。
english: Applicants will be notified of our decision in good season.

hanzi: 他将作为伟大的政治家而载入史册。
pinyin: tā jiàng zuò wéi wěi dà de zhèng zhì jiā ér zǎi rù shǐ cè。
english: He will go down in history as a great statesman.

hanzi: 他在密西西比河流域拥有一个大农场。
pinyin: tā zài mì xī xī bì hé liú yù yōng yǒu yī gè dà nóng chǎng。
english: He has a large farm in the Mississippi Valley.

hanzi: 他以两杆的成绩赢得了这场高尔夫球赛。
pinyin: tā yǐ liǎng gǎn de chéng jī yíng dé le zhè chǎng gāo ěr fū qiú sài。
english: He won the golf match by two shots.

hanzi: 听音乐对她起了一种镇静的作用。
pinyin: tìng yīn yuè duì tā qǐ le yī zhòng zhèn jìng de zuò yòng。
english: Listening to the music has a calming influence on her.

hanzi: 他为什么到那里去，这对我来说是个谜。
pinyin: tā wèi shén me dào nà li qù， zhè duì wǒ lái shuō shì gè mí。
english: Why he went there is a mystery to me.

hanzi: 大群人聚集在展览大厅的门口。
pinyin: dà qún rén jù jí zài zhǎn lǎn dà tīng de mén kǒu。
english: A multitude of people gathered at the gate of the exhibition hall.

hanzi: 海关人员问我是否有要报税的东西。
pinyin: hǎi guān rén yuán wèn wǒ shì fǒu yǒu yào bào shuì de dōng xi。
english: The customs asked me if I had anything to declare.

hanzi: 海关人员问我是否有要报税的东西。
pinyin: hǎi guān rén yuán wèn wǒ shì fǒu yǒu yào bào shuì de dōng xi。
english: The customs asked me if I had anything to declare.

hanzi: 他病了很久，因此耽误了功课。
pinyin: tā bìng le hěn jiǔ， yīn cǐ dān wu le gōng kè。
english: He had been ill for a long time and consequently he was behind in his work.

hanzi: 在这座陌生的城市里，她感到很寂寞。
pinyin: zài zhè zuò mò shēng de chéng shì lǐ， tā gǎn dào hěn jì mò。
english: She feels rather lonely in the strange town.

hanzi: 我刚才把你的一个瓷器装饰品弄掉了。
pinyin: wǒ gāng cái bǎ nǐ de yī gè cí qì zhuāng shì pǐn nòng diào le。
english: I've just dropped one of your china ornamental.

hanzi: 工会为争取更好的工作条件而罢工。
pinyin: gōng huì wèi zhēng qǔ gèng hǎo de gōng zuò tiáo jiàn ér bà gōng。
english: The union struck for better work conditions.

hanzi: 他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革。
pinyin: tā men yāo qiú duì shuì shōu zhì dù jìn xíng gēn běn gǎi gé。
english: They called for a radical reform of our tax system.

hanzi: 除非出现奇迹, 不然我们现在是输定了.
pinyin: chú fēi chū xiàn qí jì,  bù rán wǒ men xiàn zài shì shū dìng le.
english: Short of a miracle, we're certain to lose now.

hanzi: 所有的申请者一个接着一个参加面试。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de shēn qǐng zhě yī gè jiē zhe yī gè cān jiā miàn shì。
english: All the applicants were interviewed one by one.

hanzi: 请把面粉和牛奶调至恰当的浓度。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ miàn fěn huò niú nǎi tiáo zhì qià dàng de nóng dù。
english: Please mix the flour and milk to the right consistency.

hanzi: 群众聚集在国王要经过的街道旁。
pinyin: qún zhòng jù jí zài guó wáng yào jīng guò de jiē dào páng。
english: Crowds massed along the road where the king would pass.

hanzi: 如果你再迟到，老板就会把你解雇。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zài chí dào， lǎo bǎn jiù kuài bǎ nǐ jiě gù。
english: If you are late again the boss will give you the sack.

hanzi: 警方把建筑物的所有出口都封锁住了.
pinyin: jǐng fāng bǎ jiàn zhù wù de suǒ yǒu chū kǒu dōu fēng suǒ zhù le.
english: Police sealed off all the exits from the building.

hanzi: 如果机器出故障，就把开关关掉。
pinyin: rú guǒ jī qì chū gù zhàng， jiù bǎ kāi guān guān diào。
english: Turn off the switch when anything goes wrong with the machine.

hanzi: 他最近去世给家庭聚会蒙上了阴影。
pinyin: tā zuì jìn qù shì jǐ jiā tíng jù huì měng shàng le yīn yǐng。
english: His recent death overshadowed the family gathering.

hanzi: 只留下一些被太阳晒得泛白的枯骨。
pinyin: zhǐ liú xià yī xiē bèi tài yáng shài de fàn bái de kū gǔ。
english: There were only a few dry bones left, bleached by the sun.

hanzi: 每周六琴在村里的公用草地上骑马。
pinyin: měi zhōu liù qín zài cūn lǐ de gōng yòng cǎo dì shàng qí mǎ。
english: Every Saturday Jean went riding on the village common.

hanzi: 销售经理想在远东开辟新市场。
pinyin: xiāo shòu jīng lǐ xiǎng zài yuǎn dōng kāi pì xīn shì chǎng。
english: The sales manager wants to open up new markets in the Far East.

hanzi: 他呆在幕后为了避开公众的注意。
pinyin: tā dāi zài mù hòu wèi le bì kāi gōng zhòng de zhù yì。
english: He stayed in the background to escape from the public attention.

hanzi: 那家商场的西洋梳镜柜看上去很特别。
pinyin: nà jiā shāng chǎng de xī yáng shū jìng jǔ kàn shàng qù hěn tè bié。
english: The chiffonier in that shop looks special.

hanzi: 这个小镇很适宜于一位青年医生安家。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo zhèn hěn shì yí yú yī wèi qīng nián yī shēng ān jiā。
english: The town is a good location for a young doctor.

hanzi: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法。
pinyin: kē xué jiā réng zài xún qiú zhì liáo gǎn mào de fāng fǎ。
english: Scientists are still searching for a cure to the common cold.

hanzi: 我送给她一条编织的披肩作圣诞礼物。
pinyin: wǒ sòng jǐ tā yī tiáo biān zhī de pī jiān zuò Shèng dàn lǐ wù。
english: I gave her a knitted shawl as a Christmas gift.

hanzi: 这座城市已经把旧的电车轨道拆除了。
pinyin: zhè zuò chéng shì yǐ jīng bǎ jiù de diàn chē guǐ dào chāi chú le。
english: The city has taken the old streetcar tracks up.

hanzi: 他公然蔑视上司，并要求他作出解释。
pinyin: tā gōng rán miè shì shàng si， bìng yāo qiú tā zuò chū jiě shì。
english: He bearded his boss and demanded an explanation.

hanzi: 政府力图在这个问题上保持低姿态。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ lì tú zài zhè gè wèn tí shàng bǎo chí dī zī tài。
english: The government is trying to keep a low profile on this issue.

hanzi: 别把热水倒进玻璃杯里，不然它会炸的。
pinyin: biè bǎ rè shuǐ dào jìn bō li bēi lǐ， bù rán tā kuài zhà de。
english: Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.

hanzi: 我们喜欢观赏初升太阳的灿烂光辉。
pinyin: wǒ men xǐ huan guān shǎng chū shēng tài yáng de càn làn guāng huī。
english: We enjoy seeing the glorious beams of the rising sun.

hanzi: 她太倒霉了，休假第一天就感冒了。
pinyin: tā tài dǎo méi le， xiū jià dì yī tiān jiù gǎn mào le。
english: She was unlucky to catch a cold on the first day of her holiday.

hanzi: 整顿饭都很好, 尤其是葡萄酒更好.
pinyin: zhěng dùn fàn dōu hěn hǎo,  yóu qí shì pú tao jiǔ gèng hǎo.
english: The whole meal was good but the wine in particular was excellent.

hanzi: 听到朋友死亡的消息，她难过地哭了。
pinyin: tīng dào péng you sǐ wáng de xiāo xi， tā nán guò de kū le。
english: She cried with grief when she heard news of her friend's death.

hanzi: 史密斯教授曾做过总统的特别顾问。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī jiào shòu zēng zuò guò zǒng tǒng de tè bié gù wèn。
english: Professor Smith served as special adviser to the President.

hanzi: 人类是在幼年开始学习第一种语言的。
pinyin: rén lèi shì zài yòu nián kāi shǐ xué xí dì yī zhòng yǔ yán de。
english: Mankind learns its first language in early childhood.

hanzi: 史密斯先生在政府的行政部门工作。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiān sheng zài zhèng fǔ de xíng zhèng bù mén gōng zuò。
english: Mr. Smith works in an executive branch of the government.

hanzi: 这家公司必须克服对采用新技术的阻力.
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī bì xū kè fú duì cǎi yòng xīn jì shù de zǔ lì.
english: The firm has to overcome its resistance to new technology.

hanzi: 史密斯先生在政府的行政部门工作。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiān sheng zài zhèng fǔ de xíng zhèng bù mén gōng zuò。
english: Mr. Smith works in an executive branch of the government.

hanzi: 偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首。
pinyin: ǒu rán de xiāng yù shǐ liǎng wèi lǎo péng you chóng xīn jù shǒu。
english: A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again.

hanzi: 咱们索性把蛋糕吃完吧, 也没剩多少了.
pinyin: zán men suǒ xìng bǎ dàn gāo chī wán ba,  yě mò shèng duō shao le.
english: We might as well finish (up) the cake; there isn't much left.

hanzi: 我希望他成为钢琴家的梦想可以成真。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng tā chéng wéi gāng qín jiā de mèng xiǎng kě yǐ chéng zhēn。
english: I hope his dream of becoming a pianist will come true.

hanzi: 雇用了没参加工会的工人以结束罢工行动.
pinyin: gù yòng le mò cān jiā gōng huì de gōng rén yǐ jié shù bà gōng xíng dòng.
english: Non-union labour was used to end the strike.

hanzi: 在重要的节日, 人们把国旗悬挂在门外。
pinyin: zài zhòng yào de jié rì,  rén men bǎ guó qí xuán guà zài mén wài。
english: People hang national flags out on important holidays.

hanzi: 基督派基督十二使徒之一宣传他的教义。
pinyin: Jī dū pài Jī dū shí èr shǐ tú zhī yī xuān chuán tā de jiào yì。
english: Apostles were sent out by Christ to spread his teachings.

hanzi: 从资料库借磁带是退而求其次的办法。
pinyin: zòng zī liào kù jiè cí dài shì tuì ér qiú qí cì de bàn fǎ。
english: Borrowing tapes from the library would be the next-best thing.

hanzi: 在这场足球赛中，他主罚，踢进了一个球。
pinyin: zài zhè chǎng zú qiú sài zhòng， tā zhǔ fá， tī jìn le yī gè qiú。
english: He kicked a penalty goal in the football match.

hanzi: 他被家庭束缚，不能再到处去旅游了。
pinyin: tā bèi jiā tíng shù fù， bù néng zài dào chù qù lu:3 yóu le。
english: He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer.

hanzi: 许多人都相信监禁解决不了犯罪问题。
pinyin: xǔ duō rén dōu xiāng xìn jiān jìn jiě jué bù liǎo fàn zuì wèn tí。
english: Many people believe that prison isn't a cure for crime.

hanzi: 我们已经收到了对该节目的一连串投诉。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng shōu dào le duì gāi jié mù de yī lián chuàn tóu sù。
english: We have had a string of complaints about the program.

hanzi: 犯人从大门口的警卫身旁溜过逃走了.
pinyin: fàn rén zòng dà mén kǒu de jǐng wèi shēn páng liū guò táo zǒu le.
english: The prisoner slipped past the guards on the gate and escaped.

hanzi: 那项发现在科学界引起极大的震动。
pinyin: nà xiàng fā xiàn zài kē xué jiè yǐn qǐ jí dà de zhèn dòng。
english: The discovery caused a tremendous commotion in the scientific world.

hanzi: 那个寄居者在威尔士已经逗留了两个星期。
pinyin: nèi gè jì jū zhě zài wēi ěr shì yǐ jīng dòu liú le liǎng gè xīng qī。
english: The sojourner has been in Wales for two weeks.

hanzi: 无轨电车的电能是通过架空线供给的。
pinyin: wú guǐ diàn chē de diàn néng shì tōng guò jià kòng xiàn gōng gěi de。
english: The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.

hanzi: 有些罪犯被释放后有可能重新犯罪。
pinyin: yǒu xiē zuì fàn bèi shì fàng hòu yǒu kě néng chóng xīn fàn zuì。
english: Some criminals are likely to offend again when they are released.

hanzi: 勉强他做事不是教育孩子的办法。
pinyin: miǎn qiǎng tā zuò shì bú shì jiào yù hái zi de bàn fǎ。
english: It is not the way to educate a child by making him do things against his will.

hanzi: 教士那圆润低沉的声音在教堂里回响。
pinyin: jiào shì nà yuán rùn dī chén de shēng yīn zài jiào táng lǐ huí xiǎng。
english: The sonorous voice of the priest resounded in the church.

hanzi: 财务上出现问题延误了我们的建设计画。
pinyin: cái wù shàng chū xiàn wèn tí yán wù le wǒ men de jiàn shè jì huà。
english: Financial problems have set back our building programme.

hanzi: 这个学生敏捷的回答得到了老师的表扬。
pinyin: zhè gè xué sheng mǐn jié de huí dá dé dào le lǎo shī de biǎo yáng。
english: The student's speedy answers were praised by the teacher.

hanzi: 他们跟她开玩笑, 把她往游泳池里浸了一下.
pinyin: tā men gēn tā kāi wán xiào,  bǎ tā wàng yóu yǒng chí lǐ jìn le yī xià.
english: They dunked her in the swimming-pool as a joke.

hanzi: 他申请出国签证经历了很大的困难。
pinyin: tā shēn qǐng chū guó qiān zhèng jīng lì le hěn dà de kùn nan。
english: He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.

hanzi: 这个勤奋的学生每天天亮以前就起床了。
pinyin: zhè gè qín fèn de xué sheng měi tiān tiān liàng yǐ qián jiù qǐ chuáng le。
english: The diligent student gets up before dawn every day.

hanzi: 我大声打了个呵欠，可他还是不停地讲下去。
pinyin: wǒ dà shēng dǎ le gè hē qiàn， kě tā hái shì bù tíng de jiǎng xià qu。
english: I gave a loud yawn, but he just kept on talking.

hanzi: 该足球队员向旁边跨步以避开对方拦截动作.
pinyin: gāi zú qiú duì yuán xiàng páng biān kuà bù yǐ bì kāi duì fāng lán jié dòng zuò.
english: The footballer side-stepped the tackle.

hanzi: 我在卧室里发现两只袜子, 但不成对。
pinyin: wǒ zài wò shì lǐ fā xiàn liǎng zhǐ wà zi,  dàn bù chéng duì。
english: I found a couple of socks in the bedroom, but they don't make a pair.

hanzi: 通过勤查字典，他掌握了这些单词。
pinyin: tōng guò qín zhā zì diǎn， tā zhǎng wò le zhè xie dān cí。
english: He mastered these words through the arduous consultation of the dictionary.

hanzi: 精神病院常雇用男护士护理精神病人.
pinyin: jīng shén bìng yuàn cháng gù yòng nán hù shi hù lǐ jīng shén bìng rén.
english: Male nurses are often employed in hospitals for the mentally ill.

hanzi: 你若对我们的报价感兴趣，请与我们联系。
pinyin: nǐ ruò duì wǒ men de bào jià gǎn xìng qu， qǐng yù wǒ men lián xì。
english: Should you be interested in our offer, please contact us.

hanzi: 发展的主要障碍是这个国家人口太多。
pinyin: fā zhǎn de zhǔ yào zhàng ài shì zhè gè guó jiā rén kǒu tài duō。
english: The main impediment to development is the country's large population.

hanzi: 突然窗帘拉了开来，一道强光照了进来。
pinyin: tū rán chuāng lián lā le kāi lái， yī dào qiáng guāng zhào le jìn lái。
english: The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.

hanzi: 警察在小偷的家里发现了一些被盗的财物。
pinyin: jǐng chá zài xiǎo tōu de jiā lǐ fā xiàn le yī xiē bèi dào de cái wù。
english: The police found some stolen property in the thief's house.

hanzi: 殖民地的人们拿起武器反抗英国统治者。
pinyin: zhí mín dì de rén men ná qǐ wǔ qì fǎn kàng Yīng guó tǒng zhì zhē。
english: The colonists took up weapons to rebel against the British ruler.

hanzi: 现代神话现代被浪漫化或普遍流行的神话
pinyin: xiàn dài shén huà xiàn dài bèi làng màn huà huò pǔ biàn liú xíng de shén huà
english: A romanticized or popularized myth of modern times.

hanzi: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。
pinyin: bù zhǎng jiù jú shì de zuì xīn fā zhǎn zuò le lìng yī pān jiě shì。
english: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.

hanzi: 在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。
pinyin: zài Rì běn， bàng qiú bì qí tā rèn hé yùn dòng dōu shòu rén huān yíng。
english: Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.

hanzi: 风向的突然转变预示着暴风雨即将来临。
pinyin: fēng xiàng de tū rán zhuǎn biàn yù shì zhuó bào fēng yǔ jí jiāng lái lín。
english: A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm.

hanzi: 政治和宗教是人们平常交谈的主要话题。
pinyin: zhèng zhì huò zōng jiào shì rén men píng cháng jiāo tán de zhǔ yào huà tí。
english: Politics and religion are daily topics of conversation.

hanzi: 他新拍摄的电影确实受到评论家严厉的批评。
pinyin: tā xīn pāi shè de diàn yǐng què shí shòu dào píng lùn jiā yán lì de pī píng。
english: His new film was really panned by the critics.

hanzi: 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害。
pinyin: zhè míng jì zhě yīn wèi shì tú jiē lù yī gè yīn móu ér bèi shā hài。
english: The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.

hanzi: 她抬起头来，凝望着十二月份阴沉沉的天空。
pinyin: tā tái qǐ tou lái， níng wàng zhuó shí èr yuè fèn yīn chén chén de tiān kōng。
english: She looked up staring at the sombre December sky.

hanzi: 根据解剖结果，此人死于心脏病发作。
pinyin: gēn jù jiě pōu jié guǒ， cǐ rén sǐ yú xīn zàng bìng fā zuò。
english: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

hanzi: 你只要一看见她的脸就会明白，她是无辜的。
pinyin: nǐ zhǐ yào yī kàn jiàn tā de liǎn jiù kuài míng bai， tā shì wú gū de。
english: A glimpse of her face will tell you that she is innocent.

hanzi: 很多种类的动物现在已经从地球上绝迹了。
pinyin: hěn duō zhǒng lèi de dòng wù xiàn zài yǐ jīng zòng dì qiú shàng jué jī le。
english: Many types of animals have now vanished from the earth.

hanzi: 那是一个以几种语言叙述的古老的故事。
pinyin: nà shì yī gè yǐ jǐ zhòng yǔ yán xù shù de gǔ lǎo de gù shì。
english: It's an ancient tale which appears in various guises in several languages.

hanzi: 那是一个以几种语言叙述的古老的故事。
pinyin: nà shì yī gè yǐ jǐ zhòng yǔ yán xù shù de gǔ lǎo de gù shì。
english: It's an ancient tale which appears in various guises in several languages.

hanzi: 我们可以听到远处传来的车辆往来的嗡嗡声。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ tīng dào yuǎn chù zhuàn lái de chē liàng wǎng lái de wēng wēng shēng。
english: We could hear the distant drone of the traffic.

hanzi: 他并没有把这首诗的意义真正揭示出来.
pinyin: tā bìng méi yǒu bǎ zhè shǒu shī de yì yì zhēn zhèng jiē shì chū lai.
english: The meaning of the poem doesn't really come out in his interpretation.

hanzi: 我请求他从新疆回来时给我带些葡萄干。
pinyin: wǒ qǐng qiú tā zòng xīn jiāng huí lai shí jǐ wǒ dài xiē pú tao gàn。
english: I asked him to bring me some raisins when he returns from Xinjiang.

hanzi: 这家公司现在使用电脑来计算所有的帐目。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī xiàn zài shǐ yòng diàn nǎo lái jì suàn suǒ yǒu de zhàng mù。
english: The company now uses a computer to do all its account.

hanzi: 我们经济的决定性因素是控制通货膨胀。
pinyin: wǒ men jīng jì de jué dìng xìng yīn sù shì kòng zhì tōng huò péng zhàng。
english: The determinate factor of our economy is to control inflation.

hanzi: 因为我的愚蠢，我不得不站起来听他的批评。
pinyin: yīn wèi wǒ de yú chǔn， wǒ bù dé bù zhàn qǐ lai tìng tā de pī píng。
english: I have to stand up listening to his criticism of my foolishness.

hanzi: 在以后的岁月中，他一直记着她临别时的一吻。
pinyin: zài yǐ hòu de suì yuè zhòng， tā yī zhí jì zhuó tā lín biè shí de yī wěn。
english: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

hanzi: 他有个主意，以纯白为背景给他们拍摄。
pinyin: tā yǒu gè zhǔ yi， yǐ chún bái wèi bèi jǐng jǐ tā men pāi shè。
english: He had the idea of shooting them against a complete plain white background.

hanzi: 警方还未得到可捉拿这个罪犯的足够情报。
pinyin: jǐng fāng huán wèi dé dào kě zhuō ná zhè gè zuì fàn de zú gòu qíng bào。
english: The police haven't got enough information to catch the criminal.

hanzi: 这次聚会一定没意思--咱们想个法子别去了.
pinyin: zhè cì jù huì yī dìng mò yì si-- zán men xiǎng gè fǎ zi biè qù le.
english: It's bound to be a boring party let's try to wangle out of it/going.

hanzi: 在以后的岁月中，他一直记着她临别时的一吻。
pinyin: zài yǐ hòu de suì yuè zhòng， tā yī zhí jì zhuó tā lín biè shí de yī wěn。
english: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

hanzi: 我们送些酬劳，对您的大力协助聊表谢意。
pinyin: wǒ men sòng xiē chóu láo， duì nín de dà lì xié zhù liáo biǎo xiè yì。
english: We are sending you some money in acknowledgement of your valuable help.

hanzi: 据说法国人是世界上最浪漫的民族之一。
pinyin: jù shuō fǎ guó rén shì shì jiè shàng zuì làng màn de mín zú zhī yī。
english: It is said that Frenchmen are among the most romantic people in the world.

hanzi: 我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包。
pinyin: wǒ zài jiē dào duì miàn de lián suǒ shāng diàn lǐ mǎi le zhè zhǐ miàn bāo。
english: I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.

hanzi: 女主人给我们端上来一大盘热气腾腾的饺子。
pinyin: nu:3 zhǔ rén jǐ wǒ men duān shàng lái yī dà pán rè qì téng téng de jiǎo zi。
english: Our hostess served up a large plate of steaming hot dumplings.

hanzi: 他打了个呵欠，揉了揉眼睛，就到前边屋里去了。
pinyin: tā dǎ le gè hē qiàn， róu le róu yǎn jīng， jiù dào qián biān wū lǐ qù le。
english: He yawned, rubbed his eyes and went into the front room.

hanzi: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。
pinyin: nǐ huò xǔ yǒu quán yāo qiú tuì huí qu nián nǐ jiāo fù de bù fen shuì jīn。
english: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

hanzi: 我们应该团结起来为消除贫穷和疾病而斗争.
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi tuán jié qǐ lai wèi xiāo chú pín qióng huò jí bìng ér dòu zhēng.
english: We should unite in fighting/unite to fight poverty and disease.

hanzi: 我们从悬崖顶上的高处能看到城市的全景。
pinyin: wǒ men zòng xuán yá dǐng shàng de gāo chù néng kàn dào chéng shì de quán jǐng。
english: From our perch up there on top of the cliff we can see the whole town.

hanzi: 英格兰队如果不改进打法, 就会输掉这场比赛.
pinyin: yīng gé lán duì rú guǒ bù gǎi jìn dǎ fǎ,  jiù kuài shū diào zhè chǎng bǐ sài.
english: Unless England improve their game they're going to lose the match.

hanzi: 年轻姑娘必须言词谨慎，衣着得体，行为端庄。
pinyin: nián qīng gū niang bì xū yán cí jǐn shèn， yī zhuó de tǐ， xíng wéi duān zhuāng。
english: Young girls must be modest in speech, dress and behavior.

hanzi: 天气干旱了这么久，这场雨成了农民的救星。
pinyin: tiān qì gān hàn le zhè me jiǔ， zhè chǎng yǔ chéng le nóng mín de jiù xīng。
english: After so much dry weather, the rain has been the farmer's salvation.

hanzi: 我对发生的每件事的细枝末节都记得清清楚楚。
pinyin: wǒ duì fā shēng de měi jiàn shì de xì zhī mò jié dōu jì de qīng qīng chu chǔ。
english: I had remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.

hanzi: 想在这样大的暴风雪中去爬山简直是疯狂。
pinyin: xiǎng zài zhè yàng dà de bào fēng xuě zhòng qù pá shān jiǎn zhí shì fēng kuáng。
english: It would be madness to try to climb the mountain in such a snowstorm.

hanzi: 签定这一协议是两国关系加强的序幕。
pinyin: qiān dìng zhè yī xié yì shì liǎng guó guān xi jiā qiáng de xù mù。
english: The signing of the agreement was a prologue to better relations between the two countries.

hanzi: 新法令授予警察可以在街上截停任何人的权利。
pinyin: xīn fǎ lìng shòu yǔ jǐng chá kě yǐ zài jiē shàng jié tíng rèn hé rén de quán lì。
english: The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.

hanzi: 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰。
pinyin: tā men zài è liè de tiān qì tiáo jiàn xià dēng shàng le shān de dǐng fēng。
english: They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions.

hanzi: 他们把自己的家变成了无家可归的孤儿们的避难所。
pinyin: tā men bǎ zì jǐ de jiā biàn chéng le wú jiā kě guī de gū ér men de bì nán suǒ。
english: They have made their home a haven for the homeless orphans.

hanzi: 将军推测说敌人将于今天晚上突袭我们。
pinyin: jiāng jūn tuī cè shuō dí rén jiàng yú jīn tiān wǎn shang tū xí wǒ men。
english: The general conjectures that the enemy will launch an attack against us this night.

hanzi: 他们探索过各种途径，但是没有找到解决的办法。
pinyin: tā men tàn suǒ guò gè zhǒng tú jìng， dàn shì méi yǒu zhǎo dào jiě jué de bàn fǎ。
english: They exploded every avenue but could not find a solution.

hanzi: 他因未对事故进行汇报而受到委员会的批评。
pinyin: tā yīn wèi duì shì gù jìn xíng huì bào ér shòu dào wěi yuán huì de pī píng。
english: He was criticized by the committee for failing to report the accident.

hanzi: 我父母发现窗子被打破后，一定会有一番斥责。
pinyin: wǒ fù mǔ fā xiàn chuāng zǐ bèi dǎ pò hòu， yī dìng kuài yǒu yī pān chì zé。
english: There is sure to be a fuss when my parents find the window is broken.

hanzi: 政府在独立的问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zài dú lì de wèn tí shàng cǎi qǔ le háo bú tuǒ xié de tài du。
english: The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.

hanzi: 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰。
pinyin: tā men zài è liè de tiān qì tiáo jiàn xià dēng shàng le shān de dǐng fēng。
english: They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions.

hanzi: 他们在恶劣的天气条件下登上了山的顶峰。
pinyin: tā men zài è liè de tiān qì tiáo jiàn xià dēng shàng le shān de dǐng fēng。
english: They climbed up the last part of the mountain in formidable weather conditions.

hanzi: 税务法非常复杂，只有专家才能解释清楚。
pinyin: shuì wù fǎ fēi cháng fù zá， zhǐ yǒu zhuān jiā cái néng jiě shì qīng chu。
english: The tax laws are so complicated that only an expert can provide enlightenment.

hanzi: 她戴了那么多首饰，看上去象是包在金子里似的。
pinyin: tā dài le nà me duō shǒu shì， kàn shàng qù xiàng shì bāo zài jīn zi lǐ sì de。
english: She wore so much jewellery that she seemed to be covered in gold.

hanzi: 我们正考虑在这样的事情上给他们更多的发言权。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng kǎo lu:4 zài zhè yàng de shì qing shàng jǐ tā men gèng duō de fā yán quán。
english: We are considering giving them greater say in such matters.

hanzi: 拉丁语系, 例如法语, 意大利语, 都起源于拉丁语。
pinyin: Lā dīng yǔ xì,  lì rú fǎ yǔ,  yì dà lì yù,  dōu qǐ yuán yú Lā dīng yǔ。
english: The Roman languages such as French, Italian, are all derived from Latin.

hanzi: 在合作社中, 利润是在全体劳动者中进行分配的.
pinyin: zài hé zuò shè zhòng,  lì rùn shì zài quán tǐ láo dòng zhe zhòng jìn xíng fēn pèi de.
english: In a co-operative profits are distributed among the work-force.

hanzi: 他从巴黎回来，发现他的办公室被别人占了。
pinyin: tā zòng Bā lí huí lai， fā xiàn tā de bàn gōng shì bèi bié rén zhàn le。
english: He returned from Paris and found his office was under someone else's occupation.

hanzi: 她在科学方面的倾向性在孩童时代就已显现出来。
pinyin: tā zài kē xué fāng miàn de qīng xiàng xìng zài hái tóng shí dài jiù yǐ xiǎn xiàn chū lai。
english: Her scientific bias showed itself in early childhood.

hanzi: 他同时具有创造性想象力和真正的治学谨严学风。
pinyin: tā tóng shí jù yǒu chuàng zào xìng xiǎng xiàng lì huò zhēn zhèng de zhì xué jǐn yán xué fēng。
english: He combines creative imagination and true scholarship.

hanzi: 这个国家同意为了共同的安全而与邻国结盟。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā tóng yì wèi le gòng tóng de ān quán ér yù lín guó jié méng。
english: The country agreed to confederate with the neighboring country for mutual safety.

hanzi: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang lǒng zhào zài shén mì qì fēn xià， jì xù shǐ yóu lǎn zhě zháo mí。
english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

hanzi: 看到我的生日礼物受到极大的赞赏，我感到高兴。
pinyin: kàn dào wǒ de shēng rì lǐ wù shòu dào jí dà de zàn shǎng， wǒ gǎn dào gāo xìng。
english: I was gratified to see how much my birthday present was appreciated.

hanzi: 我们只能做些较小的让步，但这就可能打破僵局。
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ néng zuò xiē jiào xiǎo de ràng bù， dàn zhè jiù kě néng dǎ pò jiāng jú。
english: We can only make minor concessions, but it might break the deadlock.

hanzi: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang lǒng zhào zài shén mì qì fēn xià， jì xù shǐ yóu lǎn zhě zháo mí。
english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

hanzi: 许多富商靠极其残酷地践踏别人而爬了上去。
pinyin: xǔ duō fù shāng kào jí qí cán kù de jiàn tà bié rén ér pá le shàng qù。
english: Many a rich businessman reached the top by trampling on others in the most brutal way.

hanzi: 组织这样大规模的聚会要花费许多时间和精力。
pinyin: zǔ zhī zhè yàng dà guī mó de jù huì yào huā fèi xǔ duō shí jiān huò jīng lì。
english: The organization of such a large-scale party takes a lot of time and energy.

hanzi: 不论何时我到台北，我一定去参观故宫博物院。
pinyin: bù lùn hé shí wǒ dào Tái běi， wǒ yī dìng qù cān guān gù gōng bó wù yuàn。
english: Whenever I go to Taipei, I make a point of visiting the National Palace Museum.

hanzi: 他这个人很没意思, 在聚会上我总是对他退避三舍.
pinyin: tā zhè gè rén hěn mò yì si,  zài jù huì shàng wǒ zǒng shì duì tā tuì bì sān shè.
english: He's so boring that I always try to give him a wide berth at parties.

hanzi: 因为地震，每天飞往这个城市的航班暂停了。
pinyin: yīn wèi dì zhèn， měi tiān fēi wàng zhè gè chéng shì de háng bān zàn tíng le。
english: The daily flight to the city has been temporarily suspended because of the earthquake.

hanzi: 他们正在恶狠狠地争吵，我想他们可能要打架了。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài wù hěn hěn de zhēng chǎo， wǒ xiǎng tā men kě néng yào dǎ jià le。
english: They were having a fierce argument and I thought they might hit each other.

hanzi: 我申请加入排球队时给教练留下了良好的印象。
pinyin: wǒ shēn qǐng jiā rù pái qiú duì shí jǐ jiào liàn liú xià le liáng hǎo de yìn xiàng。
english: I had made on the coach a good impression when I went out for volleyball.

hanzi: 他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高。
pinyin: tā huán gào su wǒ shuō nǐ de fǔ dǎo kè huò tǎo lùn kè chū qín shuài bù gāo。
english: He also tells me that your attendance at his tutorial and seminar have been poor.

hanzi: 抵押款提高了，其中一部分可由免税额增加而抵消。
pinyin: dǐ yá kuǎn tí gāo le， qí zhōng yī bù fen kě yóu miǎn shuì é zēng jiā ér dǐ xiāo。
english: Higher mortgage rates are partly offset by increased tax allowances.

hanzi: 抵押款提高了，其中一部分可由免税额增加而抵消。
pinyin: dǐ yá kuǎn tí gāo le， qí zhōng yī bù fen kě yóu miǎn shuì é zēng jiā ér dǐ xiāo。
english: Higher mortgage rates are partly offset by increased tax allowances.

hanzi: 社会公益服务机构和当地医生应该加强协作。
pinyin: shè huì gōng yì fú wù jī gòu huò dāng dì yī shēng yīng gāi jiā qiáng xié zuò。
english: There should be a lot more interaction between the social services and local doctors.

hanzi: 如果班上的人数多，老师就不能给予个别辅导了。
pinyin: rú guǒ bān shàng de rén shù duō， lǎo shī jiù bù néng gěi yǔ gè bié fǔ dǎo le。
english: A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.

hanzi: 最近的丑闻给政府的反对派提供了大量的炮弹。
pinyin: zuì jìn de chǒu wén jǐ zhèng fǔ de fǎn duì pài tí gōng le dà liàng de pào dàn。
english: The recent scandal has provided the government's opponents with plenty of ammunition.

hanzi: 一位稀有昆虫采集家将给我们看一些他的最新发现。
pinyin: yī wèi xī yǒu kūn chóng cǎi jí jiā jiàng jǐ wǒ men kàn yī xiē tā de zuì xīn fā xiàn。
english: A collector of rare insects will show us some of his latest discoveries.

hanzi: 他偷脚踏车是事实，但他并不像你所想的那样坏。
pinyin: tā tōu jué tà jū shì shì shí， dàn tā bìng bù xiàng nǐ suǒ xiǎng de nà yàng huài。
english: It is true that he stole the bicycle, but he is not so bad as you might think.

hanzi: 我认为直截了当地告诉他这个坏消息倒是友好的行为。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhí jié le dāng dì gào su tā zhè gè huài xiāo xi dào shì yǒu hǎo de xíng wéi。
english: I think it would be a kindness to tell him the bad news straight away.

hanzi: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。
pinyin: gān hàn shào yǔ shǐ yuán běn jiù hěn yán zhòng de liáng shi duǎn quē wèn tí gèng jiā yán zhòng。
english: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

hanzi: 干旱少雨使原本就很严重的粮食短缺问题更加严重。
pinyin: gān hàn shào yǔ shǐ yuán běn jiù hěn yán zhòng de liáng shi duǎn quē wèn tí gèng jiā yán zhòng。
english: The lack of rain aggravated the already serious shortage of food.

hanzi: 医生定期到这家进行拜访，检查婴儿有没有问题。
pinyin: yī shēng dìng qī dào zhè jiā jìn xíng bài fǎng， jiǎn chá yīng ér yǒu méi yǒu wèn tí。
english: The doctor made periodic visit to the house to see if the baby was all right.

hanzi: 我认为咱们不在家时不能把孩子都硬塞给你父母看管。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zán men bù zài jiā shí bù néng bǎ hái zi dōu yìng sè jǐ nǐ fù mǔ kàn guǎn。
english: I don't think we can wish the children on your parents while we're away.

hanzi: 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材。
pinyin: jié mù shè jí zòng liú xíng yīn yuè dào jīng jù zhè yàng xíng xíng shǎi shǎi de tí cái。
english: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.

hanzi: 恰恰就在我登上公共汽车踏板的时候，车子开动了。
pinyin: qià qià jiù zài wǒ dēng shàng gōng gòng qì chē tà bǎn de shí hou， jū zi kāi dòng le。
english: At the precise moment that I put my foot on the step, the bus started.

hanzi: 我认为直截了当地告诉他这个坏消息倒是友好的行为。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhí jié le dāng dì gào su tā zhè gè huài xiāo xi dào shì yǒu hǎo de xíng wéi。
english: I think it would be a kindness to tell him the bad news straight away.

hanzi: 她的考试成绩令人失望，但却装出若无其事的样子。
pinyin: tā de kǎo shì chéng jī lìng rén shī wàng， dàn què zhuāng chū ruò wú qí shì de yàng zi。
english: Her exam result was disappointing but she tried to put a brave face on it.

hanzi: 我认为直截了当地告诉他这个坏消息倒是友好的行为。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhí jié le dāng dì gào su tā zhè gè huài xiāo xi dào shì yǒu hǎo de xíng wéi。
english: I think it would be a kindness to tell him the bad news straight away.

hanzi: 我认为咱们不在家时不能把孩子都硬塞给你父母看管。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zán men bù zài jiā shí bù néng bǎ hái zi dōu yìng sè jǐ nǐ fù mǔ kàn guǎn。
english: I don't think we can wish the children on your parents while we're away.

hanzi: 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。
pinyin: jīng guò lián xù jǐ cì de shī bài， tā zuì hòu zhōng yú tōng guò le jià shǐ kǎo shì。
english: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

hanzi: 起初她威胁要解雇我们所有的人，但是后来她态度软化了。
pinyin: qǐ chū tā wēi xié yào jiě gù wǒ men suǒ yǒu de rén， dàn shì hòu lái tā tài du ruǎn huà le。
english: At first she threatened to dismiss us all, but later she relented.

hanzi: 国民财富在很大程度上取决于一个国家的教育水准。
pinyin: guó mín cái fù zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng qǔ jué yú yī gè guó jiā de jiào yù shuǐ zhǔn。
english: National wealth depends to a high degree on a country's educational standard.

hanzi: 我的周末过得很无聊--只是在屋子里 转转或者看看电视.
pinyin: wǒ de zhōu mò guò de hěn wú liáo-- zhǐ shì zài wū zi lǐ  zhuàn zhuàn huò zhě kàn kan diàn shì.
english: My weekend was boring I just floated about (the house) or watched TV.

hanzi: 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。
pinyin: jīng guò lián xù jǐ cì de shī bài， tā zuì hòu zhōng yú tōng guò le jià shǐ kǎo shì。
english: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

hanzi: 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。
pinyin: jīng guò lián xù jǐ cì de shī bài， tā zuì hòu zhōng yú tōng guò le jià shǐ kǎo shì。
english: After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.

hanzi: 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁。
pinyin: mǎ lù shàng lái wàng de chē liàng shēng yīn bù duàn de pò huài wǒ men jiā de ān níng。
english: The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home.

hanzi: 她用毫无表情的声调回答问题，甚至连眼睛都不抬起。
pinyin: tā yòng háo wú biǎo qíng de shēng diào huí dá wèn tí， shèn zhì lián yǎn jīng dōu bù tái qǐ。
english: She answered in a flat little voice and didn't even raised her eyes.

hanzi: 今天的报纸上有一篇关于办公室里的性骚扰的报道。
pinyin: jīn tiān de bào zhǐ shàng yǒu yī piān guān yú bàn gōng shì lǐ de xìng sāo rǎo de bào dào。
english: There is a report about a sexual harassment in the office on this newspaper.

hanzi: 他们支持日本接管德国以前在山东省的所有权益。
pinyin: tā men zhī chí Rì běn jiē guǎn Dé guó yǐ qián zài shān dōng shěng de suǒ yǒu quán yì。
english: They supported Japan's take over of all the former German interests in Shandong Province.

hanzi: 马路上来往的车辆声音不断地破坏我们家的安宁。
pinyin: mǎ lù shàng lái wàng de chē liàng shēng yīn bù duàn de pò huài wǒ men jiā de ān níng。
english: The noise of cars passing along the road is a continual disturbance to our quiet at home.

hanzi: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn jiè cǐ jī huì gǎn xiè měi yī wèi wèi zhè gè xiàng mù xīn qín gōng zuò de rén。
english: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

hanzi: 首都一片平静，然而据报道在别的地方仍有持续的骚乱。
pinyin: shǒu dū yī piàn píng jìng， rán ér jù bào dào zài bié de dì fang réng yǒu chí xù de sāo luàn。
english: The capital is calm, but continuing disorder has been reported elsewhere.

hanzi: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn jiè cǐ jī huì gǎn xiè měi yī wèi wèi zhè gè xiàng mù xīn qín gōng zuò de rén。
english: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

hanzi: 学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用。
pinyin: xué xí Yīng yǔ huò dé yǔ děng xiàn dài yǔ yán bì xué xí Lā dīng yǔ gèng wèi yǒu yòng。
english: It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.

hanzi: 我怀疑在我有生之年这个国家会不会出现一位女总统。
pinyin: wǒ huái yí zài wǒ yǒu shēng zhī nián zhè gè guó jiā kuài bù huì chū xiàn yī wèi nu:3 zǒng tǒng。
english: I doubt if there will be a female president in this country in my lifetime.

hanzi: 节目中的暴力场面和难听的粗话使许多观众感到震惊。
pinyin: jié mù zhòng dì bào lì chǎng miàn huò nàn tìng de cū huà shǐ xǔ duō guān zhòng gǎn dào zhèn jīng。
english: The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.

hanzi: 陪审团的全体成员，你们现在必须退下去考虑应如何裁决。
pinyin: péi shěn tuán de quán tǐ chéng yuán， nǐ men xiàn zài bì xū tuì xià qu kǎo lu:4 yìng rú hé cái jué。
english: Members of the jury, you must now retire to consider your verdict.

hanzi: 我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn jiè cǐ jī huì gǎn xiè měi yī wèi wèi zhè gè xiàng mù xīn qín gōng zuò de rén。
english: I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.

hanzi: 首都一片平静，然而据报道在别的地方仍有持续的骚乱。
pinyin: shǒu dū yī piàn píng jìng， rán ér jù bào dào zài bié de dì fang réng yǒu chí xù de sāo luàn。
english: The capital is calm, but continuing disorder has been reported elsewhere.

hanzi: 中国人民正在努力工作，把国家建设得更加富饶美丽。
pinyin: Zhōng guó rén mín zhèng zài nǔ lì gōng zuò， bǎ guó jiā jiàn shè de gèng jiā fù ráo měi lì。
english: Chinese people are working hard to make the country richer and more beautiful.

hanzi: 陪审团的全体成员，你们现在必须退下去考虑应如何裁决。
pinyin: péi shěn tuán de quán tǐ chéng yuán， nǐ men xiàn zài bì xū tuì xià qu kǎo lu:4 yìng rú hé cái jué。
english: Members of the jury, you must now retire to consider your verdict.

hanzi: 节目中的暴力场面和难听的粗话使许多观众感到震惊。
pinyin: jié mù zhòng dì bào lì chǎng miàn huò nàn tìng de cū huà shǐ xǔ duō guān zhòng gǎn dào zhèn jīng。
english: The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.

hanzi: 若非认识我们这位好朋友，我们的生活一定十分不妙。
pinyin: ruò fēi rèn shi wǒ men zhè wèi hào péng you， wǒ men de shēng huó yī dìng shí fēn bù miào。
english: Our lives would have been greatly impoverished, if we had not known our dear friend.

hanzi: 这个政治家发现饥饿的孩子们可怜的哭声让人不忍心听下去。
pinyin: zhè gè zhèng zhì jiā fā xiàn jī è de hái zi men kě lián de kū shēng ràng rén bù rěn xīn tìng xià qu。
english: The politician found the piteous cries of the starving children unbearable.

hanzi: 当他穿着全套大礼服露面的时候，显得和整个场合很不协调。
pinyin: dàng tā chuān zhuó quán tào dà lǐ fú lòu miàn de shí hou， xiǎn de huò zhěng gè chǎng hé hěn bù xié tiáo。
english: He looked rather out of place when he turned up in full ceremonial rig.

hanzi: 当一个人一旦认为自己是有意思的时候，他就不再是有意思的人了。
pinyin: dàng yī gè rén yī dàn rèn wéi zì jǐ shì yǒu yì si de shí hou， tā jiù bù zài shì yǒu yì si de rén le。
english: The minute a man is convinced that he is interesting, he is not.

hanzi: 撞船事故发生地区的所有船只都参加了搜寻幸存者的工作。
pinyin: zhuàng chuán shì gù fā shēng dì qū de suǒ yǒu chuán zhī dōu cān jiā le sōu xún xìng cún zhě de gōng zuò。
english: All the ships in the vicinity of the crash joined in the search for survivors.

hanzi: 第一只小鸟醒来了，男孩还能听见珍珠鸡在他的前边叫着。
pinyin: dì yī zhǐ xiǎo niǎo xǐng lái le， nán hái huán néng tīng jiàn zhēn zhū jī zài tā de qián biān jiào zhuó。
english: The first bird woke and the boy could hear the guinea-fowl calling ahead of him.

hanzi: 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。
pinyin: tā men tán dào rén men rú hé zài zhèng zhì wèn tí shàng shǐ yòng jí làn yòng shù zì lái hùn xiáo shì tìng。
english: They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics.

hanzi: 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。
pinyin: tā men tán dào rén men rú hé zài zhèng zhì wèn tí shàng shǐ yòng jí làn yòng shù zì lái hùn xiáo shì tìng。
english: They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics.

hanzi: 他由于忘了带钥匙，便以简单的应急办法从窗户爬进屋里。
pinyin: tā yóu yú wàng le dài yào shi， pián yǐ jiǎn dān de yìng jí bàn fǎ zòng chuāng hu pá jìn wū lǐ。
english: As he had forgot his keys, he got into the house by the simple expedient of climbing through the window.

hanzi: 他由于忘了带钥匙，便以简单的应急办法从窗户爬进屋里。
pinyin: tā yóu yú wàng le dài yào shi， pián yǐ jiǎn dān de yìng jí bàn fǎ zòng chuāng hu pá jìn wū lǐ。
english: As he had forgot his keys, he got into the house by the simple expedient of climbing through the window.

hanzi: 那只外星来的宇宙飞船在公园上空盘旋了一会儿之后就不见了。
pinyin: nà zhǐ wài xīng lái de yǔ zhòu fēi chuán zài gōng yuán shàng kōng pán xuán le yī huìr zhī hòu jiù bù jiàn le。
english: After the alien spacecraft had hovered over the park for a short time, it vanished.

hanzi: 一旦迈克采取了防卫态度，就很难使他相信没有什么可怕的。
pinyin: yī dàn mài kè cǎi qǔ le fáng wèi tài du， jiù hěn nàn shǐ tā xiāng xìn méi yǒu shén me kě pà de。
english: Once Mike's taken up a defensive attitude, it's difficult to persuade him that's nothing to be afraid of.

hanzi: 他活动于社交甚严的社交圈内，而且属于那些最不愿吸收外人的俱乐部。
pinyin: tā huó dòng yú shè jiāo shèn yán de shè jiāo quān nèi， ér qiě shǔ yú nà xiē zuì bù yuàn xī shōu wài rén de jù yuè bù。
english: He moves in exclusive social circles and belongs to the most exclusive clubs.

hanzi: 她新找的这份工作星期六放假，而原来的那份工作周末是隔周放假。
pinyin: tā xīn zhǎo de zhè fèn gōng zuò xīng qī liù fàng jià， ér yuán lái de nà fèn gōng zuò zhōu mò shì gé zhōu fàng jià。
english: She get Saturday off in her new job as against work alternate weekend in her last one.

hanzi: 关于宇宙起源的新理论被世界上很多著名的天文学家批得体无完肤。
pinyin: guān yú yǔ zhòu qǐ yuán de xīn lǐ lùn bèi shì jiè shàng hěn duō著 míng de tiān wén xué jiā pī de tǐ wú wán fū。
english: The new theory of the origin of the universe was pulled to pieces by many of the world leading astronomers.

hanzi: 我一整天围着火热的炉子辛辛苦苦地做出这顿饭，可是他们现在几乎一点儿也没有吃。
pinyin: wǒ yī zhěng tiān wéi zháo huǒ rè de lú zi xīn xīn kǔ kǔ de zuò chū zhè dùn fàn， kě shì tā men xiàn zài jī hū yī diǎnr yě méi yǒu jí。
english: I slaved away all day over a hot stove to produce this meal, and now they've hardly eaten any of it.

hanzi: 什么也不能推动一个按钟头收费的人，对他的平静的心情来说，时间的消逝是多么甜蜜啊。
pinyin: shén me yě bù néng tuī dòng yī gè àn zhōng tóu shōu fèi de rén， duì tā de píng jìng de xīn qíng lái shuō， shí jiān de xiāo shì shì duō me tián mì a。
english: Nothing can move a man who is paid by the hour; how sweet the flight of time seem to his calm mind.

hanzi: 不要嘲笑他。
pinyin: bù yào cháo xiào tā。
english: Don't laugh at him.

hanzi: 摆锤能摆动.
pinyin: bǎi chuí néng bǎi dòng.
english: A pendulum oscillates.

hanzi: 外面在下冰雹。
pinyin: wài mian zài xià bīng báo。
english: It's hailing outside.

hanzi: 他有音乐天赋。
pinyin: tā yǒu yīn yuè tiān fù。
english: He has a gift for music.

hanzi: 猪是一种家畜。
pinyin: zhū shì yī zhòng jiā chù。
english: A pig is a domestic animal.

hanzi: 请不要嘲笑他。
pinyin: qǐng bù yào cháo xiào tā。
english: Please don't laugh at him.

hanzi: 满月呈圆形。
pinyin: mǎn yuè chéng yuán xíng。
english: The full moon has a circular form.

hanzi: 城堡的墙很厚。
pinyin: chéng bǎo de qiáng hěn hòu。
english: The castle walls are very thick.

hanzi: 我喜欢节奏快的音乐。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan jié zòu kuài de yīn yuè。
english: I like fast music.

hanzi: 我要报一宗盗窃案。
pinyin: wǒ yào bào yī zōng dào qiè àn。
english: I want to report a theft.

hanzi: 她的两只胳膊麻痹。
pinyin: tā de liǎng zhǐ gē bo má bì。
english: She is paralysed in both arms.

hanzi: 汗从毛孔中渗出.
pinyin: hàn zòng máo kǒng zhòng shèn chū.
english: Sweat exudes through the pores.

hanzi: 牛奶可制成凝乳。
pinyin: niú nǎi kě zhì chéng níng rǔ。
english: Milk can be made into curds.

hanzi: 空气中烟雾弥漫。
pinyin: kōng qì zhòng yān wù mí màn。
english: The air was thick with smoke.

hanzi: 他的歌充满了忧伤。
pinyin: tā de gē chōng mǎn le yōu shāng。
english: His songs are full of dirge.

hanzi: 他发誓永远爱她。
pinyin: tā fā shì yǒng yuǎn ài tā。
english: He swore to love her for evermore.

hanzi: 尸体躺在血泊中.
pinyin: shī tǐ tǎng zài xuè bó zhòng.
english: The body was lying in a pool of blood.

hanzi: 玉米不久就要结穗了。
pinyin: yù mǐ bù jiǔ jiù yào jié suì le。
english: The corn will soon ear.

hanzi: 他是那个团的耻辱。
pinyin: tā shì nèi gè tuán de chǐ rù。
english: He was a dishonor to his regiment.

hanzi: 花发出一阵幽香。
pinyin: huā fā chū yī zhèn yōu xiāng。
english: The flowers gave off a fragrant odor.

hanzi: 鹿的斑点是黄色的。
pinyin: lù de bān diǎn shì huáng sè de。
english: The dapple of the deer is yellow.

hanzi: 刀刃把他的腿划破了。
pinyin: dāo rèn bǎ tā de tuǐ huà pò le。
english: The blade slashed his leg open.

hanzi: 世界上有七大洲。
pinyin: shì jiè shàng yǒu qī dà zhōu。
english: There are seven continents in the world.

hanzi: 他悲伤地绞紧双手。
pinyin: tā bēi shāng de jiǎo jǐn shuāng shǒu。
english: He wrung his hands in sorrow.

hanzi: 这把重斧头不好用。
pinyin: zhè bǎ zhòng fǔ tóu bù hǎo yòng。
english: The heavy axe was awkward to use.

hanzi: 这把重斧头不好用。
pinyin: zhè bǎ zhòng fǔ tóu bù hǎo yòng。
english: The heavy axe was awkward to use.

hanzi: 我认识汤姆很多年了。
pinyin: wǒ rèn shi tāng mǔ hěn duō nián le。
english: I've known Tom for years.

hanzi: 他们杜绝了这些坏事。
pinyin: tā men dù jué le zhè xie huài shì。
english: They put a stop to the evils.

hanzi: 他常带着一个酒葫芦。
pinyin: tā cháng dài zhuó yī gè jiǔ hú lú。
english: He always takes a wine gourd.

hanzi: 他对他的错深感羞愧.
pinyin: tā duì tā de cuò shēn gǎn xiū kuì.
english: He felt mortified for his mistake.

hanzi: 他用鞭子策马前行。
pinyin: tā yòng biān zǐ cè mǎ qián xìng。
english: He urged the horses on with a whip.

hanzi: 葬礼是个忧郁的场合。
pinyin: zàng lǐ shì gè yōu yù de chǎng hé。
english: A funeral is a sombre occasion.

hanzi: 他的眼睛被烟熏痛了。
pinyin: tā de yǎn jīng bèi yān xūn tòng le。
english: His eyes smart at the smoke.

hanzi: 忧虑损害了她的健康。
pinyin: yōu lu:4 sǔn hài le tā de jiàn kāng。
english: Cares preyed upon her health.

hanzi: 水由氢和氧组成。
pinyin: shuǐ yóu qīng huò yǎng zǔ chéng。
english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

hanzi: 他在食槽里放了些草。
pinyin: tā zài shí cáo lǐ fàng le xiē cǎo。
english: He put some grass in the manger.

hanzi: 他叫侍者拿菜单来。
pinyin: tā jiào shì zhě ná cài dān lái。
english: He called the waiter to bring the menu.

hanzi: 窝藏罪犯是犯法的。
pinyin: wō cáng zuì fàn shì fàn fǎ de。
english: Harboring criminals is an offence in law.

hanzi: 我们的船逆流而上。
pinyin: wǒ men de chuán nì liú ér shàng。
english: Our ship stemmed on against the current.

hanzi: 这个电钮接通电流。
pinyin: zhè gè diàn niǔ jiē tōng diàn liú。
english: This button switches the current on.

hanzi: 他对舆论毫不关心。
pinyin: tā duì yú lùn háo bú guān xīn。
english: He cares not a whit for public opinion.

hanzi: 他们的意见分歧很大。
pinyin: tā men de yì jiàn fēn qí hěn dà。
english: They differ widely in their opinions.

hanzi: 听起来你好象蛮喜欢的。
