english: That is an oil painting of a landscape in spring.

hanzi: 他晚饭吃了一些什锦泡菜和米饭。
pinyin: tā wǎn fàn jí le yī xiē shí jǐn pào cài huò mǐ fàn。
english: He had some mixed pickles and rice for supper.

hanzi: 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。
pinyin: nuó wēi rén shēng huó zài bǐ jiào hán lěng de dì qū。
english: The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone.

hanzi: 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。
pinyin: nuó wēi rén shēng huó zài bǐ jiào hán lěng de dì qū。
english: The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone.

hanzi: 各商行互相竞争以招揽顾客。
pinyin: gè shāng xìng hù xiāng jìng zhēng yǐ zhāo lǎn gù kè。
english: Businesses vied with each other to attract customers.

hanzi: 占星家声称能预知祸福.
pinyin: zhàn xīng jiā shēng chēng néng yù zhī huò fú.
english: Astrologers claim to be able to divine what the stars hold in store for us.

hanzi: 这人这么和蔼, 我立刻为他着迷。
pinyin: zhè rén zhè me hé ǎi,  wǒ lì kè wèi tā zháo mí。
english: The man was so genial, so I was drawn to him at once.

hanzi: 有人相信婴儿的尿是一种药。
pinyin: yǒu rén xiāng xìn yīng ér de suī shì yī zhòng yào。
english: Someone believes that a baby's urine is a kind of medicine.

hanzi: 我的同事已经戒掉了吸烟的习惯。
pinyin: wǒ de tóng shì yǐ jīng jiè diào le xī yān de xí guàn。
english: My colleague has broken off the habit of smoking.

hanzi: 通知她交纳罚款，但她拒不服从。
pinyin: tōng zhī tā jiāo nà fá kuǎn， dàn tā jù bù fú zòng。
english: She was told to pay the fine, but refused to comply.

hanzi: 他应该受到法律最严厉的惩罚。
pinyin: tā yīng gāi shòu dào fǎ lu:4 zuì yán lì de chéng fá。
english: He deserves to be punished with the full rigor of the law.

hanzi: 魔术师从他的帽子里变出一只兔子。
pinyin: mó shù shī zòng tā de mào zi lǐ biàn chū yī zhǐ tù zi。
english: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.

hanzi: 一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。
pinyin: yī wèi hù shi lái jǐ tā bāo shàng gān jìng de bēng dài。
english: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him.

hanzi: 那人用斧头把一块木头劈成两半。
pinyin: nà rén yòng fǔ tóu bǎ yī kuài mù tou pǐ chéng liǎng bàn。
english: The man cleft a block of wood in two with an axe.

hanzi: 船只在汹涌的大海中缓慢前进。
pinyin: chuán zhī zài xiōng yǒng de dà hǎi zhòng huǎn màn qián jìn。
english: The ship made slow progress through the rough sea.

hanzi: 她戴着结婚戒指，表示她已结婚。
pinyin: tā dài zhuó jié hūn jiè zhi， biǎo shì tā yǐ jié hūn。
english: She wears a wedding ring to show that she's married.

hanzi: 我不会跟你撒谎，那不是我的风格。
pinyin: wǒ bù huì gēn nǐ sā huǎng， nà bú shì wǒ de fēng gé。
english: I wouldn't tell lies to you; that's not my style.

hanzi: 血液在她的膝盖伤口周围凝固了。
pinyin: xuè yè zài tā de xī gài shāng kǒu zhōu wéi níng gù le。
english: The blood had congealed round the cut on her knee.

hanzi: 学生应该始终具有强烈的求知欲。
pinyin: xué sheng yīng gāi shǐ zhōng jù yǒu qiáng liè de qiú zhī yù。
english: A student should always be curious to learn.

hanzi: 学生应该始终具有强烈的求知欲。
pinyin: xué sheng yīng gāi shǐ zhōng jù yǒu qiáng liè de qiú zhī yù。
english: A student should always be curious to learn.

hanzi: 这首诗的最后两行没有押好韵。
pinyin: zhè shǒu shī de zuì hòu liǎng xìng méi yǒu yā hào yùn。
english: The last two lines of this poem don't rhyme properly.

hanzi: 牧师每星期二作履行神职的访问。
pinyin: mù shī měi xīng qī èr zuò lu:3 xíng shén zhí de fǎng wèn。
english: The priest makes pastoral visits every Tuesday.

hanzi: 他把花茎折断，汁液就流了出来。
pinyin: tā bǎ huā jīng zhé duàn， zhī yè jiù liú le chū lai。
english: The sap flowed out when he broke the stem of the flower.

hanzi: 用餐时摆弄刀叉玩儿是不雅的.
pinyin: yòng cān shí bǎi nòng dāo chā wánr shì bù yǎ de.
english: It's bad manners to fidget about (with the cutlery) at the table.

hanzi: 她的钱被一个奸诈的会计骗去了。
pinyin: tā de qián bèi yī gè jiān zhà de kuài jì piàn qù le。
english: She was defrauded of her money by a dishonest accountant.

hanzi: 他的答覆看来是半开玩笑半认真的.
pinyin: tā de dá fù kàn lai shì bàn kāi wán xiào bàn rèn zhēn de.
english: His reply was taken half seriously, half in jest.

hanzi: 有个年幼的学生在炎炎烈日下晕倒了。
pinyin: yǒu gè nián yòu de xué sheng zài yán yán liè rì xià yùn dào le。
english: A young student fainted in the hot sun.

hanzi: 她很害羞，不敢和其他旅行者交谈。
pinyin: tā hěn hài xiū， bù gǎn huò qí tā lu:3 xíng zhě jiāo tán。
english: She was too timid to talk with other travelers.

hanzi: 这艘船的停泊税一年是五千美元.
pinyin: zhè sōu chuán de tíng bó shuì yī nián shì wǔ qiān měi yuán.
english: The vessel tax of anchorage is 5,000 dollars per year.

hanzi: 她瘦长结实的身体看上去精力充沛。
pinyin: tā shòu cháng jiē shi de shēn tǐ kàn shàng qù jīng lì chōng pèi。
english: Her wiry athletic body seems energetic.

hanzi: 你完全不知道在那里是什么滋味。
pinyin: nǐ wán quán bù zhī dào zài nà li shì shén me zī wèi。
english: You have no conception of what it was like to be there.

hanzi: 他们将为不得不干那项工作而抱怨。
pinyin: tā men jiàng wèi bù dé bù gàn nà xiàng gōng zuò ér bào yuàn。
english: They will grumble about having to do the work.

hanzi: 他们低声说话，唯恐被别人听见。
pinyin: tā men dī shēng shuō huà， wěi kǒng bèi bié rén tīng jiàn。
english: They spoke in whispers lest they should be heard.

hanzi: 每次她动一下腿，就发出一声呻吟。
pinyin: měi cì tā dòng yī xià tuǐ， jiù fā chū yī shēng shēn yín。
english: Each time she moved her leg, she let out a moan.

hanzi: 夕阳无限好，只是近黄昏。
pinyin: xì yáng wú xiàn hào， zhǐ shì jìn huáng hūn。
english: The setting sun had boundless beauty, Just because the yellow dusk is so near.

hanzi: 我在旅行期间舆同学们保持联系。
pinyin: wǒ zài lu:3 xíng qī jiān yú tóng xué men bǎo chí lián xì。
english: I kept in touch with my classmates during my journey.

hanzi: 我想驾驶滑翔机一定需要些技术。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng jià shǐ huá xiáng jī yī dìng xū yào xiē jì shù。
english: I guess it must require some skills to fly a glider.

hanzi: 她穿着纽约杰出设计师设计的服装。
pinyin: tā chuān zhuó Niǔ Yuē jié chū shè jì shī shè jì de fú zhuāng。
english: She was dressed by a leading New York designer.

hanzi: 他给我一条项链作为周年纪念礼物。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ yī tiáo xiàng liàn zuò wéi zhōu nián jì niàn lǐ wù。
english: He gave me a necklace as an anniversary gift.

hanzi: 她不用学跑步技巧, 她天生就擅跑.
pinyin: tā bù yòng xué pǎo bù jì qiǎo,  tā tiān shēng jiù shàn pǎo.
english: She didn't have to learn how to run: she's a natural.

hanzi: 肖邦的乐曲唤起了她极其复杂的感情。
pinyin: xiào bāng de yuè qǔ huàn qǐ le tā jí qí fù zá de gǎn qíng。
english: Chopin aroused very complicated emotions in her.

hanzi: 一块煤炭从火中掉出来，烧坏了地席。
pinyin: yī kuài méi tàn zòng huǒ zhòng diào chū lai， shāo huài le de xí。
english: A coal fell from the fire and burned the mat.

hanzi: 我们不应该嘲笑别人的宗教信仰。
pinyin: wǒ men bù yīng gāi cháo xiào bié rén de zōng jiào xìn yǎng。
english: We should not mock at other people's religious beliefs.

hanzi: 我宁愿考不及格，也不愿意考试作弊。
pinyin: wǒ nìng yuàn kǎo bù jí gé， yě bù yuàn yì kǎo shì zuò bì。
english: I would rather fail than cheat in the examination.

hanzi: 司机应该对这场车祸负部分责任。
pinyin: sī jī yīng gāi duì zhè chǎng chē huò fù bù fen zé rèn。
english: The driver must bear a portion of the blame for the accident.

hanzi: 我们的人民正在暴君的统治下受苦。
pinyin: wǒ men de rén mín zhèng zài bào jūn de tǒng zhì xià shòu kǔ。
english: Our people are suffering at the hands of an oppressor.

hanzi: 那个害羞的小男孩遇到陌生人就紧张。
pinyin: nèi gè hài xiū de xiǎo nán hái yù dào mò shēng rén jiù jǐn zhāng。
english: The bashful boy was nervous with strangers.

hanzi: 这张桌子的腿是用螺丝固定在地板上的。
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhuō zi de tuǐ shì yòng luó sī gù dìng zài dì bǎn shàng de。
english: The table legs are screwed to the floor.

hanzi: 首先，要向杯子里放一小片锌板。
pinyin: shǒu xiān， yào xiàng bēi zi lǐ fàng yī xiǎo piàn xīn bǎn。
english: You should first put a small piece of zinc plate into the cup.

hanzi: 她有一条用三角形蓝绸子做的围巾。
pinyin: tā yǒu yī tiáo yòng sān jiǎo xíng lán chóu zi zuò de wéi jīn。
english: She has a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.

hanzi: 他过去因失败而蒙羞，现在东山再起了。
pinyin: tā guò qu yīn shī bài ér měng xiū， xiàn zài Dōng shān zài qǐ le。
english: He rose again from the dust of past defeats.

hanzi: 他们这个下午卖掉了十箱矿泉水。
pinyin: tā men zhè gè xià wǔ mài diào le shí xiāng kuàng quán shuǐ。
english: They have sold up ten crates of mineral water in the afternoon.

hanzi: 有的人看到色情杂志能激发起性欲。
pinyin: yǒu de rén kàn dào sè qíng zá zhì néng jī fā qǐ xìng yù。
english: Some people are sexually excited by pornographic magazines.

hanzi: 盟军数以百计的飞机轰炸了那个国家。
pinyin: méng jūn shuò yǐ bǎi jì de fēi jī hōng zhà le nèi gè guó jiā。
english: The allied warplanes bombed the country by the hundred.

hanzi: 首先，要向杯子里放一小片锌板。
pinyin: shǒu xiān， yào xiàng bēi zi lǐ fàng yī xiǎo piàn xīn bǎn。
english: You should first put a small piece of zinc plate into the cup.

hanzi: 我的女儿看见了一条鼻涕虫，尖叫了起来。
pinyin: wǒ de nu:3 ér kàn jiàn le yī tiáo bí tì chóng， jiān jiào le qǐ lai。
english: My daughter screamed when she saw a slug.

hanzi: 我正在用我新买的煎锅做苹果馅饼。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài yòng wǒ xīn mǎi de jiān guō zuò píng guǒ xiàn bǐng。
english: I am cooking apple pies with my newly bought frying pan.

hanzi: 我的女儿看见了一条鼻涕虫，尖叫了起来。
pinyin: wǒ de nu:3 ér kàn jiàn le yī tiáo bí tì chóng， jiān jiào le qǐ lai。
english: My daughter screamed when she saw a slug.

hanzi: 他跳上马, 朝寺庙方向飞奔而去。
pinyin: tā tiào shàng mǎ,  cháo sì miào fāng xiàng fēi bēn ér qù。
english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple.

hanzi: 我们在碗上铺了白的覆盖物防止苍蝇。
pinyin: wǒ men zài wǎn shàng pù le bái de fù gài wù fáng zhǐ cāng ying。
english: We spread white covers over the bowls to keep flies away.

hanzi: 在神话故事中，魔鬼很残忍而且吃人。
pinyin: zài shén huà gù shì zhòng， mó guǐ hěn cán rěn ér qiě jí rén。
english: In fairy stories, the ogre is cruel and eats people.

hanzi: 那个亚洲人拦住我，问我是不是中国人。
pinyin: nèi gè Yà zhōu rén lán zhù wǒ， wèn wǒ shì bú shì Zhōng guó rén。
english: That Asian stopped me and asked if I was Chinese.

hanzi: 他到那里喝一瓶汽水和吃一块汉堡面包。
pinyin: tā dào nà li hè yī píng qì shuǐ huò jí yī kuài Hàn bǎo miàn bāo。
english: He go there to drink a soda and eat a hamburger.

hanzi: 阳光透过万里碧空照耀着北京城。
pinyin: yáng guāng tòu guò Wàn Lǐ bì kòng zhào yào zhuó Běi jīng chéng。
english: From a sky of untarnished blue the sun beamed down upon Beijing.

hanzi: 他学得慢，但是他表现出不屈不挠的毅力。
pinyin: tā xué de màn， dàn shì tā biǎo xiàn chū bù qū bù náo de yì lì。
english: He is slow to learn, but shows great perseverance.

hanzi: 他跳上马, 朝寺庙方向飞奔而去。
pinyin: tā tiào shàng mǎ,  cháo sì miào fāng xiàng fēi bēn ér qù。
english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple.

hanzi: 好的水果冬天难得见到，而且价格昂贵。
pinyin: hǎo de shuǐ guǒ dōng tiān nán dé xiàn dào， ér qiě jià gé áng guì。
english: Good fruit is scarce in winter and costs a lot.

hanzi: 他就早期新教徒的异端邪说作了演讲。
pinyin: tā jiù zǎo qī xīn jiào tú de yì duān xié shuō zuò le yǎn jiǎng。
english: He gave a speech on the heresies of the early Protestants.

hanzi: 这栋房子周围有几个小男孩在晃荡。
pinyin: zhè dòng fáng zi zhōu wéi yǒu jǐ ge xiǎo nán hái zài huàng dàng。
english: There are several young boys loitering around the building.

hanzi: 这棵苏格兰植物是我的一个表亲给我的礼物。
pinyin: zhè kē sū gé lán zhí wù shì wǒ de yī gè biǎo qīn jǐ wǒ de lǐ wù。
english: This Scottish plant was a gift from my cousin.

hanzi: 这些犹太人生活在会遭到拘捕的恐惧之中。
pinyin: zhè xie Yóu tài rén shēng huó zài kuài zāo dào jū bǔ de kǒng jù zhī zhōng。
english: The Jews lived in dread of being caught.

hanzi: 学杂费昂贵，外国留学生负担不起。
pinyin: xué zá fèi áng guì， wài guó liú xué shēng fù dān bù qǐ。
english: The tuition and fees fall heavy on the international students.

hanzi: 他熟练地驾驶着汽车穿过狭窄的街道。
pinyin: tā shú liàn de jià shǐ zhuó qì chē chuān guò xiá zhǎi de jiē dào。
english: He steered the car skillfully through the narrow streets.

hanzi: 他对任何人都很拘谨，从不跟人说笑。
pinyin: tā duì rèn hé rén dōu hěn jū jǐn， cóng bù gēn rén shuō xiào。
english: He is very formal with everyone; he never joins in a laugh.

hanzi: 那位富翁在遗嘱中什么都没给他儿子留下。
pinyin: nà wèi fù wēng zài yí zhǔ zhòng shén me dōu mò jǐ tā ér zi liú xià。
english: The rich man left his son nothing in the will.

hanzi: 别人回家后，他仍在学校外面徘徊。
pinyin: bié rén huí jiā hòu， tā réng zài xué xiào wài mian pái huái。
english: He lingered outside the school after everybody else had gone home.

hanzi: 耳膜的振动帮助声音传送到大脑。
pinyin: ěr mó de zhèn dòng bāng zhù shēng yīn chuán sòng dào dà nǎo。
english: A vibrating membrane in the ear helps to convey sounds to the brain.

hanzi: 他向每一个愿意听的人抱怨他的不幸。
pinyin: tā xiàng měi yī gè yuàn yì tìng de rén bào yuàn tā de bù xìng。
english: He moaned about his misfortunes to anyone who would listen.

hanzi: 这些犹太人生活在会遭到拘捕的恐惧之中。
pinyin: zhè xie Yóu tài rén shēng huó zài kuài zāo dào jū bǔ de kǒng jù zhī zhōng。
english: The Jews lived in dread of being caught.

hanzi: 她的右手上戴着一枚镶有绿宝石的戒指。
pinyin: tā de yòu shǒu shàng dài zhuó yī méi xiāng yǒu lu:4 bǎo shí de jiè zhi。
english: She wears a ring set with emeralds on her right hand.

hanzi: 他们在窗户上加了窗条以防盗贼进入.
pinyin: tā men zài chuāng hu shàng jiā le chuāng tiáo yǐ fáng dào zéi jìn rù.
english: They fitted bars to their windows to stop burglars getting in.

hanzi: 别看这辆汽车小, 里面还比较宽敞.
pinyin: biè kàn zhè liàng qì chē xiǎo,  lǐ miàn huán bǐ jiào kuān chang.
english: Considering the smallness of the car, it is relatively roomy inside.

hanzi: 他一点儿一点儿攒钱直到够买一辆汽车.
pinyin: tā yī diǎnr yī diǎnr zǎn qián zhí dào gòu mǎi yī liàng qì chē.
english: He saved money bit by bit until he had enough to buy a car.

hanzi: 乘长途汽车唯一可取之处就是旅费便宜.
pinyin: chéng cháng tú qì chē wéi yī kě qǔ zhī chù jiù shì lu:3 fèi pián yi.
english: The cheapness of coach travel is its only recommendation.

hanzi: 中国孩子会在春节前买很多鞭炮。
pinyin: Zhōng guó hái zi kuài zài chūn jié qián mǎi hěn duō biān pào。
english: Chinese children like to buy many firecrackers before the Spring Festival.

hanzi: 主人举起鞭子时，狗抖缩在桌子下边。
pinyin: zhǔ rén jǔ qǐ biān zǐ shí， gǒu dǒu suō zài zhuō zi xià biān。
english: The dog cowered under the table when his master raised the whip.

hanzi: 我正在看一本关于罗马帝国兴衰的书。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài kàn yī běn guān yú Luó mǎ dì guó xìng shuāi de shū。
english: I am reading a book about the rise and fall of the Roman Empire.

hanzi: 那些孩子在操场上玩, 宣泄过剩的精力.
pinyin: nà xiē hái zi zài cāo chǎng shàng wàn,  xuān xiè guò shèng de jīng lì.
english: The children were out in the playground letting off steam.

hanzi: 这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì de gōng yuán yǐ qí huá lì de pēn quán ér著 míng。
english: The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.

hanzi: 这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì de gōng yuán yǐ qí huá lì de pēn quán ér著 míng。
english: The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.

hanzi: 要她去牙科医生那里看病非得生拉硬拽不可.
pinyin: yào tā qù yá kē yī shēng nà li kàn bìng fēi de shēng lā yìng zhuài bù kě.
english: She had to be dragged into seeing the dentist.

hanzi: 普鲁士士兵在锯木厂后边草地上操练。
pinyin: pǔ lǔ shì shì bīng zài jù mù chǎng hòu biān cǎo dì shàng cāo liàn。
english: The Prussians are drilling in the meadow behind the sawmill.

hanzi: 我们必须加倍努力来澄清这一神秘的事件。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū jiā bèi nǔ lì lái dèng qīng zhè yī shén mì de shì jiàn。
english: We must multiply our efforts to clear up the mystery.

hanzi: 这个城市的公园以其华丽的喷泉而著名。
pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì de gōng yuán yǐ qí huá lì de pēn quán ér著 míng。
english: The parks of this city are famous for their ornate fountains.

hanzi: 噪音令人讨厌，尤其当你想睡觉的时候。
pinyin: zào yīn lìng rén tǎo yàn， yóu qí dàng nǐ xiǎng shuì jué de shí hou。
english: Noise is unpleasant, especially when you are trying to sleep.

hanzi: 我希望我的告诫会促使她作出更大的努力。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng wǒ de gào jiè kuài cù shǐ tā zuò chū gèng dà de nǔ lì。
english: I hoped my warning would stimulate her to greater efforts.

hanzi: 这只汉堡包不但气味好闻而且味道好吃。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ hàn bǎo bāo bù dàn qì wèi hào wén ér qiě wèi dao hǎo chī。
english: The hamburger not only smells good but (also) tastes delicious.

hanzi: 这只汉堡包不但气味好闻而且味道好吃。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ hàn bǎo bāo bù dàn qì wèi hào wén ér qiě wèi dao hǎo chī。
english: The hamburger not only smells good but (also) tastes delicious.

hanzi: 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。
pinyin: fú shè xiè lòu de xiāo xi yǐn qǐ le gōng zhòng de pǔ biàn kǒng huāng。
english: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.

hanzi: 那热气腾腾的蛋糕对这个饥饿的男孩是个诱惑。
pinyin: nà rè qì téng téng de dàn gāo duì zhè gè jī è de nán hái shì gè yòu huò。
english: The steaming cake was a bait for the hungry boy.

hanzi: 流行歌星总是抱怨他们受到歌迷的包围。
pinyin: liú xíng gē xīng zǒng shì bào yuàn tā men shòu dào gē mí de bāo wéi。
english: Pop stars are always moaning about being mobbed by their fans.

hanzi: 你总是随心所欲而不考虑我们的情感。
pinyin: nǐ zǒng shì suí xīn suǒ yù ér bù kǎo lu:4 wǒ men de qíng gǎn。
english: You always follow your own inclination instead of thinking of our feelings.

hanzi: 顺着这条大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。
pinyin: shùn zhuó zhè tiáo dà lù zǒu， zài lù de fèn chà kǒu xiàng yòu guǎi。
english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.

hanzi: 他听到的唯一的声音就是那台机器的嗡嗡声。
pinyin: tā tīng dào de wéi yī de shēng yīn jiù shì nà tái jī qì de wēng wēng shēng。
english: The only sound he heard was the hum of the machine.

hanzi: 他用一支笔在地图上标出了波斯湾的位置。
pinyin: tā yòng yī zhī bǐ zài dì tú shàng biāo chū le Bō sī wān de wèi zhi。
english: He indicated the location of the Persian Gulf with a pen on the map.

hanzi: 这位科学家在许多知识领域中都是杰出的。
pinyin: zhè wèi kē xué jiā zài xǔ duō zhī shi lǐng yù zhòng dōu shì jié chū de。
english: The scientist is distinguished in many spheres of knowledge.

hanzi: 战士们唱起了歌颂他们英勇战斗的凯歌。
pinyin: zhàn shì men chàng qǐ le gē sòng tā men yīng yǒng zhàn dòu de kǎi gē。
english: The soldiers sang a song of victory, describing their prowess in battle.

hanzi: 他的建议在理论上可以, 但不能付诸实现。
pinyin: tā de jiàn yì zài lǐ lùn shàng kě yǐ,  dàn bù néng fù zhū shí xiàn。
english: His proposition is good in theory but cannot be put into practice.

hanzi: 电视已成为传播政治思想的重要媒介。
pinyin: diàn shì yǐ chéng wéi chuán bō zhèng zhì sī xiǎng de zhòng yào méi jiè。
english: Television has become an important vehicle for spreading political ideas.

hanzi: 他仅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花园里种花草。
pinyin: tā jǐn yǒu de xiāo qiǎn shì hè pí jiǔ huò zài huā yuán lǐ zhòng huā cǎo。
english: His only recreations are drinking beer and working in the garden.

hanzi: 郁金香在春天开出颜色鲜亮的杯状的花朵。
pinyin: yù jīn xiāng zài chūn tiān kāi chū yán sè xiǎn liàng de bēi zhuàng de huā duǒ。
english: Tulip grows large brightly-colored cup-shaped flower in spring.

hanzi: 汤姆每次转身都把被子往他那边再拉一些。
pinyin: tāng mǔ měi cì zhuǎn shēn dōu bǎ bèi zi wàng tā nà bian zài lā yī xiē。
english: Every time Tom rolled over he pulled more of the bedclothes to his side.

hanzi: 这位将军被誉为领导全国赢得胜利的人。
pinyin: zhè wèi jiāng jūn bèi yù wèi lǐng dǎo quán guó yíng dé shèng lì de rén。
english: The general was extolled as the man who had led the country to victory.

hanzi: 杰克不仅是个好学生，而且还是名篮球队员。
pinyin: jié kè bù jǐn shì gè hào xué sheng， ér qiě hái shì míng lán qiú duì yuán。
english: Jack is not only a good student but also a basketball player.

hanzi: 一般人也许会嘲笑他的音乐，但我们更了解它。
pinyin: yī bān rén yě xǔ kuài cháo xiào tā de yīn yuè， dàn wǒ men gèng liǎo jiě tā。
english: The multitude may laugh at his music, but we know better.

hanzi: 我非常恼怒，以致觉得非给报社写封信不可。
pinyin: wǒ fēi cháng nǎo nù， yǐ zhì jué de fēi jǐ bào shè xiě fēng xìn bù kě。
english: I was so annoyed that I felt impelled to write a letter to the paper.

hanzi: 他把派克大衣兜帽两边都绑得紧紧的来挡住雪。
pinyin: tā bǎ Pài kè dà yī dōu mào liǎng biān dōu bǎng de jǐn jǐn de lái dàng zhù xuě。
english: He held both sides of the parka hood closed against the snow.

hanzi: 由于投资少，我们的工业生产一直停滞不前。
pinyin: yóu yú tóu zī shào， wǒ men de gōng yè shēng chǎn yī zhí tíng zhì bù qián。
english: Due to low investment, our industrial output has remained stagnant.

hanzi: 她沾湿了一块纸巾，轻轻擦去项链上的灰尘。
pinyin: tā zhān shī le yī kuài zhǐ jīn， qīng qīng cā qù xiàng liàn shàng de huī chén。
english: She moistened a tissue and gently wiped the dust off the necklace.

hanzi: 他听到汽车刹车发出的尖锐的声音，然后就摔倒了。
pinyin: tā tīng dào qì chē shā chē fā chū de jiān ruì de shēng yīn， rán hòu jiù shuāi dǎo le。
english: He heard a screech of brakes and then fell down.

hanzi: 木匠量了一下棚屋的尺寸, 立刻估计出它的大小。
pinyin: mù jiàng liàng le yī xià péng wū de chǐ cun,  lì kè gū jì chū tā de dà xiǎo。
english: The carpenter ran his ruler over the shed and sized it up at once.

hanzi: 做试验前，老师给我们每个人发了一张滤纸。
pinyin: zuò shì yàn qián， lǎo shī jǐ wǒ men měi gè rén fà le yī zhāng lu:4 zhǐ。
english: The teacher gave each of us a piece of filter paper before doing the experiment.

hanzi: 魔术师口中念念有词, 把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来.
pinyin: mó shù shī kǒu zhòng niàn niàn yǒu cí,  bǎ tù zi zòng lǐ mào zhòng tāo le chū lai.
english: `Abracadabra,' said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.

hanzi: 我觉得你嘲笑他说英语的方式刺伤了他的自尊心。
pinyin: wǒ jué de nǐ cháo xiào tā shuō Yīng yǔ de fāng shì cì shāng le tā de zì zūn xīn。
english: I think you hurt his pride by laughing at the way he speaks English.

hanzi: 这个百万富翁已把他一半的股票移交给他的长子。
pinyin: zhè gè bǎi wàn fù wēng yǐ bǎ tā yī bàn de gǔ piào yí jiāo jǐ tā de Zhǎng zǐ。
english: The millionaire has handed over 50 percent of his stock to his first son.

hanzi: 其他地方更优厚的薪金待遇诱使他离开了公司。
pinyin: qí tā dì fang gèng yōu hòu de xīn jīn dài yù yòu shǐ tā lí kāi le gōng sī。
english: He was seduced into leaving the company by the offer of higher pay elsewhere.

hanzi: 他们的主要出口货物是纺织品，特别是丝绸和棉布。
pinyin: tā men de zhǔ yào chū kǒu huò wù shì fǎng zhī pǐn， tè bié shì sī chóu huò mián bù。
english: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.

hanzi: 他不敢把令人不快的真情告诉他们。他是条哑吧狗。
pinyin: tā bù gǎn bǎ lìng rén bù kuài de zhēn qíng gào su tā men。 tā shì tiáo yǎ ba gǒu。
english: He is afraid to tell them the unpalatable truths. He is a dumb dog.

hanzi: 这栋房子对我们来说不够大，而且离城太远了。
pinyin: zhè dòng fáng zi duì wǒ men lái shuō bù gòu dà， ér qiě lí chéng tài yuǎn le。
english: This house is not large enough for us, and further, it is too far from the town.

hanzi: 这栋房子对我们来说不够大，而且离城太远了。
pinyin: zhè dòng fáng zi duì wǒ men lái shuō bù gòu dà， ér qiě lí chéng tài yuǎn le。
english: This house is not large enough for us, and further, it is too far from the town.

hanzi: 大部分印第安人生活在联邦政府建立的保留地上。
pinyin: dà bù fen yìn dì ān rén shēng huó zài lián bāng zhèng fǔ jiàn lì de bǎo liú dì shang。
english: Most Indian live on reservation establish by the federal government.

hanzi: 无论报纸上刊登什么荒谬的东西，总有人相信。
pinyin: wú lùn bào zhǐ shàng kān dēng shén me huāng miù de dōng xi， zǒng yǒu rén xiāng xìn。
english: Whatsoever nonsense the newspaper prints, some people always believe it.

hanzi: 这幅画表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。
pinyin: zhè fú huà biǎo xiàn le niú zài xī biān yǐn shuǐ de mí rén de tián yuán fēng guāng。
english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.

hanzi: 孩子喂饱后不哭不闹的满足状使疲惫的母亲很满意。
pinyin: hái zi wèi bǎo hòu bù kū bù nào de mǎn zú zhuàng shǐ pí bèi de mǔ qīn hěn mǎn yì。
english: The quiet contentment of a well-fed child satisfied the tired mother.

hanzi: 父亲想到乡下去，可是孩子们吵着要去海滨。
pinyin: fù qīn xiǎng dào xiāng xià qù， kě shì hái zi men chǎo zhuó yào qù hǎi bīn。
english: Father wanted to go to the country, but the children were whooping it up for the beach.

hanzi: 最近，许多州坚持中学应该教学生如何开车。
pinyin: zuì jìn， xǔ duō zhōu jiān chí zhōng xué yīng gāi jiào xué shēng rú hé kāi chē。
english: Recently, many states have insisted that high schools teach students how to drive.

hanzi: 那人太阳穴上贴了一块膏药，看上去像个卡通人物。
pinyin: nà rén tài yáng xué shàng tiē le yī kuài gāo yào， kàn shàng qù xiàng gè kǎ tōng rén wù。
english: The man looks like a cartoon character with a plaster on his temple.

hanzi: 那架喷气式飞机低飞掠过房顶, 隆隆声把大家吓了一跳.
pinyin: nà jià pèn qì shì fēi jī dī fēi lu:è guò fáng dǐng,  lóng lóng shēng bǎ dà jiā xià le yī tiào.
english: The jet zoomed low over the houses, frightening everyone.

hanzi: 这些优异的成绩给我们全体工作人员带来了莫大的光荣.
pinyin: zhè xie yōu yì de chéng jī jǐ wǒ men quán tǐ gōng zuò rén yuán dài lái le mò dà de guāng róng.
english: These excellent results reflect great credit on all our staff.

hanzi: 庄园主宅第是一栋环抱在美丽的花园中的大理石房子。
pinyin: zhuāng yuán zhǔ zhái dì shì yī dòng huán bào zài měi lì de huā yuán zhòng dì dà lǐ shí fáng zi。
english: The manor is a marble house surrounded by a beautiful garden.

hanzi: 这块地毯已经脏得辨认不出原来的颜色了.
pinyin: zhè kuài dì tǎn yǐ jīng zàng de biàn rèn bù chū yuán lái de yán sè le.
english: The carpet was badly stained, to such an extent that (ie so much that) you couldn't tell its original colour.

hanzi: 各反对党指责修建新机场是浪费纳税人的金钱。
pinyin: gè fǎn duì dǎng zhǐ zé xiū jiàn xīn jī chǎng shì làng fèi nà shuì rén de jīn qián。
english: The opposition parties have condemned the new airport as a waste of taxpayers' money.

hanzi: 开出鲜艳花朵的爬藤植物瀑布般悬挂在花园墙上。
pinyin: kāi chū xiān yàn huā duǒ de pá téng zhí wù pù bù bān xuán guà zài huā yuán qiáng shàng。
english: Climbing plants with their bright flowers hung in cascades over the garden wall.

hanzi: 美国的公共教育史起源于早期拓荒者的社会。
pinyin: Měi guó de gōng gòng jiào yù shǐ qǐ yuán yú zǎo qī tuò huāng zhě de shè huì。
english: The history of public education in the United States dates from the society of the early pioneers.

hanzi: 工会运动旨在争取更高的工资和更好的工作条件。
pinyin: gōng huì yùn dòng zhǐ zài zhēng qǔ gèng gāo de gōng zī huò gèng hǎo de gōng zuò tiáo jiàn。
english: The Trade Union Movement works to obtain higher wages and better conditions.

hanzi: 如果你们不是很熟的话，问别人薪水多少是很不礼貌的。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ men bú shì hěn shú de huà， wèn bié rén xīn shuǐ duō shao shì hěn bù lǐ mào de。
english: It's bad manners to ask other's salary if you are not very familiar.

hanzi: 热天穿棉布之类有渗透性的材料制成的衣服最为适宜。
pinyin: rè tiān chuān mián bù zhī lèi yǒu shèn tòu xìng de cái liào zhì chéng de yī fu zuì wéi shì yí。
english: In hot weather cloths made of a porous material like cotton are best.

hanzi: 美利坚合众国保证合众国各州实行共和政体。
pinyin: měi lì jiān hé zhòng guó bǎo zhèng hé zhòng guó gè zhōu shí xíng gòng hé zhèng tǐ。
english: The United States shall guarantee to every state in this union a republican form of government.

hanzi: 吉姆在物理考试中作弊却逃避了惩罚, 麦克则受到责备。
pinyin: jí mǔ zài wù lǐ kǎo shì zhòng zuò bì què táo bì le chéng fá,  mài kè zé shòu dào zé bèi。
english: Jim got away with cheating in the physics test, while Mike was scolded.

hanzi: 他们这些颠覆性的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染。
pinyin: tā men zhè xie diān fù xìng de sī xiǎng shì duì wǒ men nián qīng rén de jīng shén wū rǎn。
english: They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.

hanzi: 现在场景转到仓库，行凶者正埋伏在那里伺机行动。
pinyin: xiàn zài chǎng jǐng zhuàn dào cāng kù， xìng xiōng zhě zhèng mái fú zài nà li sì jī xíng dòng。
english: And now the scene shifts to the warehouse, where the murderer is lying in wait.

hanzi: 财务董事派人带话说，她因不能出席会议而向大家道歉。
pinyin: cái wù dǒng shì pài rén dài huà shuō， tā yīn bù néng chū xí huì yì ér xiàng dà jiā dào qiàn。
english: The Finance Director sends her apology and is unable to attend the meeting.

hanzi: 我不知道他着了什么魔，在那条热闹的街上把车子开得这么快。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī dào tā zhuó le shén me mó， zài nà tiáo rè nao de jiē shàng bǎ jū zi kāi de zhè me kuài。
english: I don't know what possessed him to drive so fast down that busy street.

hanzi: 我们赢得了合同，但是却经过了多次不屈不挠的谈判才达到目的。
pinyin: wǒ men yíng dé le hé tong， dàn shì què jīng guò le duō cì bù qū bù náo de tán pàn cái dá dào mù dì。
english: We won the contract but only through a lot of tough negotiating.

hanzi: 这种炎热的天气在夜晚尚能忍受，但白天就令人感到呼吸困难。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yán rè de tiān qì zài yè wǎn shàng néng rěn shòu， dàn bái tiān jiù lìng rén gǎn dào hū xī kùn nan。
english: The heat was tolerable at night but suffocating during the day.

hanzi: 那是我以前最喜欢的饭馆，但近来烹饪水平已大不如前了。
pinyin: nà shì wǒ yǐ qián zuì xǐ huan de fàn guǎn， dàn jìn lái pēng rèn shuǐ píng yǐ dà bù rú qián le。
english: It used to be my favourite restaurant but the standard of cooking has fallen off recently.

hanzi: 小手鼓一种用手敲击的鼓，连结在一起声调和谐的一对中的一个
pinyin: xiǎo shǒu gǔ yī zhòng yòng shǒu qiāo jī de gǔ， lián jié zài yī qǐ shēng diào hé xié de yī duì zhòng dì yī gè
english: One of a pair of connected tuned drums that are played by beating with the hands.

hanzi: 闪光装置如广告宣传告示上的一种自动点燃或熄灭电灯的装置
pinyin: shǎn guāng zhuāng zhì rú guǎng gào xuān chuán gào shì shàng de yī zhòng zì dòng diǎn rán huò xī miè diàn dēng de zhuāng zhì
english: A device that automatically switches an electric lamp off and on, as in a commercial display sign.

hanzi: 我真希望我们能够看到更多新的电视节目，而不是翻来覆去的那几个老节目。
pinyin: wǒ zhēn xī wàng wǒ men néng gòu kàn dào gèng duō xīn de diàn shì jié mù， ér bú shì fān lái fù qù de nà jǐ ge lǎo jié mù。
english: I wish we could see more new programmes on television, not repeats all the time.

hanzi: 有人指定拉姆奇夫人把钱装在一只纸盒子里，并把纸板盒放在她的门外边。

english: Mrs Ramsay was instructed to place the money in a cardboard box and to leave it outside her door.

english: I've written a letter of complaint to State Rail; somebody has got to carry the banner for better standards of service.

hanzi: 规范语法阐述的是该派语法学家认为的某语言的口语或书面语的标准形式.
pinyin: guī fàn yǔ fǎ chǎn shù de shì gāi pài yǔ fǎ xué jiā rèn wéi de mǒu yǔ yán de kǒu yǔ huò shū miàn yǔ de biāo zhǔn xíng shì.
english: A normative grammar of a language describes how its authors think the language should be spoken or written.

hanzi: 我的未完成的过去，从后边缠绕到我身上，使我难于死去。请从它那里释放了我吧。

english: Release me from my unfulfilled past clinging to me from behind making death difficult.

pinyin: zhè shì shàng yǒu xiē rén bǎ zhěng gè shí jiān huā fèi yú sōu xún zhèng yì， què téng bù chū shí jiān lái fù zhū shí jiàn。

english: The rough road made the car vibrate.

hanzi: 女王以传统仪式举行了加冕礼。
pinyin: nu:3 wáng yǐ chuán tǒng yí shì jǔ xíng le jiā miǎn lǐ。
english: The queen was crowned with proper ceremony.

hanzi: 人们聚集在篝火周围唱歌。
pinyin: rén men jù jí zài gōu huǒ zhōu wéi chàng gē。
english: The men clustered together round the fire and sang songs.

hanzi: 帮我洗洗这些锅碗瓢盆好吗？
pinyin: bāng wǒ xǐ xǐ zhè xie guō wǎn piáo pén hào ma？
english: Will you help me to wash up all these pots and pans?

hanzi: 你真的一点也不关心你的将来？
pinyin: nǐ zhēn de yī diǎn yě bù guān xīn nǐ de jiāng lái？
english: Do you really care nothing about your future?

hanzi: 我可以搭乘你的便车到车站吗？
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ dā chéng nǐ de pián jū dào chē zhàn ma？
english: Can I hitch a lift with you as far as the station?

hanzi: 窗帘上绘有精美的花卉图案。
pinyin: chuāng lián shàng huì yǒu jīng měi de huā huì tú àn。
english: The curtains had an elaborate pattern of flowers.

hanzi: 水痘是一种常见的儿童期疾病。
pinyin: shuǐ dòu shì yī zhòng cháng jiàn de ér tóng qī jí bìng。
english: Chicken pox is a common childhood sickness.

hanzi: 你认为他当真要离开公司吗？
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi tā dàng zhēn yào lí kāi gōng sī ma？
english: Do you think he is serious about leaving the company?

hanzi: 精通一门外语难不难?
pinyin: jīng tōng yī mén wài yǔ nàn bù nàn?
english: Is it difficult to feel at home in (ie confident when using) a foreign language?

hanzi: 懦夫一生要经过许多次死的痛苦。
pinyin: nuò fū yī shēng yào jīng guò xǔ duō cì sǐ de tòng kǔ。
english: Cowards die many times before their death.

hanzi: 我还能有别的方法可以向她道歉吗？
pinyin: wǒ huán néng yǒu bié de fāng fǎ kě yǐ xiàng tā dào qiàn ma？
english: How else can I apologize for her?

hanzi: 谁把我写在黑板上的数字擦掉了?
pinyin: shéi bǎ wǒ xiě zài hēi bǎn shàng de shù zì cā diào le?
english: Who's rubbed my figures off the blackboard?

hanzi: 游完泳后你愿意放松一下吗？
pinyin: yóu wán yǒng hòu nǐ yuàn yì fàng sōng yī xià ma？
english: Would you like to have some relaxation after swimming?

hanzi: 一座雄伟的大桥横亘在大江之上。
pinyin: yī zuò xióng wěi de dà qiáo hèng gèn zài dà jiāng zhī shàng。
english: A magnificent bridge spans the river.

hanzi: 伦敦是世界上最大的城市之一。
pinyin: lún dūn shì shì jiè shàng zuì dà de chéng shì zhī yī。
english: London is among the greatest cities of the world.

hanzi: 你弟弟今天上午在公园玩耍吗？
pinyin: nǐ dì di jīn tiān shàng wǔ zài gōng yuán wàn shuǎ ma？
english: Did your brother play in the park this morning?

hanzi: 什么是解决这个问题的最好方法？
pinyin: shén me shì jiě jué zhè gè wèn tí de zuì hǎo fāng fǎ？
english: What's the best way to tackle this problem?

hanzi: 包饺子前，我把瘦肉细细剁碎。
pinyin: bāo jiǎo zi qián， wǒ bǎ shòu ròu xì xì duò suì。
english: I minced the lean meat finely before making dumplings.

hanzi: 要是问题一次只发生一个该多好！
pinyin: yào shì wèn tí yī cì zhǐ fā shēng yī gè gāi duō hào！
english: If only problems would come one at a time!

hanzi: 总统正在对欧洲做私人访问。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng zhèng zài duì ōu zhōu zuò sī rén fǎng wèn。
english: The president is paying a private visit to Europe.

hanzi: 咱们一起复习你的英语练习好吗？
pinyin: zán men yī qǐ fù xí nǐ de Yīng yǔ liàn xí hào ma？
english: Shall we go over your English exercises together?

hanzi: 你看到火车站对面的房子了吗？
pinyin: nǐ kàn dào huǒ chē zhàn duì miàn de fáng zi le ma？
english: Have you seen the house opposite the railway station?

hanzi: 你能告诉我这些鞋子的零售价吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng gào su wǒ zhè xie xié zi de líng shòu jie ma？
english: Could you tell me the retail prices of these shoes?

hanzi: 这只小动物有一双淡褐色的眼睛。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ xiǎo dòng wù yǒu yī shuāng dàn hè sè de yǎn jīng。
english: This small animal has a pair of hazel eyes.

hanzi: 这个女人说："也许他又聋又哑吧。"
pinyin: zhè gè nu:3 rén shuō：" yě xǔ tā yòu lóng yòu yǎ ba。"
english: "Perhaps he's deaf and dumb, " said the woman.

hanzi: 谁自愿来帮忙收拾一下这些盘子？
pinyin: shéi zì yuàn lái bāng máng shōu shi yī xià zhè xie pán zi？
english: Can I have a volunteer to wash the dishes?

hanzi: 我丢了一块带蓝色花边的白手绢。
pinyin: wǒ diū le yī kuài dài lán sè huā biān de bái shǒu juàn。
english: I lost a white handkerchief with a blue border.

hanzi: 包饺子前，我把瘦肉细细剁碎。
pinyin: bāo jiǎo zi qián， wǒ bǎ shòu ròu xì xì duò suì。
english: I minced the lean meat finely before making dumplings.

hanzi: 车朝我开过来时约翰叫道:"小心!"
pinyin: jū cháo wǒ kāi guò lai shí Yuē hàn jiào dào:" xiǎo xīn!"
english: "Look out!" Jone called as the car came towards me.

hanzi: 日落时, 西边天空有一道红晖.
pinyin: rì luò shí,  xī biān tiān kōng yǒu yī dào hóng huī.
english: At sunset, there was a bar of red across the western sky.

hanzi: 贵国是什么时候实行普选权的？
pinyin: guì guó shì shén me shí hou shí xíng pǔ xuǎn quán de？
english: When was universal suffrage introduced in your country?

hanzi: 请您告诉我怎样去联络律师？
pinyin: qǐng nín gào su wǒ zěn yàng qù lián luò lu:4 shī？
english: Could you please inform me how to go about contacting a lawyer?

hanzi: 他们正在建设一条海底电缆隧道。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài jiàn shè yī tiáo hǎi dǐ diàn lǎn suì dào。
english: They are building a submarine cable tunnel.

hanzi: 你能告诉我去火车站最近的路吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng gào su wǒ qù huǒ chē zhàn zuì jìn de lù ma？
english: Can you tell me the nearest way to the railway station?

hanzi: 我坐在庭院里享受明媚的阳光。
pinyin: wǒ zuò zài tíng yuàn lǐ xiǎng shòu míng mèi de yáng guāng。
english: I was sitting in the garden enjoying the sunshine.

hanzi: 送小孩上学的重担又推给了我！
pinyin: sòng xiǎo hái shàng xué de zhòng dàn yòu tuī jǐ le wǒ！
english: I got saddled with taking the children to school again!

hanzi: 请您告诉我怎样去联络律师？
pinyin: qǐng nín gào su wǒ zěn yàng qù lián luò lu:4 shī？
english: Could you please inform me how to go about contacting a lawyer?

hanzi: 克莱尔, 那板上的画儿是你的大作吗?
pinyin: kè lái ěr,  nà bǎn shàng de huàr shì nǐ de dà zuò ma?
english: Is that drawing on the board your handiwork, Clare?

hanzi: 你是怎样庆祝结婚周年纪念日的？
pinyin: nǐ shì zěn yàng qìng zhù jié hūn zhōu nián jì niàn rì de？
english: How did you celebrate your wedding anniversary?

hanzi: 月球对地球的吸引力造成潮汐。
pinyin: yuè qiú duì dì qiú de xī yǐn lì zào chéng cháo xì。
english: The attraction of the moon for the earth causes the tides.

hanzi: 你还记得我们解剖青蛙的那堂课吗？
pinyin: nǐ huán jì de wǒ men jiě pōu qīng wā de nà táng kè ma？
english: Do you remember the lesson on the anatomy of a frog?

hanzi: 这本书名为《美国文学指南》。
pinyin: zhè běn shū míng wèi《 Měi guó wén xué zhǐ nán》。
english: This book is titled An Introduction to American Literature.

hanzi: ｀他听得见我们的话吗?＇｀大概听不见.＇
pinyin: ｀ tā tìng de xiàn wǒ men de huà ma?＇｀ dà gài tìng bù jiàn.＇
english: `Can he hear us?' `Probably not.'

hanzi: 你能不能派个助手来取这份档案？
pinyin: nǐ néng bù néng pài gè zhù shǒu lái qǔ zhè fèn dàng àn？
english: Can you send one of your minions to collect this file?

hanzi: 这位不是别人，正是我的老朋友约翰。
pinyin: zhè wèi bú shì bié rén， zhèng shì wǒ de lǎo péng you Yuē hàn。
english: This is no other than my old friend, John.

hanzi: 这些树林里经常栖息着各种鸟类。
pinyin: zhè xie shù lín lǐ jīng cháng qī xī zhuó gè zhǒng niǎo lèi。
english: These woods are frequented by all kinds of birds.

hanzi: 这位不是别人，正是我的老朋友约翰。
pinyin: zhè wèi bú shì bié rén， zhèng shì wǒ de lǎo péng you Yuē hàn。
english: This is no other than my old friend, John.

hanzi: 她提　一个棕色的纸包，里面是书。
pinyin: tā tí　 yī gè zōng sè de zhǐ bāo， lǐ miàn shì shū。
english: She was carrying a parcel of books done up in brown paper.

hanzi: 这位不是别人，正是我的老朋友约翰。
pinyin: zhè wèi bú shì bié rén， zhèng shì wǒ de lǎo péng you Yuē hàn。
english: This is no other than my old friend, John.

hanzi: 劳驾，您能告诉我在哪能买到邮票吗？
pinyin: láo jià， nín néng gào su wǒ zài něi néng mǎi dào yóu piào ma？
english: Excuse me, can you tell where to get stamp?

hanzi: 不要着急：这项工程会有好结果的
pinyin: bù yào zháo jí： zhè xiàng gōng chéng kuài yǒu hào jié guǒ de
english: Don't worry: this project will come out in the wash.

hanzi: 我（那时）很着急。－－你用不着着急嘛。
pinyin: wǒ（ nà shí） hěn zháo jí。－－ nǐ yòng bù zhuó zháo jí ma。
english: I was worried. You needn't have been.

hanzi: 他坐在操场上，聆听远处的蛙鸣。
pinyin: tā zuò zài cāo chǎng shàng， líng tīng yuǎn chù de wā míng。
english: He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak.

hanzi: 那次行进速度很快, 到中午已抵达伦敦.
pinyin: nà cì xíng jìn sù dù hěn kuài,  dào zhōng wǔ yǐ dǐ dá lún dūn.
english: It was good going to reach London by midday.

hanzi: 克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家。
pinyin: kè lǐ sī tuō fú· gē lún bù shì wěi dà de tàn xiǎn jiā。
english: Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers.

hanzi: 他们在外国保持多少个军事基地？
pinyin: tā men zài wài guó bǎo chí duō shao gè jūn shì jī dì？
english: How many military bases are they maintaining on foreign soil?

hanzi: 我想请你下星期日去参加舞会好吗？
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ xià xīng qī rì qù cān jiā wǔ huì hào ma？
english: I would like to invite you to a ball next Sunday.

hanzi: 你去开会之前，咱们能私下说句话吗？
pinyin: nǐ qù kāi huì zhī qián， zán men néng sī xià shuō jù huà ma？
english: Could we have a word before you go to the meeting?

hanzi: 我喜欢夏天吃莴苣，我的兔子也喜欢。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan xià tiān jí wō jù， wǒ de tù zi yě xǐ huan。
english: I like to eat lettuce in summer, and so does my rabbit.

hanzi: 咒语将青蛙和老鼠又变回成了人。
pinyin: zhòu yǔ jiàng qīng wā huò lǎo shǔ yòu biàn huí chéng le rén。
english: The magic spell changed the frogs and rats back into men.

hanzi: 火蜥蜴曾被认为能生活于火中。
pinyin: huǒ xī yì zēng bèi rèn wéi néng shēng huó yú huǒ zhòng。
english: Salamanders once were thought to be capable of living in fire.

hanzi: 这个悬而未决的问题什么时候能解决呢？
pinyin: zhè gè xuán ér wèi jué de wèn tí shén me shí hou néng jiě jué ne？
english: When will the pendent problem be solved?

hanzi: 公爵命令仆人把一封信送给国王。
pinyin: gōng jué mìng lìng pú rén bǎ yī fēng xìn sòng jǐ guó wáng。
english: The duke ordered the servant to send a letter to the king.

hanzi: 你的意见是否代表其他学生的意见？
pinyin: nǐ de yì jiàn shì fǒu dài biǎo qí tā xué sheng de yì jiàn？
english: Are your opinions representative of the other students?

hanzi: “这是您的车吗，先生？” 警察问道。
pinyin: “ zhè shì nín de jū ma， xiān sheng？”  jǐng chá wèn dào。
english: "Is this your vehicle, sir?" asked the policeman.

hanzi: 他坐在操场上，聆听远处的蛙鸣。
pinyin: tā zuò zài cāo chǎng shàng， líng tīng yuǎn chù de wā míng。
english: He sat on the playground listening to the distant croak.

hanzi: 我建议刚开始爬山的人使用拐杖。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì gāng kāi shǐ pá shān de rén shǐ yòng guǎi zhàng。
english: When climbing a mountain I advise beginners to use a staff.

hanzi: 他这个人有点轻薄--别跟他太认真!
pinyin: tā zhè gè rén yǒu diǎn qīng bò-- biè gēn tā tài rèn zhēn!
english: He's a bit of a philanderer -- don't take him too seriously!

hanzi: 她不但参加了竞赛--而且居然获胜了!
pinyin: tā bù dàn cān jiā le jìng sài-- ér qiě jū rán huò shèng le!
english: She not only entered the competition she actually won it!

hanzi: 你去开会之前，咱们能私下说句话吗？
pinyin: nǐ qù kāi huì zhī qián， zán men néng sī xià shuō jù huà ma？
english: Could we have a word before you go to the meeting?

hanzi: 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品.
pinyin: yì、  sì、  zhù suǒ shì shēng huó de jī běn bì xū pǐn.
english: Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.

hanzi: 空气中有熏衣草和迷迭香花的味道。
pinyin: kōng qì zhòng yǒu xūn yì cǎo huò mí dié xiāng huā de wèi dao。
english: There is a lavender scent and rosemary scent in the air.

hanzi: 父亲有时候带着手杖出去散步。
pinyin: fù qīn yǒu shí hou dài zhū shǒu zhàng chū qù sàn bù。
english: My father sometimes goes out for a stroll with a stick in his hand.

hanzi: 你读了有关信息革命的那篇文章没有？
pinyin: nǐ dú le yǒu guān xìn xī gé mìng de nà piān wén zhāng méi yǒu？
english: Have you read the article on information revolution?

hanzi: 五、 四、 三、 二、 一、 零. 我们升空了!
pinyin: wǔ、  sì、  sān、  èr、  yī、  líng.  wǒ men shēng kōng le!
english: Five, four, three, two, one, zero. We have lift-off!

hanzi: 你把玩具玩儿完了以後放进柜子里去.
pinyin: nǐ bǎ wán jù wánr wán le yǐ後 fàng jìn guì zi lǐ qù.
english: Put your toys away in the cupboard, when you've finished playing.

hanzi: 她爱市场上的生趣、喧哗与多姿多彩。
pinyin: tā ài shì chǎng shàng de shēng qù、 xuān huá yù duō zī duō cǎi。
english: She loved the life, noise, and color of the market.

hanzi: 万岁日本人在进攻时的呐喊或爱国的欢呼；
pinyin: wàn suì Rì běn rén zài jìn gōng shí de ne hǎn huò ài guó de huān hū；
english: A Japanese battle cry or patriotic cheer.

hanzi: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。
pinyin: tā rì yè qí qiú shàng dì fù yǔ tā qián jìng de xīn。
english: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.

hanzi: 最初她只是微笑，後来才放声大笑。
pinyin: zuì chū tā zhǐ shì wēi xiào，後 lái cái fàng shēng dà xiào。
english: First of all she just smiled, then she started to laugh.

hanzi: 想到还需重新考试，我就感到沮丧。
pinyin: xiǎng dào huán xū chóng xīn kǎo shì， wǒ jiù gǎn dào jǔ sàng。
english: The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.

hanzi: 她晚了一个钟头了吧? 她就是这样.
pinyin: tā wǎn le yī gè zhōng tóu le ba?  tā jiù shì zhè yàng.
english: She was an hour late, was she? That's about par for the course for her.

hanzi: 日记簿用来保存个人经历记载的本子
pinyin: rì jì bù yòng lái bǎo cún gè rén jīng lì jì zǎi de běn zi
english: A book for use in keeping a personal record, as of experiences.

hanzi: 公园对大城市的居民是大有裨益的设施。
pinyin: gōng yuán duì dà chéng shì de jū mín shì dà yǒu bì yì de shè shī。
english: Parks are a great boon to people in big cities.

hanzi: 我们刚才看见的那位同志是你的老师吗？
pinyin: wǒ men gāng cái kàn jiàn de nà wèi tóng zhì shì nǐ de lǎo shī ma？
english: Be the comrade whom we see just now your teacher?

hanzi: 她与原来的丈夫离婚十年後又复婚了.
pinyin: tā yù yuán lái de zhàng fu lí hūn shí nián後 yòu fù hūn le.
english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.

hanzi: 玛丽不但清扫房间而且也洗刷窗子。
pinyin: Mǎ lì bù dàn qīng sǎo fáng jiān ér qiě yě xǐ shuā chuāng zǐ。
english: Mary not only cleaned the room but (also) washed the window.

hanzi: 今天早晨报上有什么有趣的新闻吗？
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo chén bào shàng yǒu shén me yǒu qù de xīn wén ma？
english: Are there any interesting news items in the paper this morning?

hanzi: 我们真的处于困境——没人照顾婴儿。
pinyin: wǒ men zhēn de chǔ yú kùn jìng—— mò rén zhào gu yīng ér。
english: We are in a real fix - there is nobody to look after the baby.

hanzi: 处理这种困难你有什么具体的想法？
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè zhǒng kùn nan nǐ yǒu shén me jù tǐ de xiǎng fǎ？
english: Have you any concrete thoughts on how to deal with this difficulty?

hanzi: 新闻——当有人咬狗、或者打劫酒店之时。
pinyin: xīn wén—— dàng yǒu rén yǎo gǒu、 huò zhě dǎ jié jiǔ diàn zhī shí。
english: News- when a man bite a dog or rob a hotel.

hanzi: 德语中有三性: 阳性、 阴性和中性.
pinyin: dé yǔ zhòng yǒu sān xìng:  yáng xìng、  yīn xìng huò zhōng xìng.
english: There are three genders in German: masculine, feminine and neuter.

hanzi: 公众的利益高於个人的利益.
pinyin: gōng zhòng de lì yì gāo yū gè rén de lì yì.
english: The needs of the community must take precedence over (ie must be met before) individual requirements.

hanzi: 我父亲总是对我做事的方式百般挑剔。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn zǒng shì duì wǒ zuò shì de fāng shì bǎi bān tiāo ti。
english: My father is always finding fault with the way I do things.

hanzi: 古埃及的许多法老相信他们可以永生。
pinyin: gǔ Aī jí de xǔ duō fǎ lǎo xiāng xìn tā men kě yǐ yǒng shēng。
english: Many Pharaohs in ancient Egypt believe they can live forever.

hanzi: 她踩到一块松动的石头上，扭伤了脚踝。
pinyin: tā cǎi dào yī kuài sōng dòng de shí tou shàng， niǔ shāng le jiǎo huái。
english: She stepped on a loose stone and twisted her ankle.

hanzi: 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ tóng yì wǒ de yì jiàn， jiù míng bai de huí dá“ shì”。
english: Answer with a plain "yes" if you agree with me.

hanzi: 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ tóng yì wǒ de yì jiàn， jiù míng bai de huí dá“ shì”。
english: Answer with a plain "yes" if you agree with me.

hanzi: 他买了一个鳕鱼罐头和一个三明治作晚饭。
pinyin: tā mǎi le yī gè xuě yú guàn tou huò yī gè sān míng zhì zuò wǎn fàn。
english: He bought a canned cod and a sandwich as supper.

hanzi: 听到煤气的嘶嘶声，他冲进来把它关掉。
pinyin: tīng dào méi qì de sī sī shēng， tā chōng jìn lái bǎ tā guān diào。
english: Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off.

hanzi: 听到煤气的嘶嘶声，他冲进来把它关掉。
pinyin: tīng dào méi qì de sī sī shēng， tā chōng jìn lái bǎ tā guān diào。
english: Hearing the hiss of gas, he rushed in and turned it off.

hanzi: 他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去.
pinyin: tā zài wài miàn yóu yù pái huái,  yīn guò yū dǎn qiè ér bù gǎn jìn qù.
english: He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.

hanzi: 我们（各处）找了半天, 却找不到那本书.
pinyin: wǒ men（ gè chù） zhǎo le bàn tiān,  què zhǎo bù dào nà běn shū.
english: We searched (around) for hours, but couldn't find the book.

hanzi: 她把新歌剧院叫作 “那讨厌的庞然大物”。
pinyin: tā bǎ xīn gē jù yuàn jiào zuò “ nà tǎo yàn de páng rán dà wù”。
english: She calls the new opera house "that hideous erection".

hanzi: 此款项将用於建设新学校（的开销）.
pinyin: cǐ kuǎn xiàng jiàng yòng yū jiàn shè xīn xué xiào（ de kāi xiāo）.
english: The money will go towards (the cost of) building a new school.

hanzi: 他是一个随和的人，但就是喜欢自吹自擂。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè suí he de rén， dàn jiù shì xǐ huan zì chuī zì lèi。
english: He is an agreeable fellow, but likes to blow his own horn.

hanzi: 天气多好哇，咱们何不开车到海边玩玩？
pinyin: tiān qì duō hào wā， zán men hé bù kāi chē dào hǎi biān wàn wàn？
english: It's a lovely sunny day; why don't we run down to the coast?

hanzi: 顾客赊帐簿商人登记顾客购买的商品的本子
pinyin: gù kè shē zhàng bù shāng rén dēng jì gù kè gòu mǎi de shāng pǐn de běn zi
english: A book in which a merchant records credit sales.

hanzi: 这沙土地利於排水, 适於种植块根作物.
pinyin: zhè shā tǔ de lì yū pái shuǐ,  shì yū zhòng zhí kuài gēn zuò wù.
english: This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.

hanzi: 摩托车手必须戴头盔保护自己免受伤害。
pinyin: mó tuō chē shǒu bì xū dài tou kuī bǎo hù zì jǐ miǎn shòu shāng hài。
english: Motorcyclists must wear helmets to shield them from injury.

hanzi: 许多人到国外时，都感受到文化震撼。
pinyin: xǔ duō rén dào guó wài shí， dōu gǎn shòu dào wén huà zhèn hàn。
english: Many people suffered from cultural shock when they came abroad.

hanzi: 【谚】今天能够做的事，切莫拖延到明天。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 jīn tiān néng gòu zuò de shì， qiè mò tuō yán dào míng tiān。
english: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.

hanzi: 北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。
pinyin: běi jí xióng suī rán kuài yóu yǒng， dàn yě shì lù xī dòng wù。
english: Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.

hanzi: 我的铅笔钝了，你能借我把刀子削一削吗？
pinyin: wǒ de qiān bǐ dùn le， nǐ néng jiè wǒ bǎ dāo zi xuē yī xuē ma？
english: My pencil is blunt, could you lend me a knife to sharpen it?

hanzi: 戴维觉得（与别的孩子）交朋友是很难的事.
pinyin: Dài wéi jué de（ yù bié de hái zi） jiāo péng you shì hěn nàn de shì.
english: David finds it hard to make friends (with other children).

hanzi: 天气多好哇，咱们何不开车到海边玩玩？
pinyin: tiān qì duō hào wā， zán men hé bù kāi chē dào hǎi biān wàn wàn？
english: It's a lovely sunny day; why don't we run down to the coast?

hanzi: 那种新的发式的确使她好看一些[好看多了].
pinyin: nà zhòng xīn de fà shì dí què shǐ tā hǎo kàn yī xiē[ hǎo kàn duō le].
english: That new hairstyle really does something/a lot for her.

hanzi: 大火扑灭之後, 工厂只剩下个空架子了.
pinyin: dà huǒ pū miè zhī後,  gōng chǎng zhǐ shèng xià gè kòng jià zi le.
english: Only the shell of the factory was left after the fire had been put out.

hanzi: 在凉爽的天气里轻松地散步令人心旷神怡。
pinyin: zài liáng shuǎng de tiān qì lǐ qīng sōng de sàn bù lìng rén xīn kuàng shén yí。
english: A brisk walk in cool weather is invigorating.

hanzi: 我们需要具有真知灼见的人来领导这个党。
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào jù yǒu zhēn zhī zhuó jiàn de rén lái lǐng dǎo zhè gè dǎng。
english: We need someone with real vision to lead the party.

hanzi: 雪崩发生的时候我们的处境多么危险啊！
pinyin: xuě bēng fā shēng de shí hou wǒ men de chǔ jìng duō me wēi xiǎn a！
english: What a precarious situation we were in when the avalanche started!

hanzi: 你认为她的小说属于文学类，还是其它类?
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi tā de xiǎo shuō shǔ yú wén xué lèi， hái shì qí tā lèi?
english: Would you classify her novels as serious literature or other?

hanzi: 你们参加高级程度英语考试要读哪些必修课本?
pinyin: nǐ men cān jiā gāo jí chéng dù Yīng yǔ kǎo shì yào dú nǎ xiē bì xiū kè běn?
english: What are your set books for English A Level?

hanzi: 我喜欢吃水果，比如苹果、梨子、香蕉等等。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan jí shuǐ guǒ， bǐ rú píng guǒ、 lí zǐ、 xiāng jiāo děng děng。
english: I like fruits, such as apples, pears, bananas...

hanzi: 你撞到了我的手肘，弄坏了我正在画的图画。
pinyin: nǐ zhuàng dào le wǒ de shǒu zhǒu， nòng huài le wǒ zhèng zài huà de tú huà。
english: You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing.

hanzi: 我送给玛丽一个苹果换我最喜欢吃的香蕉。
pinyin: wǒ sòng jǐ Mǎ lì yī gè píng guǒ huàn wǒ zuì xǐ huan jí de xiāng jiāo。
english: I gave Mary an apple in exchange for my favorite banana.

hanzi: 在大家到齐之後两小时，她终於姗姗来到。
pinyin: zài dà jiā dào qí zhī後 liǎng xiǎo shí， tā zhōng yū shān shān lái dào。
english: She finally drifted in two hours after everyone else.

hanzi: 他思忖著要是没有这些孩子, 将来又如何.
pinyin: tā sī cǔn著 yào shì méi yǒu zhè xie hái zi,  jiāng lái yòu rú hé.
english: He contemplated what the future would be like without the children.

hanzi: 英国广播公司计画播放莎士比亚的全部戏剧。
pinyin: Yīng guó guǎng bō gōng sī jì huà bō fàng suō shì Bǐ yà de quán bù xì jù。
english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespeare's plays.

hanzi: 这帮匪徒通过他们的 连锁饭店洗赃款.
pinyin: zhè bāng fěi tú tōng guò tā men de  lián suǒ fàn diàn xǐ zāng kuǎn.
english: The gang laundered the stolen money through their chain of restaurants.

hanzi: 她还没做出什麽成绩来。但她确实很努力。
pinyin: tā huán mò zuò chū shí mó chéng jī lái。 dàn tā què shí hěn nǔ lì。
english: She hasn't had much success yet. Mark you, she does try hard.

hanzi: 你认为总统会对恐怖分子的要求让步吗？
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi zǒng tǒng kuài duì kǒng bù fèn zǐ de yāo qiú ràng bù ma？
english: Do you think the President will give in to the terrorists' demand?

hanzi: 你在发动引擎时，一定要让汽车处于空档。
pinyin: nǐ zài fā dòng yǐn qíng shí， yī dìng yào ràng qì chē chǔ yú kòng dàng。
english: When you start the engine, be sure the car is in neutral.

hanzi: 这护士照顾这位病人彷佛在照顾她爸爸似的。
pinyin: zhè hù shi zhào gu zhè wèi bìng rén páng fú zài zhào gu tā bà ba sì de。
english: The nurse attends on the patient as if he were her father.

hanzi: 你并不认为我会相信那个可鄙的借口，是吧？
pinyin: nǐ bìng bù rèn wéi wǒ kuài xiāng xìn nèi gè kě bǐ de jiè kǒu， shì ba？
english: You don't expect me to believe that pitiful excuse, do you?

hanzi: 从三楼掉下而没有受伤，这怎么可能呢？
pinyin: zòng sān lóu diào xià ér méi yǒu shòu shāng， zhè zěn me kě néng ne？
english: How was it possible to fall down from the third floor without being hurt?

hanzi: 他的脚稍有先天畸形，走起路来一瘸一拐。
pinyin: tā de jué shāo yǒu xiān tiān jī xíng， zǒu qǐ lù lái yī qué yī guǎi。
english: He was born with a slight deformity of the feet which made him limp.

hanzi: ＂在聪明的妹妹相形之下，她变得黯然失色。＂
pinyin: ＂ zài cōng míng de mèi mei xiàng xíng zhī xià， tā biàn de àn rán shī shǎi。＂
english: She is quite eclipsed by her clever younger sister.

hanzi: 你需用泵著实抽吸几分钟, 才能把油箱灌满.
pinyin: nǐ xū yòng bèng著 shí chōu xī jǐ fēn zhōng,  cái néng bǎ yóu xiāng guàn mǎn.
english: You will need to pump hard for several minutes to fill the tank.

hanzi: 这台泵通过这个阀门把（容器中的）空气抽出.
pinyin: zhè tái bèng tōng guò zhè gè fá mén bǎ（ róng qì zhòng dì） kōng qì chōu chū.
english: The pump sucks air out (of the vessel) through this valve.

hanzi: 我们要是买不起汽车, 也就只好不用（汽车）了.
pinyin: wǒ men yào shì mǎi bù qǐ qì chē,  yě jiù zhǐ hǎo bù yòng（ qì chē） le.
english: If we can't afford a car, we'll just have to do without (one).

hanzi: 对于他们枪杀无辜平民，人们感到义愤填膺。
pinyin: duì yú tā men qiāng shā wú gū píng mín， rén men gǎn dào yì fèn tián yīng。
english: People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians.

hanzi: 他由於一件表现出精湛技艺的作品而受到赞扬.
pinyin: tā yóu yū yī jiàn biǎo xiàn chū jīng zhàn jì yì de zuò pǐn ér shòu dào zàn yáng.
english: He was complimented on a very professional piece of work.

hanzi: 我的女儿十八岁了，已经长成为美丽的淑女。
pinyin: wǒ de nu:3 ér shí bā suì le， yǐ jīng zhǎng chéng wéi měi lì de淑 nu:3。
english: My daughter is eighteen years old and has grown into a beautiful lady.

hanzi: 你在那不停的噪声中怎麽能工作得下去呀?
pinyin: nǐ zài nà bù tíng de zào shēng zhòng zěn mó néng gōng zuò de xià qu ya?
english: How can you continue to work/continue working with all that noise going on?

hanzi: 我们有不同的派，例如苹果、樱桃和草莓派。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu bù tóng de pài， lì rú píng guǒ、 yīng táo huò cǎo méi pài。
english: We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies.

hanzi: 她的卧室是这座嘈杂房屋中一个难得的安静之处。
pinyin: tā de wò shì shì zhè zuò cáo zá fáng wū zhòng yī gè nán dé de ān jìng zhī chù。
english: Her bedroom is an oasis of calm in the noisy house.

hanzi: 那两个女孩经常一起在那棵大山楂树下玩耍。
pinyin: nà liǎng gè nu:3 hái jīng cháng yī qǐ zài nà kē dà shān zhā shù xià wàn shuǎ。
english: The two girls always play together under the large hawthorn.

hanzi: 我以前从未听到过这个词语，是最近新造的吗？
pinyin: wǒ yǐ qián zòng wèi tīng dào guò zhè gè cí yǔ， shì zuì jìn xīn zào de ma？
english: I hadn't heard that expression before ; is it a recent coinage?

hanzi: 天竺葵是种开红、粉红或白色花的花园植物。
pinyin: tiān zhú kuí shì zhòng kāi hóng、 fěn hóng huò bái sè huā de huā yuán zhí wù。
english: The geranium is a garden plant with red, pink or white flowers.

hanzi: 即使是最聪明的人也会陷入琐事与混乱之中。
pinyin: jí shǐ shì zuì cōng míng de rén yě kuài xiàn rù suǒ shì yù hùn luàn zhī zhōng。
english: The most brilliant person may be mired in detail and confusion.

hanzi: 这位医生颇为炫耀地带着我们参观了他的医院。
pinyin: zhè wèi yī shēng pō wèi xuàn yào dì dài zhuó wǒ men cān guān le tā de yī yuàn。
english: The doctor showed us about his hospital with much flourish.

hanzi: 那项要求很有意思，可是你有证件加以证明吗？
pinyin: nà xiàng yāo qiú hěn yǒu yì si， kě shì nǐ yǒu zhèng jiàn jiā yǐ zhèng míng ma？
english: That's a very interesting claim, but can you document it?

hanzi: 运动员们离开赛场时，被愤怒的人群推搡着。
pinyin: yùn dòng yuán men lí kāi sài chǎng shí， bèi fèn nù de rén qún tuī sǎng zhuó。
english: The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.

hanzi: 他像一只骄傲的孔雀一样在我前面趾高气扬地走着。
pinyin: tā xiàng yī zhǐ jiāo ào de kǒng què yí yàng zài wǒ qián mian zhǐ gāo qì yáng de zǒu zhuó。
english: He strutted in front of me like a peacock.

hanzi: 我只是出于好奇，请问你买这辆车花了多少钱？
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ shì chū yú hào qí， qǐng wèn nǐ mǎi zhè liàng jū huā le duō shao qián？
english: Just to satisfy my curiosity, how much did you pay for your car?

hanzi: ＂局长看上去彷佛挺厉害，但他心地正直。＂
pinyin: ＂ jú zhǎng kàn shàng qù páng fú tǐng lì hai， dàn tā xīn de zhèng zhí。＂
english: "The director seems rather fierce, but his heart is in the right place."

hanzi: 哥伦布按顺序仔细而详尽地记载了他的各次航程。
pinyin: gē lún bù àn shùn xù zǐ xì ér xiáng jìn de jì zǎi le tā de gè cì háng chéng。
english: Columbus kept a careful and detailed chronicle of his voyages.

hanzi: 我们若决定购买这座别墅，就得重新进行装修。
pinyin: wǒ men ruò jué dìng gòu mǎi zhè zuò bié shù， jiù de chóng xīn jìn xíng zhuāng xiū。
english: If we decide to buy the cottage we'll have to do it up.

hanzi: 从我搬进城里以后，我有好几年没见过蚂蚱了。
pinyin: zòng wǒ bān jìn chéng lǐ yǐ hòu， wǒ yǒu hǎo jǐ nián mò xiàn guò mà zhà le。
english: I hadn't seen a grasshopper for years since I moved into the city.

hanzi: 我觉得你的咳嗽声有问题--是不是该找医生看看?
pinyin: wǒ jué de nǐ de ké sou shēng yǒu wèn tí-- shì bú shì gāi zhǎo yī shēng kàn kan?
english: I don't like the sound of that cough oughtn't you to see a doctor?

hanzi: 储存的　物经常受损坏, 尤其是老鼠为患最甚.
pinyin: chǔ cún de　 wù jīng cháng shòu sǔn huài,  yóu qí shì lǎo shǔ wèi huàn zuì shèn.
english: Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests, especially rats.

hanzi: 要参加体育活动--篮球、 冰球、 游泳之类的活动.
pinyin: yào cān jiā tǐ yù huó dòng-- lán qiú、  bīng qiú、  yóu yǒng zhī lèi de huó dòng.
english: Take any sport basketball, ice hockey, swimming or whatever.

hanzi: 这些儿童在早餐与午餐之间有牛奶与饼乾作点心.
pinyin: zhè xie ér tóng zài zǎo cān yù wǔ cān zhī jiān yǒu niú nǎi yù bǐng qián zuò diǎn xīn.
english: The children have a mid-morning snack of milk and biscuits.

hanzi: 我并不是自吹自擂，但所有的重要工作都是我干的。
pinyin: wǒ bìng bù shì zì chuī zì lèi， dàn suǒ yǒu de zhòng yào gōng zuò dōu shì wǒ gàn de。
english: I'm not blowing my own trumpet, but I did all the top jobs.

hanzi: 他最初的反应是不同意。可是後来他改变了主意。
pinyin: tā zuì chū de fǎn yìng shì bù tóng yì。 kě shì後 lái tā gǎi biàn le zhǔ yi。
english: His first response was to say no. Later, however, he changed his mind.

hanzi: 人们一提到维也纳就会联想到华尔兹圆舞曲和咖啡馆.
pinyin: rén men yī tí dào wéi yě nà jiù kuài lián xiǎng dào huà ěr zī yuán wǔ qǔ huò kā fēi guǎn.
english: People connect Vienna with waltzes and coffee-houses.

hanzi: 你肯定不会指望我认真考虑你那些荒谬的建议吧?
pinyin: nǐ kěn dìng bù huì zhǐ wàng wǒ rèn zhēn kǎo lu:4 nǐ nà xiē huāng miù de jiàn yì ba?
english: Surely you don't expect me to take your potty suggestions seriously?

hanzi: 除了一本照相簿外, 我还给了他一支钢笔和一支铅笔。
pinyin: chú le yī běn zhào xiàng bù wài,  wǒ huán jǐ le tā yī zhī gāng bǐ huò yī zhī qiān bǐ。
english: In addition to an album, I gave him a pen and a pencil.

hanzi: 除了一本照相簿外, 我还给了他一支钢笔和一支铅笔。
pinyin: chú le yī běn zhào xiàng bù wài,  wǒ huán jǐ le tā yī zhī gāng bǐ huò yī zhī qiān bǐ。
english: In addition to an album, I gave him a pen and a pencil.

hanzi: 往日激情将熄的余烬仍可从他的文章中看出来。
pinyin: wǎng rì jī qíng jiàng xī de yú jìn réng kě zòng tā de wén zhāng zhòng kàn chū lai。
english: The dying embers of a former passion can still be seen in his article.

hanzi: 这一段里面有很多名词，例如男孩、女孩和书本。
pinyin: zhè yī duàn lǐ miàn yǒu hěn duō míng cí， lì rú nán hái、 nu:3 hái huò shū běn。
english: In this paragraph there are many nouns, such as boy, girl, and book.

hanzi: 你的书好像比我的有意思, 你愿意（和我）交换吗?
pinyin: nǐ de shū hǎo xiàng bì wǒ de yǒu yì si,  nǐ yuàn yì（ huò wǒ） jiāo huàn ma?
english: Your book looks more interesting than mine: do you want to swap (with me)?

hanzi: 珍和玛丽是好朋友，前者是老师，后者是护士。
pinyin: zhēn huò Mǎ lì shì hào péng you， qián zhě shì lǎo shī， hǒu zhě shì hù shi。
english: Jane and Mary are good friends; the former is a teacher, the latter is a nurse.

hanzi: 刘师傅把每道工序做给我们看，然后让我们自己干。
pinyin: liú shī fu bǎ měi dào gōng xù zuò jǐ wǒ men kàn， rán hòu ràng wǒ men zì jǐ gàn。
english: Master Liu demonstrated to us each process, and let us do it ourselves.

hanzi: 利物浦队因对方一队员用手触球而得到一个罚球。
pinyin: lì wù pǔ duì yīn duì fāng yī duì yuán yòng shǒu chù qiú ér dé dào yī gè fá qiú。
english: Liverpool were given a penalty when one of their opponents handled the ball.

hanzi: 瞧，我这是怎么搞的！它本是辆新车。我怎么办好呢？
pinyin: qiáo， wǒ zhè shì zěn me gǎo de！ tā běn shì liàng xīn jū。 wǒ zěn me bàn hào ne？
english: Just look what I have done! It was a new car. Whatever am I going to do?

hanzi: 你弟弟小小的年龄竟高出你一大截，真令人恼火！
pinyin: nǐ dì di xiǎo xiǎo de nián líng jìng gāo chū nǐ yī dà jié， zhēn lìng rén nǎo huǒ！
english: How maddening to have your younger brother tower over you, at his age, too!

hanzi: 别老唠叨你的那些问题，还是做些实际工作解决它们吧！
pinyin: biè lǎo láo tāo nǐ de nà xiē wèn tí， hái shì zuò xiē shí jì gōng zuò jiě jué tā men ba！
english: Stop dwelling on your problems and do something about them!

hanzi: 先把系帐篷的桩子打进地里，再把绳子系在桩子上。
pinyin: xiān bǎ xì zhàng peng de zhuāng zi dǎ jìn de lǐ， zài bǎ shéng zi xì zài zhuāng zi shàng。
english: First hammer the tent pegs into the ground, then tie the ropes onto them.

hanzi: 共用餐者如在军队集体食堂里经常与某人一起用膳的人
pinyin: gòng yòng cān zhě rú zài jūn duì jí tǐ shí táng lǐ jīng cháng yù mǒu rén yī qǐ yòng shàn de rén
english: A person with whom one eats regularly, as in a military mess.

hanzi: 必须对那些专在足球比赛时打架的社会渣滓严加惩处！
pinyin: bì xū duì nà xiē zhuān zài zú qiú bǐ sài shí dǎ jià de shè huì zhā zǐ yán jiā chéng chù！
english: These scum who fight at the football matches must be severely dealt with!

hanzi: 他胜任新闻广播员的工作，在於他有当过记者的锻炼。
pinyin: tā shèng rèn xīn wén guǎng bō yuán de gōng zuò， zài yū tā yǒu dàng guò jì zhě de duàn liàn。
english: His strength as a news-reader lies in his training as a journalist.

hanzi: 念咒口头咒语或符咒的仪式性的吟诵以产生魔力的效果
pinyin: niàn zhòu kǒu tóu zhòu yǔ huò fú zhòu de yí shì xìng de yín sòng yǐ chǎn shēng mó lì de xiào guǒ
english: Ritual recitation of verbal charms or spells to produce a magic effect.

hanzi: 真不幸，上午我的自行车丢了，下午钱包又被偷了！
pinyin: zhēn bù xìng， shàng wǔ wǒ de zì xíng chē diū le， xià wǔ qián bāo yòu bèi tōu le！
english: It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

hanzi: 我那趟班机误点了, 我只好看书消磨时间[打发了两小时].
pinyin: wǒ nà tàng bān jī wù diǎn le,  wǒ zhǐ hǎo kàn shū xiāo mò shí jiān[ dǎ fa le liǎng xiǎo shí].
english: My flight was delayed, so I killed time/killed two hours reading a book.

hanzi: 史密斯小姐（去年访问了中国）打算嫁给爱尔伯特先生。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiǎo jie（ qù nián fǎng wèn le Zhōng guó） dǎ suàn jià jǐ ài ěr bó tè xiān sheng。
english: Miss Smith( who visited china last year) is going to marry Mr. Abbott.

hanzi: 真不幸，上午我的自行车丢了，下午钱包又被偷了！
pinyin: zhēn bù xìng， shàng wǔ wǒ de zì xíng chē diū le， xià wǔ qián bāo yòu bèi tōu le！
english: It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

hanzi: 你从图书馆借的书上的戳记表明，这本书必须明天归还。
pinyin: nǐ zòng tú shū guǎn jiè de shū shàng de chuō jì biǎo míng， zhè běn shū bì xū míng tiān guī huán。
english: The stamp in your library book shows it must be returned tomorrow.

hanzi: 我原以为自己画得不错, 可比起你的画儿来未免相形见绌.
pinyin: wǒ yuán yǐ wéi zì jǐ huà de bù cuò,  kě bǐ qǐ nǐ de huàr lái wèi miǎn xiàng xíng xiàn chù.
english: I thought I was quite a good artist, but your painting puts mine in the shade.

hanzi: 你看见语法书在哪儿呢吗? 词典都在正对著的书架上.
pinyin: nǐ kàn jiàn yǔ fǎ shū zài nǎ r ne ma?  cí diǎn dōu zài zhèng duì著 de shū jià shàng.
english: Can you see where the grammar books are? The dictionaries are on the shelf directly opposite.

hanzi: 真不幸，上午我的自行车丢了，下午钱包又被偷了！
pinyin: zhēn bù xìng， shàng wǔ wǒ de zì xíng chē diū le， xià wǔ qián bāo yòu bèi tōu le！
english: It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

hanzi: 在日常会话中，你是请求别人做事，而不是"命令"他们。
pinyin: zài rì cháng huì huà zhòng， nǐ shì qǐng qiú bié rén zuò shì， ér bú shì" mìng lìng" tā men。
english: In everyday conversation, you request people to do things, not "order" them.

hanzi: 我基本上同意你的建议, 但是有几个小问题有待商榷.
pinyin: wǒ jī běn shang tóng yì nǐ de jiàn yì,  dàn shì yǒu jǐ ge xiǎo wèn tí yǒu dài shāng què.
english: Basically I agree with your proposals, but there are a few small points I'd like to discuss.

hanzi: 松鼠，啮齿类动物的代表；举例介绍每一个生词的用法
pinyin: sōng shǔ， niè chǐ lèi dòng wù de dài biǎo； jǔ lì jiè shào měi yī gè shēng cí de yòng fǎ
english: The squirrel, an example of a rodent; introduced each new word with examples of its use.

hanzi: 要是太阳从西边出来，他就会通过考试－－他不可能通过考试。
pinyin: yào shì tài yáng zòng xī biān chū lai， tā jiù kuài tōng guò kǎo shì－－ tā bù kě néng tōng guò kǎo shì。
english: If the sun were to rise in the west, he would pass the exam.

hanzi: 中间休息时有些点心（如冰激凌、 炸土豆片、 巧克力）.
pinyin: zhōng jiān xiū xi shí yǒu xiē diǎn xīn（ rú bīng jī líng、  zhà tǔ dòu piàn、  qiǎo kè lì）.
english: Light refreshments (eg ice-cream, crisps, chocolate) are available during the interval.

hanzi: 一个小男孩在街上拦住了我，问道；“先生，现在几点了？”
pinyin: yī gè xiǎo nán hái zài jiē shàng lán zhù le wǒ， wèn dào；“ xiān sheng， xiàn zài jī diǎn le？”
english: A little boy stopped me in the street and asked me, "What's the time, mister?"

hanzi: 她需要使请求语气柔婉，以便尽可能把它变成有礼貌与客气。
pinyin: tā xū yào shǐ qǐng qiú yǔ qì róu wǎn， yǐ biàn jìn kě néng bǎ tā biàn chéng yǒu lǐ mào yù kè qì。
english: She needed to soften her request to make it as polite and courteous as she could.

hanzi: 天文学家现在能看到的星星的数目，多得简直令人头晕目眩。
pinyin: tiān wén xué jiā xiàn zài néng kàn dào de xīng xing de shù mù， duō de jiǎn zhí lìng rén tóu yūn mù xuàn。
english: The number of stars now visible to the astronomers makes one's brain reel.

hanzi: 我们应该努力摆脱劳资关系中｀那群人和我们＇这种对立的态度.
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi nǔ lì bǎi tuō láo zī guān xi zhòng｀ nà qún rén huò wǒ men＇ zhè zhǒng duì lì de tài du.
english: We should try to get away from a `them and us' attitude in industrial relations.

hanzi: （成交或成婚时的）握手用来表示诸如合约或婚姻的誓言的一种握手
pinyin: （ chéng jiāo huò chéng hūn shí de） wò shǒu yòng lái biǎo shì zhū rú hé yuē huò hūn yīn de shì yán de yī zhòng wò shǒu
english: A handclasp used to signify a pledge, such as a contract or marriage.

hanzi: 你飞回家度寒假的时刻不知不觉就会来到的，我都已经在盼望着啦！
pinyin: nǐ fēi huí jiā dù hán jià de shí kè bù zhī bù jué jiù kuài lái dào de， wǒ dōu yǐ jīng zài pàn wàng zhuó la！
english: Before you know it you'll be flying home for the winter holidays, I can hardly wait!

hanzi: 哲瑞米是初出茅庐，所以我们并不指望他在这次比赛中表现得很好。
pinyin: zhé ruì mǐ shì chū chū máo lú， suǒ yǐ wǒ men bìng bù zhǐ wàng tā zài zhè cì bǐ sài zhòng biǎo xiàn de hěn hào。
english: Jeremy's just being blooded, so we don't expect him to be very good at the game.

hanzi: 鸬鹚是一种长脖子黑颜色的大鸟，生活在海滨而且以吃鱼为生。
pinyin: lú鹚 shì yī zhòng zhǎng bó zi hēi yán sè de dà niǎo， shēng huó zài hǎi bīn ér qiě yǐ jí yú wéi shēng。
english: The cormorant is a large, long-necked, dark-colored bird which lives near sea coasts and eats fish.

hanzi: 一谈到别的事情时，他们的记性并不是很好，但他们却记得彗星。
pinyin: yī tán dào bié de shì qing shí， tā men de jì xìng bìng bù shì hěn hǎo， dàn tā men què jì de huì xīng。
english: Their memory wasn't very good when it came to recalling other things, but they remembered the comet.

hanzi: 我们在晚会上要装扮得像电影中的角色，这是一个多么新奇的主意啊！
pinyin: wǒ men zài wǎn huì shàng yào zhuāng bàn de xiàng diàn yǐng zhòng dì jué sè， zhè shì yī gè duō me xīn qí de zhǔ yi a！
english: We are supposed to dress up as movie characters for the party, what a novel idea!

hanzi: 把你们的学习室收拾一下，孩子们，"妈妈说，"你们把所有的书都弄得乱七八糟的了。"
pinyin: bǎ nǐ men de xué xí shì shōu shi yī xià， hái zi men，" mā ma shuō，" nǐ men bǎ suǒ yǒu de shū dōu nòng de luàn qī bā zāo de le。"
english: "Tidy up your study, kids, "Mother said, "all your books are in a muddle."

hanzi: 尽管（她讲的）内容有些枯燥, 但由於她善於表达, 大家仍听得津津有味.
pinyin: jǐn guǎn（ tā jiǎng de） nèi róng yǒu xiē kū zào,  dàn yóu yū tā shàn yū biǎo dá,  dà jiā réng tìng de jīn jīn yǒu wèi.
english: Although the subject-matter (of her talk) was rather dull her witty delivery kept the audience interested.

hanzi: 一道耀眼的闪光，把人们的眼睛都照花了……紧接着轰隆隆传来一声巨雷。
pinyin: yī dào yào yǎn de shǎn guāng， bǎ rén men de yǎn jīng dōu zhào huā le…… jǐn jiē zhe hōng lóng lóng zhuàn lái yī shēng jù léi。
english: And then there came a blinding flash… and hard upon the heels of it, a great tow-row of thunder.

hanzi: 扫帚梆在一块儿的枝条、干草或刺毛，缚在一根棍或把柄上，作清扫之用
pinyin: sào zhou bāng zài yī kuài er de zhī tiáo、 gān cǎo huò cì máo， fú zài yī gēn gùn huò bǎ bǐng shàng， zuò qīng sǎo zhī yòng
english: A bunch of twigs, straw, or bristles bound together, attached to a stick or handle, and used for sweeping.

hanzi: 和大城市中的高楼大厦和喧嚣的街道相比，他更喜欢乡间的农庄和田野。
pinyin: huò dà chéng shì zhòng dì gāo lóu dà shà huò xuān xiāo de jiē dào xiāng bǐ， tā gèng xǐ huan xiāng jiàn de nóng zhuāng Hé tián yě。
english: He likes the farms and fields in the country better than the tall buildings and busy streets in the city.

hanzi: 我们太阳系的行星有水星、金星、地球、火星、木星、土星、天王星和海王星。
pinyin: wǒ men tài yáng xì de xíng xīng yǒu shuǐ xīng、 jīn xīng、 dì qiú、 huǒ xīng、 Mù xīng、 tǔ xīng、 tiān wáng xīng huò hǎi wáng xīng。
english: The planets of our solar system are Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune.

hanzi: 我们太阳系的行星有水星、金星、地球、火星、木星、土星、天王星和海王星。
pinyin: wǒ men tài yáng xì de xíng xīng yǒu shuǐ xīng、 jīn xīng、 dì qiú、 huǒ xīng、 Mù xīng、 tǔ xīng、 tiān wáng xīng huò hǎi wáng xīng。
english: The planets of our solar system are Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune.

hanzi: "告诉我：在任何一项工作中，是师傅说了算，还是助手说了算！""那得看情况。"
pinyin: " gào su wǒ： zài rèn hé yí xiàng gōng zuò zhòng， shì shī fu shuō le suàn， hái shì zhù shǒu shuō le suàn！"" nà de kàn qíng kuàng。"
english: "Tell me this: In any job of work, should the master have the last word, or the assistant! " "That depends."

hanzi: 他问道："你想日后到英国去住吗？"我说："不会的，我已经断了这个念头了。"
pinyin: tā wèn dào：" nǐ xiǎng rì hòu dào Yīng guó qù zhù ma？" wǒ shuō：" bù huì de， wǒ yǐ jīng duàn le zhè gè niàn tou le。"
english: "Do you think you'll want to go back and live in England? " he asked. "I don't think so, " I said. "I think I've got that much out of my system."

hanzi: 剪贴簿，影集，签名薄有空白页以便插入或存放收集品，如邮票、照片或签名的本子
pinyin: jiǎn tiē bù， yǐng jí， qiān míng bò yǒu kòng bái yè yǐ biàn chā rù huò cún fàng shōu jí pǐn， rú yóu piào、 zhào piàn huò qiān míng de běn zi
english: A book with blank pages for the insertion and preservation of collections, as of stamps, photographs, or autographs.

hanzi: 摄影用超压强烈溢光灯，照相泛光灯用于摄影照明的、可产生持续明亮光线的可再次使用的电灯
pinyin: shè yǐng yòng chāo yā qiáng liè yì guāng dēng， zhào xiàng fàn guāng dēng yòng yú shè yǐng zhào míng de、 kě chǎn shēng chí xù míng liàng guāng xiàn de kě zài cì shǐ yòng de diàn dēng
english: A reusable electric lamp that produces a bright continuous light for photographic illumination.
